story:
Who we are:

TERP Corp is a female-led company engaging in innovative ways to interact with technology and movement. We have two patents, US 7,853,249 B2 and US 9,275,617 for our TERP system, and now we want to put it in your hands with an app. With our backgrounds in dance and technology, we believe in movements ability to break new bounds. While there is plenty of amazing tech out there that helps you interact with a device or screen, we believe the next revolution is tech that is invisible and allows for seamless interactions with people in real-life, face-to-face, no screen needed.

The TERP app:

The TERP app allows users to send audio of movement-based commands out to participants at exactly the same time. It's unique because we have:

- Complete synchronization: every single participant hears "Go" or "Run" at precisely the same time. (20 milliseconds to be exact!)

- Invisible technology: While your phone sits in your pocket, the app allows for instantaneous interaction with people face-to-face.

- Absolute control: one person get to direct the others using the TERP app's simple interface, choosing which commands go out when, and to who.

- Creative interpretation: We've been working over the past few years to create a database of thousands of commands, testing them on every age group to make actions that work for anyone and everyone that still challenge the mind while opening people up to fun, creative play.

Where to use the app:

We have brought our custom-built hardware beta system from coast to coast and used it with strangers all over the country. We've tested it with special needs kids in their own classrooms, octogenarians at a nursing home, convention goers, and even college students. The TERP technology is great for:

- Controlling or entertaining crowds: from kid's birthday parties to convention masses

- Ice-breaking or training for large groups: for students in schools or retreats at businesses

- Organizing group or individual movement: sports drills, historical re-enactments, or even wedding rehearsals

But we're most excited to see the innovative ways our new app users will decide to creatively use the system!

What we need:

While we've been self-funded for these past few years, we're making a big jump with the app:

  • We'll need a redesign of our site to accommodate the app, it's database of commands, and our new users.
  • A large portion of the funds will go towards hiring some expert developers to help us with creating a database to hold thousands of commands.
  • Funds will also go towards continued recording of creative and unique movement commands that work for any event in any space that has a wifi connection!

What you get:

  • We have so many fun perks, from free decks of commands to recording your own ideas, to hosting your own TERP party in our loft live/workspace in downtown NYC!
  • It will be about 4 months after our campaign ends until we launch the beta application, which anyone above the $100 pledge level will get to test. The public launch for the app will occur 6 months from the start of funding. 
  • Special packages of commands will be released in the months following the public launch, once we complete our collaborations with funders and various businesses.
  • Even if we don't fully fund the amount, we're dedicated-funds will allow us to being the design work for the app, allow us to get a wire frame and start organizing the database of commands. We will continue raising funds privately and hosting events in our space to help fund the rest of the app development.

The Impact

While we love our current hardware system that allowed us to test our ideas all these years, it's simply not scalable, and not user friendly. It requires knowledge and staff, whereas the app allows anyone with a wifi connection to get a group together and have fun:

  • In order to allow anyone and everyone to play, we’re making this a web-based app instead of a native app which means it doesn’t matter how much your friend loves their iphone/Android/Windows device over yours, you’ll still be able to use the TERP app together. A simple bookmark on your phone will bring you to the TERP web app.
  • We've got a great group of woman with the skills to take this company to the next level. With this app, we will no longer be limited to the laborious hardware system. We'll be able to reach out to schools and businesses, bringing creative fun and social interaction to any situation that needs it!
  • Our founder, Patrice M. Regnier, already funded and built a beta hardware system to test the idea, so you can know that your money will go exactly where it needs to, to get this app made. 

Risks & Challenges

1. Delivery: We're working on a complex app that involves organizing thousands of audio commands. It's bound to get complicated. Luckily Patrice has already gone through funding and building a hardware/software prototype, so you know she can get the job done.

2. Synchronization: One of the unique and exciting aspects of the TERP app is the ability to send commands to multiple people and have them receive it all at once. As you can see in our reward levels, we'll be hoisting test parties in our loft to test the limits of the system and get feedback before the public launch. We're also planning on getting some heavy-duty dedicated servers. It's listed as a stretch goal, but we'll be reaching out to interested advertisers and investors as well.

Patrice has been working with the TERP system for 10 years, testing and seeing what works best. We've worked with octogenarians, lawyers, middle schoolers, dancers, and even strangers from off the street in our events. We're ready to expand. Feel free to ask us any questions about the process.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone has the ability to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • If you think you know someone-a teacher, a dating consultant, a wedding planner, a coach, someone who organizes group of people-send them a quick hello with our campaign.
  • Like our Facebook page.
  • Come out to one of our events and bring a friend.
  • Give us a shootout on social media! Use @terptribe to connect with us and let us know!

story:
Why we created DShofer

With DShofer, no man — and no vehicle — is left behind. Our app connects you with a fully-vetted driver service that will take you home in your own car (while a second driver will follow closely behind to re-collect your shofer once you’ve been dropped off). 

We want to help you, your friends and, yes, even your foes, enjoy a worry-free night out AND get home safely. Did you know that one in every three people are affected by DUI? So why do we continue to drive? Our research has shown that many drivers charged with a DUI said they chose to get behind the wheel because they were unwilling to abandon their vehicle in an unfamiliar area and then deal with the hassle of retrieving it the next day. With DShofer, we have created a practical solution that can save lives and prevent spending thousands .

Help support our campaign and try DShofer! We are funding a free ride night in select cities where you'll be able to try the DShofer app and service for free.

Don't want to wait? Try the app now. (Service available in St. Louis and Silicon Valley. Kansas City service available by fall 2015.)


What We Need & What You Get

Grab one of these great perks...

Choose one of these great perks by selecting it in the column on the right.

To help us raise $20,000 for:
 • Launching a FREE ride night in St. Louis and in Silicon Valley!
• Training and certifying new drivers for our growing demand.
• Helping to inform thousands about a great alternative to driving under the influence with the FREE ride night publicity.

How it works:
DShofer is a powerful app that’s easy to use.

Step 1: Enjoy a carefree night out with your friends.

Step 2: Use the DShofer app to reserve a ride ahead of time or to call for one when you’re ready. The app also allows you to track your driver’s progress to your location and to broadcast your GPS location to the driver for an easier pick up.

Step 3: When your driver arrives, simply let him take the wheel while you ride home in the comfort of your own car. A second driver will follow closely behind to  re-collect your chauffeur once you’ve been dropped off.

Step 4: Wake up knowing that you made a smart decision to get home safely. Go you!


Risks & Challenges

Our DShofer app has been up and running in St. Louis since the beginning of the year. Once funding is reached, our large launch event will be scheduled. Any delay in scheduling will be due to dates available for our partner organizations.

However any delays in scheduling the launch date, should not have any affect on the delivery or fulfillment of items purchased by our backers. Most of our items are fulfilled digitally through promotional codes. Once received after the campaign ends, they can be immediately redeemed.

Other Ways You Can Help

Contact us to become a driver, receive training and help your community.

story:
The jade cable is a beautifully designed for cell phone and come with a built-in with anti-tangle weave cable.


Jade has been considered a lucky charm since ancient times up until the present day.  The jade cable connection design has been creatively made into a pendant and linked to a weave cable, secured by a traditional Chinese folk knot. It is mobile and keeps you connected to the web everywhere you go.  A pendant/cable hybrid.  It’s eye-catching and fully functional.

We are eager to make this idea come to life.


◎ Design process

1.  A Chinese style cable including charging, data transmission and jade pendant.

2.  The USB and micro USB connectors embedded in the plastic pedant, so tooling and ultrasonic manufacturing techniques have been applied.

3.  A Cable links both connectors but in a neutral appearance, so a weave cable has been applied.

4.  We decide on beauty over easy handling because we think the user will quickly get used to operating methods.

5.  To hang the device, we use a traditional Chinese knot.

  

◎ Design patent

Patents are below,

Patent 3188936(Japan), new housing construction of the transmission wire.

Patent M492557(R.O.C), transmission device of convenient storage.



◎ Operating methods

The jade cable can go anywhere with you. You can snap it onto your clothes, handbag and carry it with you everyday.


With its flexible design, you can use your phone comfortably while charging.


Design for travelers and people who are busy.


Gift for anyone.


◎ Features


It can be applied as a USB charger & data cable and a lucky jade pendant.


Flexible and anti-tangle cable design. No more annoying knots.

  

◎ How it works

The clever engineering designed the jade cable into 4 parts to load the necessary connectors/cable into the mechanism.

◎ Measurements and specifications


◎ Where we are:

Design – We have already completed our design and the first 100 working prototypes.

Manufacturer – We have established a great working relationship with our manufacturer in Taiwan with pricing and order quantities confirmed.

Verification - The cable has been tested.


◎ Why do we need your support?

Because we will never sacrifice quality for profits we use the highest quality materials available, our direct materials cost is high.  The jade cable is made by various of custom-made components.

To lower the unit cost, we will need mass produce conveying tooling fees and material costs.

Now is your chance to get in at the beginning of an amazing idea that will change the way you look at charging & data cable.

Please support our indiegogo campaign and be part of the jade cable pendant story!


◎ Sharing is Caring.

Even if you can't make a contribution, you can still help share this campaign by sharing our IndieGoGo page.


◎ Production timeline

◎ What sets us apart from the competition.

Before we ship your cable, we will do:

(1) Unpack cables and test the charge & sync process.

(2) Visually inspect for damages.

(3) We will make sure all cables are working and pass our quality inspection before shipping.


◎ Supporter's perk

With an expected retail launch price of $20, we're offering our Indiegogo supporters the one-time opportunity to own a jade cable saving up to 50%. Please see right side for more details.


◎ Shipping date

After we get the sponsorship, if the project is successful, we will immediately begin jade cable production, scheduled to ship the order.


◎ Risks and challenges

As soon as our campaign is successfully funded, we are going to make sure everything happens according to our plan.

The supply chain, manufacturing, operations and logistics are set up and ready to go.

Although we do not see any direct risks or challenges, there may be unforeseen circumstances that arise during the production process.  

We are committed to do everything in our power to deliver your jade cable on time and keep you informed about our processes.


◎ Thanks for your support

Finally, special thanks to everyone who has helped us in this design journey also thanks to every sponsor in this plan for giving us this opportunity to find our presence, to share our products, we hope to complete it step by step.


◎ FAQ

Q: I would like to have different amount in my perk, would it be possible?

A: Yes, what if your requirement is more than 20set of jade cables, just write us your required amount than we will revert our solution back for your perk as soon as possible.


Q: What about international shipping taxes?

A: International orders may be subject to certain import customs, duties and/or taxes imposed by your country upon delivery.

These charges are NOT included in the perks.

We recommend that you contact your local customs office for an estimate of any applicable taxes and duties you may be charged upon delivery.


Q: I have an iPhone. Will it work on my phone?

A: Sorry, at present we’ve developed a micro USB connector which works on Android systems and all devices that are charged with a micro USB cables.


Q: How flexible is the jade cable?

A: The jade cable is highly flexible.  The cable cab be bent by over 180 degrees.  So in efficient, it can be charged from almost any USB port available.


Q: Can I transfer data as well?

A: Yes, the jade cable doesn't just charge your phone, it also enables data transfer and sync.


For additional questions & press inquiries please email | Jadecable.tw@gmail.com

story:
Buying a new phone every time you drop it or the battery dies is now a thing of the past. PuzzlePhone is the first smartphone that’s built to last. It’s kind of like a puzzle… except it’s a phone. PuzzlePhone modular, with three easy-to-change modules, making it 100% upgradeable, repairable, & dare we say, future-proof. 




We believe that good design is functional and timeless, it should be built to last for years to come. We're on a mission to end the wasteful trend of 'consumable' electronics that are inoperable or obsolete after two years of use. PuzzlePhone is the first smartphone that's made to stand the test of time. We've separated the phone into three essential modules - the Heart, the Spine, and the Brain - that can be upgraded, replaced, and repaired for maximum longevity and performance.



PuzzlePhone is more than just a device - it's a platform, an ecosystem of interchangeable parts that are designed to be changed and upgraded with the times. It's the first truly sustainable smartphone - one that's not meant to be thrown out and replaced in full with every mobile carrier contract. If you break your screen, you can easily replace the Spine. If your battery dies, a new Heart will make your phone run like new. Want to increase your storage, a quick switch of the Brain will give you the upgrade you need. 






In 1860 articles, in 81 countries, in 47 languages.


Operating System: Android 6.0 Marshmallow (or any candy above).

Compiled & Sanitized in Finland: regular upgrades you can trust.

Materials: Our Design philosophy is rooted in a blend of beauty, usability and sustainability. Nordic Design focusses on subtle and functional forms, and optimal use of available resources. Longer-lasting products with carefully selected eco-friendly materials, which combine beauty with practicality.

Display: 5” Full HD 1920 x 1080

Front camera: 5 megapixels

Rear camera: 12 megapixels + LED Flash

Battery: 2.800 mAh

Processor: ARM 64 bits, 8 cores

RAM memory: 3 GB

Storage Memory: 16/32/64 GB (depending on model)

microSD support: Yes, the Brain module supports a microSD card.

Connectivity: 
2G/3G/4G/LTE Cat4/6* (*depending on markets)
USB 3.0/2.0 Type-C
NFC + Bluetooth LE 4.2
WiFI 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac
GPS

Sensors: 
Accelerometer
Gyroscope
Proximity
Ambient light

Size: 69 mm X 137 mm X 8.9 mm

Weight: 170 g

What’s in the box?
1 Spine + 1 Brain + 1 Heart = 1 Fully Operational PuzzlePhone
AC/DC USB Type C charger + USB cable
Headphones with integrated microphone
Quick Reference guide and Warranty Card




Only for the first 250 backers

The full PuzzlePhone mobile experience delivered in delightfully affordable package. Its most fun for the money – be among the first to have the PuzzlePhone for the lowest price ever!

The 1st edition PuzzlePhone will be the first to manufacture and delivered to backers. All finishing will be in moulded black plastic and it will have 16GB of internal storage memory.

Delivery – September 2016

Early bird piece for first 500 backers

PuzzlePhone - the manifest of Finnish design and style. Consumer delight delivered through modern and functional balance of technology and beauty. Featured with gun metal logo plate detail and with the delightful red accent color, 32 GB of internal storage memory.

Delivery – October 2016


limited to 250

Limited edition stands out from the crowd. It is outstanding both in terms of design and technical performance. It brings world-class design excellence and craftsmanship into an object of desire. Genuine materials - copper details with special edition plate and engraved text of your choice on the cover, 64 GB of internal storage memory.

Delivery – October 2016

 

If you adore timeless design, care about living sustainable life and you like to set fashion trends for others, then PuzzlePhone White Edition is the right phone for you. This masterpiece of Finnish design is the ultimate combination of Finnish design and technical performance. This elegant device features copper detailing and comes with 32GB of internal storage memory.



We are the Androids you’ve been looking for. A full stack startup from entrepreneurs with over 200 years of combined experience.



PuzzlePhone is designed in Finland and co-created in Europe – so our R&D, testing, and manufacturing remain in Europe. Our key partners Grant4Com (one stop shop for product development) and Haltian (the hardware design – mobile device masterclass), Antcore and PS Audio share our philosophy. All based in Oulu, Finland’s Silicon Valley, they are leveraging the full Oulu ecosystem for R&D, manufacturing, and assembly. Designed in Hämeenlinna. Built in Oulu. And although PuzzlePhone is, at the moment, made in Europe, we're most proud of the fact that our full business ecosystem is fully replicable elsewhere - making it a truly local system. 



Having supporters believing in us we are confident we can bring longer lasting product, while minimizing the consumption of resources.

We are grateful to our business angels and public institutions Tekes (the Finnish Funding Agency for innovation) and EU H2020 Sustainably Smart program grants to bring our idea closer to you.



Want to explore even further? Visit the PuzzlePhone web page.


If you have any questions regarding PuzzlePhone please contact us via email: contact@puzzlephone.com


Will the PuzzlePhone work worldwide?
All major LTE bands are covered and you can select your carrier (i.e.: AT&T, VzW or T-Mobile) by yourself.

The PuzzlePhone is a true world phone, but full LTE performance and coverage may vary around the globe. In this first stage the PuzzlePhone will be certified for CE and FCC and will operate in all networks. 

Will I be able to choose carrier?
As long as your carrier of choice sells or provide you with a SIM you will be able to use the PuzzlePhone.

Does the PuzzlePhone support dual SIM?
Dual SIM is not supported in this 1st version of the PuzzlePhone, but you can upgrade your Brain module later on with dual SIM compatible.

Will there be PuzzlePhones with smaller than 5" screens?
At this moment we are focusing on the 5" size factor. In the future we expect that there will be PuzzlePhone Compatible devices in bigger sizes. Smaller than 5" screen sizes for the PuzzlePhone are not planned for this first generation.

Will there be third-party pieces?
We are developing the PuzzlePhone Compatible Open Standard for third parties to develop compatible modules.

How much storage memory has the PuzzlePhone?
The PuzzlePhone is available in three storage memory configurations: 16GB, 32GB, and 64GB.

Is there support for microSD cards in the PuzzlePhone?
Yes, the Brain module supports one microSD card.

How long will the battery last?
Expected autonomy in 3G should at least:
Stand-by 500h
Talk time 16h
Music play 85h

What kind of Android runs the PuzzlePhone?
This first stage PuzzlePhone is going to be based in the most current and stable candy version of Android available at the time of manufacturing.

PuzzlePhone is going to be Android to have a familiar user experience and because without GoogleApps there is no Play Store apps and that's not commercially viable nowadays.

As part of the PuzzlePhone Compatible Open Standard, after this first stage, we will promote Brains with Android AOSP and other OS, like Sailfish.

What happens if the screen breaks?
The beauty of modularity as than you can take several paths at the same time, for instance: you can buy a new Spine module and replace the broken one in a minute, then and depending on the damage you can fix the broken one by yourself, send it back to us for repair or if it is absolutely destroyed put it into the recycling bin. 

Where can I buy replacement modules?
Directly from us and also through our preferred distributors, we are working as we speak to make them available in the major wholesalers from regular manufacturing Day 1.

When will I receive my order? 
The first units are expected to be delivered in September 2016. Please check your pledge’s expected delivery dates. 

To which countries you deliver PuzzlePhone?
European Union, United States of America, Canada, Albania, Andorra, Bosnia & Herzegovina, Georgia,  Iceland, Liechtenstein, Macedonia, Monaco, Montenegro, Norway, San Marino, Switzerland, Vatican City.

Why the PuzzlePhone campaign is not delivering to my region?
This first version of the PuzzlePhone will be certified for CE and FCC so we are delivering only to the countries where those certifications are valid. The PuzzlePhone will work in other networks and countries, but will not be certified for those areas in this first stage.

Once this campaign backers get their PuzzlePhone delivered we will continue the certification process for other countries. If you live in a country not listed and want to know how to get a PuzzlePhone please contact us.

Does PuzzlePhone has a warranty? 
A standard manufacturer warranty will apply. 

Do I need to add the cost of shipping & taxes to my pledge? 
Delivery costs and VAT will be automatically added to your final purchase price when you choose your destination country. Other taxes, customs or import fees are not included.

I can't get my payment to work in Paypal, what should I do?
Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.

What if my question isn’t answered here?
We’re happy to respond to any other queries you might have about the PuzzlePhone, the Indiegogo campaign, and our company as a whole. Email us at  contact@puzzlephone.com


Our first idea was creating this crowdfunding campaign as a Fixed Funding campaign. But we have to change plans as the Indiegogo platform only allows Paypal payments for Fixed Funding campaigns. For convenience to our backers we have opted for a Flexible Funding campaign to have a wider selection of payment options.

An Indiegogo flexible campaign means that we can keep the money even if we do not reach the goal. But that doesn’t mean that the project is going to disappear if the goal is not reached. Mainly because we have public and private funds for R&D as you can check PuzzlePhone gets EU support. As you see we didn’t came out of the blue, neither our partners: we have been planning and working in the original concept for more than two years now. So let’s make this clear: no one can develop a totally new smartphone for 250K EUR, that only pays the manufacturing setup costs, not the R&D.

Thanks to the advantages of manufacturing in Finland where a new wave of state of the art highly efficient facilities that does not rely on massive numbers we can produce batches as short as 100 units. And the implications of this new and leaner ways of manufacturing have deeper implications: with The PuzzlePhone we are also proving that it is cost-efficient and compatible with Finnish living standards to Design, Engineer and Manufacture trustworthy devices in a highly developed country.

Nothing to hide here our dear backers and we kindly invite the press to visit us and meet our team and R&D premises in Espoo and Oulu city, or to meet us at the forthcoming Slush event in Helsinki. It will be interesting for media to check with their own eyes what is behind trending hashtags such as #Industry4.0

So with or without goals you will receive your perk: a symbol of a new breed of devices designed to last but also and perhaps more important, you will be supporting local economies and promoting the Finnish living standards.

We are rebooting years of blindly outsourcing here and you have the opportunity to join our pilot program, be a pioneer and own a collectors piece of engineering.


Risks and challenges

The very nature of this new modular device and the advancements and breakthroughs we will experience in development means that the exact component list will change and evolve until we enter production. This is to ensure we’re picking the best available part at the time. In case we have to change a major feature or component, we will replace it with something at least as innovative or even better. 
We have worked on the PuzzlePhone for almost three years. As with all crowdfunding projects, and especially in complex developments like this, there is the risk of delay. Tooling and molding can be challenging. To closely supervise manufacturing we work with local suppliers, so that we can constantly monitor the process in order to avoid delays. We care about local manufacturing. It allows us to make better products. 
Back us and we’ll keep you updated!
By taking part to this crowdfunding campaign you understand the risk connected with this crowdfunding campaign. 


With your help we will make it! (select a perk) – By supporting us you will get a smartphone which is designed to minimize the negative impact to our planet.
story_txt:
Buying a new phone every time you drop it or the battery dies is now a thing of the past. PuzzlePhone is the first smartphone that’s built to last. It’s kind of like a puzzle… except it’s a phone. PuzzlePhone modular, with three easy-to-change modules, making it 100% upgradeable, repairable, & dare we say, future-proof. 








We believe that good design is functional and timeless, it should be built to last for years to come. We're on a mission to end the wasteful trend of 'consumable' electronics that are inoperable or obsolete after two years of use. PuzzlePhone is the first smartphone that's made to stand the test of time. We've separated the phone into three essential modules - the Heart, the Spine, and the Brain - that can be upgraded, replaced, and repaired for maximum longevity and performance.











PuzzlePhone is more than just a device - it's a platform, an ecosystem of interchangeable parts that are designed to be changed and upgraded with the times. It's the first truly sustainable smartphone - one that's not meant to be thrown out and replaced in full with every mobile carrier contract. If you break your screen, you can easily replace the Spine. If your battery dies, a new Heart will make your phone run like new. Want to increase your storage, a quick switch of the Brain will give you the upgrade you need. 














In 1860 articles, in 81 countries, in 47 languages.






Operating System: Android 6.0 Marshmallow (or any candy above).
Compiled & Sanitized in Finland: regular upgrades you can trust.
Materials: Our Design philosophy is rooted in a blend of beauty, usability and sustainability. Nordic Design focusses on subtle and functional forms, and optimal use of available resources. Longer-lasting products with carefully selected eco-friendly materials, which combine beauty with practicality.
Display: 5” Full HD 1920 x 1080
Front camera: 5 megapixels
Rear camera: 12 megapixels + LED Flash
Battery: 2.800 mAh
Processor: ARM 64 bits, 8 cores
RAM memory: 3 GB
Storage Memory: 16/32/64 GB (depending on model)
microSD support: Yes, the Brain module supports a microSD card.
Connectivity: 2G/3G/4G/LTE Cat4/6* (*depending on markets)USB 3.0/2.0 Type-CNFC + Bluetooth LE 4.2WiFI 802.11 a/b/g/n/acGPS
Sensors: AccelerometerGyroscopeProximityAmbient light
Size: 69 mm X 137 mm X 8.9 mm
Weight: 170 g
What’s in the box?1 Spine + 1 Brain + 1 Heart = 1 Fully Operational PuzzlePhoneAC/DC USB Type C charger + USB cableHeadphones with integrated microphoneQuick Reference guide and Warranty Card



Only for the first 250 backers
The full PuzzlePhone mobile experience delivered in delightfully affordable package. Its most fun for the money – be among the first to have the PuzzlePhone for the lowest price ever!
The 1st edition PuzzlePhone will be the first to manufacture and delivered to backers. All finishing will be in moulded black plastic and it will have 16GB of internal storage memory.
Delivery – September 2016
Early bird piece for first 500 backers
PuzzlePhone - the manifest of Finnish design and style. Consumer delight delivered through modern and functional balance of technology and beauty. Featured with gun metal logo plate detail and with the delightful red accent color, 32 GB of internal storage memory.
Delivery – October 2016



limited to 250
Limited edition stands out from the crowd. It is outstanding both in terms of design and technical performance. It brings world-class design excellence and craftsmanship into an object of desire. Genuine materials - copper details with special edition plate and engraved text of your choice on the cover, 64 GB of internal storage memory.
Delivery – October 2016
  If you adore timeless design, care about living sustainable life and you like to set fashion trends for others, then PuzzlePhone White Edition is the right phone for you. This masterpiece of Finnish design is the ultimate combination of Finnish design and technical performance. This elegant device features copper detailing and comes with 32GB of internal storage memory.

story:
Zdat –your 300% durable lightning cable with fully reversible USB plug for your Apple devices

Two common issues that lightning cable users often encounter:

Issue One:

The standard lightning Power/Sync cable is easily broken after using for a period of time. In other word, it is not durable. Many Apple device users have to consider replacing a new lightning cable. It is an annoying issue for most of Apple iPhone, iPod, iPad users.


Issue Two:

As you know, lightning plug is reversible and you don’t need to worry about putting in the wrong direction. But for the other USB end, you still need to pay attention to the right direction. So standard lightning cable is not a fully reversible cable. You still need to decide the right plug direction of USB port.


Can we get rid of the above issues? The answer is YES.

Now, Zdat want to bring you a new cable that settled the above two issues. Zdat ZT Cable is 300% durable compared with standard lightning cables. And its USB plug is reversible.

It is a totally new lightning cable for Apples devices. It is 300% more durable compared with standard lightning cable because it adopts super solid nylon braided skin. The braid skin is called Dupont Teflon ® PTFE material. It is a braid skin of polyester material and raise triple durability of cable compared with rubber skin of standard lightning cable. We have experiments that the cable can be twisted for more than 6000 times before it is broken. 


Tension Test of 100 KG Picture:

6000 times of Twistability Test:


The cable also has a rugged aluminum shell for plug protection. As you can see from the pictures below:



It is a MFi certified lightning cable and suitable for Apple devices. 


Fully reversible cable- both lightning and USB plug can be reversible. It is not like normal lightning cable, which does not have a reversible USB plug. It is more convenient than normal lightning cable. To bring this cable to Apple devices owners in the world, we are aiming to raise USD10000 for this project.  


As a durable and fully reversible lightning cable, Zdat ZT cable gives Apple devices users more convenient and long lasting experience of product.  The cables can be equal to three standard lightning cables. And the USB plug is reversible too. It saves some time when this cable is used. Just plug it to your PC or adapter and no need to care about the direction. It is like that you use lightning connector to your Apple devices.

We will launch our first version of 1 M durable and reversible cable. We also have 10cm and 2M options.

MFi Certified Lightning Cable

Braided cable with Dupont Teflon PTFE material

300% durability

Reversible USB Type-A Plug

1 Meter length


Lightning cables are frequently used for power/sync uses. They are necessary parts for Apple devices users. Many people may consume 2 or 3 lightning cables on average. But now ONE cable is ok because it is durable. One cable life is equal to 3 standard lightning cables’. There is a huge market for this lightning cable. And this cable also has a reversible USB plug. Obviously it is more convenient to use Zdat cable compared with other cables.

We aim to produce a durable lightning cable for Apple devices users. So the users do not need to replace lightning cable for years. We also want that the cable is more efficient and we change the normal USB plug to the reversible USB plug. Zdat ZT cable has combined our above two ideas. We have tested the cable and the results are excellent as we expected. We believe this cable is your good choice.


Established in 2015, Zdat is specialized in Apple accessories design and manufacture. We bring more creative and innovative product for our customers. And we produce different and fun products for our customers. Our pioneer products will be focused on the durable, fun and simple needs of customers. Zdat ZT cable is our latest idea of 2015 and product of Year 2015.


One of our purposes is to share our idea and communicate with you at the earliest stage of production on Indiegogo. We thank you in advance for your feedback and support. We hope to receive more feedback and we can have more brilliant ideas to design better product for the future.

We schedule the delivery time on early November. The deadline is December 1st. Of course we hope to send the product to you the sooner as possible. Once we reach our goal, we can start the production immediately. The cable will be on the way before we scheduled.

story:
The WYX multimedia dock is the most powerful dock, it is a smart dock, also a power bank. It can be used for any brand device, not only android devices, but IOS products too. It can charge for any device, even can read pictures off from any device to the main Samsung mobile on the dock and display it on the HD monitor, Apple products included.

As a  smart dock and power bank that harnesses the power of your Samsung phone, turning it into a mini desktop computer. Our dock has an HDMI port, 2 USB ports, and a 3.5mm stereo connector, so you can easily plug in an HDTV, mouse and keyboard, and even speakers. The WYX dock lets you easily share a presentation with a client, watch a movie with family, or even play a favorite game, all using your Samsung phone. 

 This dock is no ordinary dock; it is the most convenient dock on the market. It includes a built in power bank, so you can charge devices on the go, and can even work connected to an HD monitor without being plugged in. No complicated setup is required; you just attach your phone, plug in peripherals, and your phone transforms into a computer. You don’t even need to remove the case!


Features:

With the HDMI port, you can connect your device to an HDTV. Easily view your pictures, stream your favorite movies and shows, or enjoy a game, all in 1080p.

Connect a storage device, mouse and keyboard, or other phone using the 2 built in USB ports, turn your device into a mini desktop computer

You can charge your Samsung phone with the micro USB insert, and can also charge another 2 mobile devices at the same time using the standard USB ports, the devices not only android devices, also can be Apple products.

The dock includes a 3.5mm stereo out connector which supports digital audio, providing better sound quality to enjoy movies or music.

The dock includes two 2600mah capacity lithium batteries, so it can work as a power bank and charge your phone on the go. It can even support an HDMI connection without being plugged in.

While the main device must be a Samsung, you can also connect an Apple, HTC, or LG device using the USB ports. You can charge these devices, or even read pictures off them on the main mobile, and display them on the HD monitor.

The internal batteries are protected by a PCB, so when the batteries are fully charged, they won’t continue to receive power, and thus wear out.

The dock is very convenient, and can be used without removing the case.  

The micro USB port insert is flexible, allowing the device to move around while plugged in without being damaged.  

The dock is made with environmentally sustainable material. The shell is made with ABS and PC, and all parts comply with Rohs.  

The dock will be CE and FCC certified.



Compatible Devices:

Main Functions: Samsung mobile phone or tablet with Android 4.2.2 or above and MHL/OTG functions. Includes S3, S4, S5 Note 2, note 3 and Note 4

USB OTG/Charging: All mobile devices or tablets with USB connectivity.


Timeline:

1.Indiegogo Campaign will end on Feb 25th  

2.Production will begin on Feb 26th  

3.Quality control will continue throughout the production process  

4.First batch products will be finished in Early April, and all rewards will be shipped by the end of April.


Our process:

We’ve been working on this dock for over two years, and we now have a fully functioning product ready for mass production. At first, our idea was to make a dock that can use HDMI and OTG at the same time. It was difficult to get this to work, as whenever the HDMI was used, the USB ports didn’t work, and vice versa. We never gave up, and we’ve finally worked out the problem and created a functional dock.

We also wanted to create a device that was easy to use, and could be used anywhere without being plugged in. We decided to combine the dock with a power bank so that you can charge your phone and have it connected to an HD monitor without having to deal with power cables. We spent a long time trying to get the functions to work and charge fast enough with any device, and finally created a great product that meets all our goals.



Why We Need You:

We’ve worked very hard to make an amazing smart dock, and are now ready for mass production. We need funds from you to mass produce our dock, so that we can bring it to the market. We also know the Indiegogo community has a lot of great ideas, and would love to hear your feedback on how to make this product even better.

We wanted to create the most convenient universal hub for all your electronic devices. We hope you’ll join us in our mission.



Production Process:

Product Development: We’ve spent two years creating this product, and making sure that it functions exactly the way he hoped. We have a sample prototype which we have tested many times, and are now ready for mass production.

Production: We will find some good ODM factories to produce the dock. We will first create samples and then test them, selecting the factories with the best quality.  

Quality Control: We will be conducting quality control throughout the production process to make sure that the quality of materials and electronic parts are good. During production, we will have a quality controller there throughout the process, and will check every dock for functionality before packaging.


Risks and challenges

Suggestions from our backers are very important to us, and we want to implement as many as possible. If we do make changes according to feedback, it may affect our production time line as we would have to first design and test those changes before entering production.

Our product is fully ready for mass production, however, it is possible that we will encounter problems with mass production, the Chinese New Year holiday, or shipping that could delay production or delivery.
story_txt:
The WYX multimedia dock is the most powerful dock, it is a smart dock, also a power bank. It can be used for any brand device, not only android devices, but IOS products too. It can charge for any device, even can read pictures off from any device to the main Samsung mobile on the dock and display it on the HD monitor, Apple products included.As a  smart dock and power bank that harnesses the power of your Samsung phone, turning it into a mini desktop computer. Our dock has an HDMI port, 2 USB ports, and a 3.5mm stereo connector, so you can easily plug in an HDTV, mouse and keyboard, and even speakers. The WYX dock lets you easily share a presentation with a client, watch a movie with family, or even play a favorite game, all using your Samsung phone.  This dock is no ordinary dock; it is the most convenient dock on the market. It includes a built in power bank, so you can charge devices on the go, and can even work connected to an HD monitor without being plugged in. No complicated setup is required; you just attach your phone, plug in peripherals, and your phone transforms into a computer. You don’t even need to remove the case!Features:With the HDMI port, you can connect your device to an HDTV. Easily view your pictures, stream your favorite movies and shows, or enjoy a 
game, all in 1080p.
Connect a storage device, mouse and keyboard, or other phone using the 2 built in USB ports, turn your device into a mini desktop computerYou can charge your Samsung phone with the micro USB insert, and can also charge another 2 mobile devices at the same time using the standard USB ports, the devices not only android devices, also can be Apple products.The dock includes a 3.5mm stereo out connector which supports digital audio, providing better sound quality to enjoy movies or music.The dock includes two 2600mah capacity lithium batteries, so it can work as a power bank and charge your phone on the go. It can even support an HDMI connection without being plugged in.While the main device must be a Samsung, you can also connect an Apple, HTC, or LG device using the USB ports. You can charge these devices, or even read pictures off them on the main mobile, and display them on the HD monitor.The internal batteries are protected by a PCB, so when the batteries are fully charged, they won’t continue to receive power, and thus wear out.The dock is very convenient, and can be used without removing the case.  The micro USB port insert is flexible, allowing the device to move around while plugged in without being damaged.  The dock is made with environmentally sustainable material. The shell is made with ABS and PC, and all parts comply with Rohs.  The dock will be CE and FCC certified.Compatible Devices:Main Functions: Samsung mobile phone or tablet with Android 4.2.2 or above and MHL/OTG functions. Includes S3, S4, S5 Note 2, note 3 and Note 4USB OTG/Charging: All mobile devices or tablets with USB connectivity.Timeline:  1.Indiegogo Campaign will end on Feb 25th  2.Production will begin on Feb 26th  3.Quality control will continue throughout the production process  4.First batch products will be finished in Early April, and all rewards will be shipped by the end of April.Our process:We’ve been working on this dock for over two years, and we now have a fully functioning product ready for mass production. At first, our idea was to make a dock that can use HDMI and OTG at the same time. It was difficult to get this to work, as whenever the HDMI was used, the USB ports didn’t work, and vice versa. We never gave up, and we’ve finally worked out the problem and created a functional dock.We also wanted to create a device that was easy to use, and could be used anywhere without being plugged in. We decided to combine the dock with a power bank so that you can charge your phone and have it connected to an HD monitor without having to deal with power cables. We spent a long time trying to get the functions to work and charge fast enough with any device, and finally created a great product that meets all our goals.Why We Need You:We’ve worked very hard to make an amazing smart dock, and are now ready for mass production. We need funds from you to mass produce our dock, so that we can bring it to the market. We also know the Indiegogo community has a lot of great ideas, and would love to hear your feedback on how to make this product even better.We wanted to create the most convenient universal hub for all your electronic devices. We hope you’ll join us in our mission.Production Process:Product Development: We’ve spent two years creating this product, and making sure that it functions exactly the way he hoped. We have a sample prototype which we have tested many times, and are now ready for mass production.Production: We will find some good ODM factories to produce the dock. We will first create samples and then test them, selecting the factories with the best quality.  Quality Control: We will be conducting quality control throughout the production process to make sure that the quality of materials and electronic parts are good. During production, we will have a quality controller there throughout the process, and will check every dock for functionality before packaging.Risks and challengesSuggestions from our backers are very important to us, and we want to implement as many as possible. story:
Introduction:

This campaign is about bringing to life a deep desire to make a mobile charger that is Universal and would provide all the power that is required to charge all types of mobile devices, be it mobile phones, Tablets etc. and to also do it fast. With the eUSBgo, you don’t have to worry about the type of charger to use, whether it will charge your device or how long it will take to charge the device. It’s Universal and packs the power for all devices. Bursting with 3 Amps @ 15 Watts for each USB, it’s a one size fit All Charger.

Features:

The eUSBgo is a dedicated mobile device charger,specifically made for charging your devices across the globe.

  • No limit to how fast your device is charged- Time is money after all.
  • Universal plug connection built in, Travel the world with your charger. No need to fill your bags with several adapter plugs that you can easily misplace.
  • 4 powerful USBs, each charging at 3Amp/15 Watts.
  • USB port shutters to prevent clogging with dirt.
  • Compact - unique design and handy.
  • Charging indicator lights for each USB when used.


eUSBgo vs Others:



Perks:

***Free Micro USB and Lightning Cable combo for all perks!***


Why we need your help?

We believe this product is worth developing and investing in. So at this point we have:

  • Produced the 3D renders to present the idea to you.
  • Produced the Circuit diagram for the USBs and LEDs
  • Sourced and engaged the Manufacturer to make the PCBs and a functional charger without the casing. Update on this coming soon.
  • Identified a reliable logistics partner to bring your perks to you.
  • Already working with a reliable manufacturer with vast experience in the mobile charger market.

Your help is needed to refine the design further, produce 3D printing, further field testing, produce the molds and mass production, Logistics, Certification and shipping. Please support this product and together we can bring the best Mobile device charger to life. Make it happen today.

Challenges:

We have done a lot between idea and product but we are not there yet. As with all product ventures, challenges are expected such as:

  • Production delays and defects etc.
  • Logistics delays etc.
  • Natural causes etc.

This campaign is on flexible funding and but we need the minimum amount requested as this will enable us meet the manufacturer and partake in the testing and quality control processes, which will reduce the Severity of the challenges outlined above. Help fund us today and make this happen. Thank you for your contribution.

story:
Support Basecamp and you will be the first to receive it before anybody else because Indie GoGo perks ship first.

Basecamp is a new charging station for the Apple Watch, iPhone and iPad. It has a LED nightlight, superior hidden cable management, and its own power source -- it does not need to be near a computer to be used.

Your Apple Watch, iPhone and iPad can now all come to rest in one compact space - even away from your computer.

You can now charge 3 different IOS devices with one space saving, sleek stand that looks like Apple could have made it themselves.

Superior cord management and independent power supply keeps your space sharp and clutter-free.

Get even more information at the Basecamp website here

ABOUT THIS PROJECT:

All of the design, 3-D printed prototypes, machine prototypes, moldings and toolings, as well as marketing and supporting materials were completed between May and September 2015 for the original unit (see timeline at bottom). The initial deposit for the first production run of 3,000 units has been made so manufacturing can begin. 

In pre-launch testing, the reaction to Basecamp has been extremely positive from Apple fans.  In fact, just recently we sent one of the initial first final testing units to a top 500 reviewer on Amazon.com, and this is what he wrote in his review for the product:

"I must have looked at 10 or more Apple Watch Charging Stations. I have seen them made of metal & wood. A few have had a slot for my iPhone. However none of them have everything that this Basecamp unit offers."



I'm looking to the Indie GoGo community to help increase my initial production run to 5,000 units or more so I am ready for the Christmas rush. And I am also hoping to raise the money I need to create a second set of toolings for a Deluxe version that includes a bluetooth speaker.

The original version will be ready to ship at the end of November - you'll have it in time for Christmas gift-giving.  When you help me make this campaign a success, the Deluxe version, which includes a bluetooth speaker, will be ready to ship in February.

The bluetooth speaker in the Deluxe version will enable you to sync your Apple Watch, iPhone or iPad while it is docked and charging. For example, listen to music or podcasts while your iPhone charges, or set the alarm on your Apple Watch or iPhone to wake you over the bluetooth speaker. 

The packaging that Basecamp comes is gorgeous too. I can't wait to see some amazing unboxing videos!


Here are the full details and specs of Basecamp:

POWERFUL 3-in-1 CHARGING STATION w/ BUILT-IN LED NIGHTLIGHT: Charges 3 IOS devices in one place (iPhone - iPad – Apple Watch). Its own power makes it independent of your computer or USB wall plug. COMPACT 

SPACE SAVING & CLUTTER FREE: No more unsightly tangled cables and devices. Fits beautifully in limited spaces, including by your bed, or on a desk, dresser, end table or kitchen counter. WELL-BALANCED with A+ 

CORD MANAGEMENT: Sturdy and heavy enough it won’t tip over like cheap stands. No dangling cables either with Basecamp. The bottom compartment hides 2 lightning cables (1m + 2m).

NOT ALL CHARGING STATIONS ARE CREATED EQUAL: Smart, sleek zinc alloy design looks like Apple could have made it. It has its own power cord so you never have to plug or unplug another cable or outlet. 

COMPATIBLE WITH NON-APPLE DEVICES: 3 silicon adapters secure any IOS or Android smartphone or tablet on the stand’s end base. Please note cables, iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch are not included.

Actual size: 4 7/8 W x 4 7/8 T x 2 1/4 D

COMPATIBLE WITH:

•  - iPhone 5, 5c, 5s, 6, 6+, 6s, 6s+ 

•  - iPad, iPad Pro, iPad Air & iPad Mini 

•  - 38mm & 42mm - any band size 

•  - Samsung Phones & Tablets - Kindle Reader



MAIN FEATURES:

•  Can adjust intensity on dimmable touch sensor on the built in nightlight.

•  Made of electroplated zinc alloy. It's sturdy, lightweight, and doesn't easily tip. It comes with protective silicon feet to keep it in place.

•  Bottom cover screws off with a small Phillips screwdriver (not included) to reveal extraordinary cable management.

•  Back channel hides your Apple Watch cable. An exterior rapid charging 5V 2.5amp port can charge any USB device, including tablets.

•  Apple Watch cradle is at 45 degrees. The phone cradle holds most phones in their case, including Otterbox, Defender and Lifeproof.

•  Your Apple Watch charger stays in the stand. The circular recess is compatible with both the 38mm and 42mm magnetic charger.

•  The Deluxe version includes a bluetooth speaker built in to the unit.


Please note cables are not included. It is designed to work with your original IOS USB charging cables.

Apple Watch, iPhone, iPad & Apple lightning USB cables shown for demonstration. Apple, Apple Watch, iPhone & iPad are registered trademarks of Apple, Inc.

From Concept to Reality:

Original CAD design from May 2015:


One of first 3D prints when developing and testing:


During tooling, we discovered we needed to make some slight modifications:


Actual photo of unit - not a rendering:


Photo of the back of the final testing unit:



TIMELINE:

May 2015 -  concept and CAD design work

June 2015 - 4 sets of 3D prints and testing done

July 2015 - package design and first 1-off working protypes

August 2015 - another round of prototypes and final tooling begins

September 2015 - tooling finished and modifications made to LED light

October 2015 - manufacturing on Original begins

November 2015 - freight arrives by air from Hong Kong to USA

December 2015 - Original backers receive their order before Christmas

February 2016 - Deluxe version ships


Production and Delivery Timeline:

For the standard unit:

We have already completed all moldings and have approved all the prototypes and first production units. 

Actual production begins in mid-October (first 3,000 units), and is expected to take three weeks. We have already paid for all the toolings and the deposit on the first order.

We will then be flying the units to the USA via air cargo from Hong Kong, and should have them by before the end of November to immediately ship to all backers with plenty of time to have them all delivered before Christmas.

For the Deluxe Unit (the one with bluetooth speaker):

We are still finalizing the modifications to add the bluetooth speaker. We have to change some of the toolings and then test everything. This version is not expected to be available until early February.

story:
Made by VogDUO, this series includes an AirPods Pro Genuine Leather Case and a Premium Leather iPhone 12 stand. Both designs are focused on convenience but also provide excellent protection to your AirPods Pro and iPhone respectively. 

The first of the series is the AirPods Pro Genuine Leather Case. AirPods are often too small to be found when needed. VogDUO brings more to the overall design which not only makes it secured enough but light weight enough for everyday carry. It makes the AirPods Pro feel barely-there around you. Taking out the Airpods Pro from the case is also super convenient, all you have to do is just push from the bottom of the leather case. We design, We produce, We deliver, We are trying to deliver our passion to the users in the best way of shipping directly.

The VogDUO Leather iPhone 12 stand, on the other hand, is just 0.1 inches thick. This stand is a DIY solution that you can use anywhere on the go. In only two steps, you can prop your phone to a level that’s comfortable for you. This way, you can get on with your work but still have your phone within view.

Compatibility: iPhone 6- iPhone 12 Pro Max/ Samsung Galaxy/ Google Pixel/ Sony Xperia and more.

First, the iPhone 12 stand provides a permanent home for your phone, so you never misplace it. Its leather material cushions your device to avoid any scratches. Plus, measuring just 0.1 inches thick, it won't take up much room on your desk or even bag. You can also use the stand to hold your phone while you watch videos and always have your screen within view. Another must-have is the Airpods Pro Case, which offers protection for your earbuds and also uses leather to remain durable when you're on the go. In fact, you can clip this case to you to keep your earbuds close and avoid losing them.

Since 1997, the products VogDUO created has earned the brand a reputation for designing humanized and unique consumer electronics. Their previous products, such as the VogDUO ultra-thin wall charger, stylish high-power car charger, and compact PD power bank, became a massive hit for the electronic industry over the past few years, including Amazon, Newegg, Indiegogo, and more.

Today, the brand aims to break through the existing framework and expand designs for a broader life experience with everyday lifestyle creations. Their designs not only look good but also serve as convenient everyday items you can easily carry them on the go. 

VogDUO’s leather sourcing process is quite intense and unique. Hundreds of trials, molding, and positioning models are applied to the design process. The leather used is vegetable-tanned and obtained with natural materials. The raw hides and skins are tanned using traditional methods to avoid heavy metal pollution.

By combining the 3D modeling and printing technology, VogDUO tries to break through the traditional design methods and bring the preciseness into every detail and form.

Putting the products into practice testing is also an essential part of the design process. The tests include a 200cm dropping test, 500 times of bending test, 1000 times of button buckling tests, and 500 times of pulling tests. 

The leather with natural texture matures over time with different owners, location, usage, and weather. In the way of becoming tenderer, darker, and flexible. Since this product is made of genuine leather, it is possible that all items have their unique textures and may be slightly different from the official website images.

Like every electronic product VogDUO has made over the years, the new leather products’ manufacturing process goes through tons of critical conditions, including the optimization in dyeing, hand-stitching, braiding, leather carving, laser engraving and more.

Please Note: The Engraving Service can be purchased in the post-campaign Email.

Unlike the electronic products, each leather product is identical and has its features of toughness; therefore, it has to be made by handcrafting. It takes time and lots of effort to maintain its best conditions in every step.

 

]

 

Our team comes from a wide range of professional backgrounds including exquisite leather craftsmanship, leading-edge electronic design, and deep-level- development about the add-on to life experience. 

We are not just designers of consumer electronic products but also an explorer for a better life-experience. 

We create practical things; we believe that every little thing in your handbag should have a practical use. VogDUO is a brand of lifestyle. We strive to beautify the daily life accessories and upgrade life experiences for both staying at home and going outdoors. 

VogDUO was born out of a shared passion for good design and well-made products. Disenchanted by the nondescript, mass-produced plastic that filled the mobile accessories market, VogDUO sets out to offer a stylish alternative for the modern individual. With the finest materials, functional design, and considered details, VogDUO creates products with personality, that enhance the way you live with your daily life technologies. In response to the need for a better lifestyle in the modern 21-century, VogDUO endeavors continuously and relentlessly in creating more products for our users to make the use of technology products more complete and elegant. From high-tech to boutique, every product is made out of the most exquisite and uncompromising technique in technology and craftsmanship. As the use time of mailable products increases, more genuine products of VogDUO will bring you a more comfortable living experience.

Thank you for your support! Please back us and share our project to make these accessories a cult favorite for the modern generation.

How to Back Us

  1. Simply click Back This Project in the top right-hand corner
     
  2. Select your Reward and Pledge
     

Thank you for backing us :)

Shortly after the project ends, we will send you a survey asking for your Reward details [model, color etc.]

Risks and challenges

Like all new projects, there are always risks and challenges. We know from experience it takes a lot of planning, hard work and perseverance to successfully launch a new product. The team is confident we have taken the right steps to mitigate risks such as shipment delays, product defects or supplier reliability. Over the past year we have been prototyping, testing and refining to make sure the final product we deliver to our backers far exceeds expectations. The team at VogDUO will update you regularly on progress. If there are any issues, we promise to communicate with you every step of the way.

The VogDUO Leather iPhone 12 stand, on the other hand, is just 0.1 inches thick. This stand is a DIY solution that you can use anywhere on the go. In only two steps, you can prop your phone to a level that’s comfortable for you. This way, you can get on with your work but still have your phone within view.Compatibility: iPhone 6- iPhone 12 Pro Max/ Samsung Galaxy/ Google Pixel/ Sony Xperia and more.First, the iPhone 12 stand provides a permanent home for your phone, so you never misplace it. Its leather material cushions your device to avoid any scratches. Plus, measuring just 0.1 inches thick, it won't take up much room on your desk or even bag. You can also use the stand to hold your phone while you watch videos and always have your screen within view. Another must-have is the Airpods Pro Case, which offers protection for your earbuds and also uses leather to remain durable when you're on the go. In fact, you can clip this case to you to keep your earbuds close and avoid losing them.Since 1997, the products VogDUO created has earned the brand a reputation for designing humanized and unique consumer electronics. Their previous products, such as the VogDUO ultra-thin wall charger, stylish high-power car charger, and compact PD power bank, became a massive hit for the electronic industry over the past few years, including Amazon, Newegg, Indiegogo, and more.Today, the brand aims to break through the existing framework and expand designs for a broader life experience with everyday lifestyle creations. Their designs not only look good but also serve as convenient everyday items you can easily carry them on the go. VogDUO’s leather sourcing process is quite intense and unique. Hundreds of trials, molding, and positioning models are applied to the design process. The leather used is vegetable-tanned and obtained with natural materials. The raw hides and skins are tanned using traditional methods to avoid heavy metal pollution.By combining the 3D modeling and printing technology, VogDUO tries to break through the traditional design methods and bring the preciseness into every detail and form.Putting the products into practice testing is also an essential part of the design process. The tests include a 200cm dropping test, 500 times of bending test, 1000 times of button buckling tests, and 500 times of pulling tests. The leather with natural texture matures over time with different owners, location, usage, and weather. In the way of becoming tenderer, darker, and flexible. Since this product is made of genuine leather, it is possible that all items have their unique textures and may be slightly different from the official website images.Like every electronic product VogDUO has made over the years, the new leather products’ manufacturing process goes through tons of critical conditions, including the optimization in dyeing, hand-stitching, braiding, leather carving, laser engraving and more.Please Note: The Engraving Service can be purchased in the post-campaign Email.Unlike the electronic products, each leather product is identical and has its features of toughness; therefore, it has to be made by handcrafting. It takes time and lots of effort to maintain its best conditions in every step. ] Our team comes from a wide range of professional backgrounds including exquisite leather craftsmanship, leading-edge electronic design, and deep-level- development about the add-on to life experience. We are not just designers of consumer electronic products but also an explorer for a better life-experience. We create practical things; we believe that every little thing in your handbag should have a practical use. VogDUO is a brand of lifestyle. We strive to beautify the daily life accessories and upgrade life experiences for both staying at home and going outdoors. VogDUO was born out of a shared passion for good design and well-made products. Disenchanted by the nondescript, mass-produced plastic that filled the mobile accessories market, VogDUO sets out to offer a stylish alternative for the modern individual. With the finest materials, functional design, and considered details, VogDUO creates products with personality, that enhance the way you live with your daily life technologies. In response to the need for a better lifestyle in the modern 21-century, VogDUO endeavors continuously and relentlessly in creating more products for our users to make the use of technology products more complete and elegant. From high-tech to boutique, every product is made out of the most exquisite and uncompromising technique in technology and craftsmanship. As the use time of mailable products increases, more genuine products of VogDUO will bring you a more comfortable living experience.Thank you for your support! Please back us and share our project to make these accessories a cult favorite for the modern generation.How to Back Us
Simply click Back This Project in the top right-hand corner 
Select your Reward and Pledge 
Thank you for backing us :)Shortly after the project ends, we will send you a survey asking for your Reward details [model, color etc.]Risks and challengesLike all new projects, there are always risks and challenges. We know from experience it takes a lot of planning, hard work and perseverance to successfully launch a new product. The team is confident we have taken the right steps to mitigate risks such as shipment delays, product defects or supplier reliability. Over the past year we have been prototyping, testing and refining to make sure the final product we deliver to our backers far exceeds expectations. The team at VogDUO will update you regularly on progress. If there are any issues, we promise to communicate with you every step of the way.

story:
No matter how advanced mobile phones become, they still can't compete with plain old paper for reading and handwriting. The E-Pad is an Android Tablet that aims to bridge the gap by offering digital convenience with a truly paper-like experience. 

E-Pad makes note taking and reading a pleasure. It mimics the experience of reading and writing on paper. Jotting down notes, signing papers or making notations on documents is smooth and natural using the included stylus or simply a finger.

But E-Pad is more than just a powerful notepad and digital reader. It supports Wi-Fi and is also 4G compatible which lets you stay connected virtually anywhere. It is equipped with the advanced Android system, allowing you to download all your favorite apps. And with a 10-core processor, it has low latency and the power to run the latest apps and quickly browse image heavy news and websites.  

 

 

  • Hands-On Review

 

 

Check this E-Pad test from Youtube Channel Mobile Tech Review, E-Pad is reviewed by Lisa, the great and famous technology enthusiast from the United States. Thanks so much for her awesome work! 

 

 

E-Pad with a 10.3” Carta screen is perfect for reading any type of document and kinds of literature. E-Ink display reflects light like real paper, letting you read for hours without eyes fatigue. 

 

  •  All Formats Supported | Read without limitation 

 

 

E-Pad is designed as the perfect document viewer with full compatibility with all common file formats including: pdf, djvu, epub, mobi, doc, docm, docx, azw, azw3, fb2, fbz, html, odt, prc, rtf, sxw, trc, txt, chm.

It also has support for image and audio formats: jpg, png, bmp, tiff, cbr, cbz, mp3, wav, that are common on news sites, blogs and other websites. 

 

  •  Powerful Reading System | Have your books & marks organized

 

 

When you read with E-Pad, you’ll find this reading system is incredibly convenient and make your life more efficient. You can save or screenshot any annotations for capture ideas while on-the-go and search any handwriting notes or typed texts to avoid you got messy in the bulk notes. Besides, allowing you to adjust page arrangement and screen contrast, E-Pad will meet your reading preference. 

 

  •  10.3" Mobius Carta Screen | Bigger screen, Higher resolution

 

 

The Carta display is designed to closely mimic the appearance of real paper, including surface friction when writing. The screen uses the latest E-Ink technology – a based TFT that is flexible, lightweight and durable. This new E-Ink display has an incredibly high definition and optimum contrast that reflects light like real paper, letting you read for hours without eye strain.

 

 

E-Pad gives you an authentic pen-to-paper note-taking experience, the surface tension is similar to real paper and with its convenient digital features, it will totally replace your notebooks, printouts, and documents. This groundbreaking device changes how people work.

 

  •  New Writing Experience | No need for pen and paper anymore 

 

 

Enjoy unlimited annotation and document mark-up on any file. You can make notes as easily as a paper notepad. Enjoy the efficiency of instant notes for work, school or creativity. 

 

  •  Handwriting Search & Store | Never lose your idea again

 

 

E-Pad can convert your handwritten note to typed text, making the notes easy to refine and share. No matter whether your notes are diagrams, formulas or simply words, they can be transferred quickly. 

Search, sync and share any notes for your work, study or entertainment, all your files are always handy. All notes can be searched, you will never lose your ideas-including the ones you write down by hand. Everything you put in the third party/PC is automatically synced across your E-Pad.

 

  •  Sketching Your Brilliant Artwork | Digitalize all your sketches

E-Pad stylus pen responds to the pressure of your hand precisely, the stroke widens as you press more firmly. It will give you superior control to create very artistic images and text, just like you would on a sheet of paper.

E-Pad allows you to use various pages formats while you are taking notes, you can even insert an image and polish it.  

 

 

We have received a great amount of attention, inquiries, and questions since we first told the world about E-Pad . In this case, we think you would like to learn more about the difference between E-Pad and other E-Ink devices.
 

  •  4G Network, Keep Connected | The world‘s first E-Ink tablet with 4G connectivity 

Other E-Readers and E-Ink tablets lack support for SIM cards or cellular data, leaving you limited by Wi-Fi only network connections. That makes them impractical for work, travel, or study on the go. With E-Pad, you can enjoy high-speed 4G data connectivity and stay connected anytime and anywhere. Your work, study, email or reading can continue as you move from home to school or office. Simply insert a SIM card and you’ve got data anywhere. E-Pad is fast, friendly and efficient. 

 

  •  Best Company For Writer | Support Bluetooth keyboard, earbuds, speaker

If you do any serious business or schoolwork on your phone or tablet, you know that typing on a screen can be a bit frustrating. E-Pad adds convenience and enhanced typing capabilities with support for Bluetooth keyboards. Connect seamlessly and type faster and more comfortably. 

 

  •  Android 7.0 | Allows you to download apps from Google play store

 

 

Using the E-Pad as a tablet is simple through the full support of Google's Play framework, including the Google Play store. This means that you can install virtually any Android application. Android system also offers better compatibility for third-party applications. You can download apps according to your personal needs and make E-Pad your personalized tablet!

 

  •  Ten-Core Processor with 2GB RAM | Faster running speed

 

Push the performance envelope with a powerful 10-core processor and 2 GB of random access memory to handle large documents and memory heavy apps. The speedy processor means that websites and programs load fast and smooth. Enjoy reading, writing, news and surfing with ease on the E-Pad. 

When documents get large and more storage is desired, you can easily add up to 32 GB of memory with TF card support. Download and store large books or collections without worry. 

 

  •  Speaker Enabled 

 

 

Play video/music with the built-in speakers or connect wirelessly to any Bluetooth enabled earbuds/speaker. 

 

  • More Than 20 Days of Standby Time

 

 

E-Pad is designed for active lifestyles and is made to go anywhere you go. A full battery charge will result in about 1 week of use or 4 weeks of standby time. 

 

  •  Dual Touch Control System 

 

 

E-Pad has Dual Touch technology that helps you manage your E-Pad with ease and convenience. Use your finger with capacitive touch for quick notes or sketching or use the included Wacom stylus for writing, document mark-up or detailed drawing. The smooth action of the screen makes writing effortless no matter which method you prefer.  

 

  • Stylus Pen with Eraser

The advanced Wacom stylus makes writing simple and precise. Write, draw or sketch and if you make a mistake don’t worry, the stylus has an erasure feature built in that works just like a pencil eraser. Simply turn over the stylus and correct your work.

story:
The Dongle Dangler is back—now in color!

After the huge success of the Dongle Dangler, we are back by popular demand and we have something exciting to share—color.

The Problem

Apple and Google removed the headphone jack.

Apple removed the headphone jack from the iPhone 8 and X, and appears to have no plan to go back.

Google, just released the Pixel-2 without a headphone jack.

Apple and Google include a headphone audio adapter (dongle) with each phone.

The problem is that the dongle is hard to keep track of and easy to lose.

Apple includes a headphone audio adapter (dongle) with each phone.

.

Google Pixel 2 headphone adapter dongle

The Solution

The Dongle Dangler. Still the perfect solution to a problem that still shouldn't exist.

Now you can dangle your dongle in color.

Use the Dongle Dangler to attach the iPhone and Pixel dongle to your keychain, backpack, or lanyard and have it with you wherever you go. Never be without your music again!

The Dongle Dangler 2.0 is now available in black, silver, gold, and rose gold.

Dongle Dangler 2.0 is made to match your iPhone and Pixel.

This Dongle Dangler is made of same material as the iPhone and Pixel—aerospace-grade aluminum, making it 75% of the weight as the original Dongle Dangler.

This Dongle Dangler has the same finish as the iPhone and Pixel—hard anodized treatment, creating a rich color and durable surface.

Dongle Dangler 2.0 is made to get attention.

This Dongle Dangler is refined—the same precision machined, tight fitting snap but smaller, sleeker, and to the point.

This Dongle Dangler has the mark of quality—the laser etched logo confirms that your using the original dongle dangling device.

 

What color will you choose?

Can't wait till January? Get the original Dongle Dangler on Amazon here!
