Get the original Dongle Dangler on Amazon here!

story:
GOODBYE CABLES, HELLO ONYXX!

Charging your smartphone without cables? Hell Yes!

FAST charging using the Onyxx Qi wireless standard with 10W of power to your phone.

We developed Onyxx also to be outdoor friendly so take it with you on your outdoor excursions and be safe as the Device is water/splash and dust Resistant.

 

        

 

BUILT FOR OUTDOORS

We aimed our Onyxx to accommodate users with an active lifestyle but also anyone who needs that additional juice in their everyday activities.

We tested our prototypes and got very positive results in terms of water/splash and dust resistant seal covering major ports.

 

 

MEDIA TALKS ONYXX

 

*AppleInsider.com article

The Onyxx Wireless Charging pad utilizes Qi Inductive Charging Technology that eliminates the need to fumble with charging cables each time you want to charge your device.

Perfect for at home or the office. The dedicated charging stand is always at the ready, providing wireless power whenever you set your device on the stand. 

The device also holds USB and USB Type-C.

 

 

COMPARISON CHART

 

SPECS

Onyxx Power Bank supplies 5,000 mAh of power, enough to provide a full charge for your devices. Dual USB ports enable two electronic devices to be connected and charged simultaneously, with plenty of juice for smartphones, tablets, and other devices. Make sure your electronic arsenal is always ready when you are.

Featuring world-class lithium-polymer technology, our Power Bank is surprisingly lightweight and easy to tote. A multitude of safety features prevents overcharging and overheating, removing the anxiety of travelling with your favourite gadgets.

At the airport or in the great outdoors, never again worry about straying too far from an electrical outlet.

 

 

WATER AND DUST RESISTANT HOUSING

 

RUBBERIZED HOUSING

 

BONUS

Your smartphone does not have wireless charging feature? ONYXX comes with a Cable Type C USB to have you covered, so you can still take advantage of all the elegance of this device. 

 

TIMELINE

 

 

PROTOTYPE

 

THE ONYXX CORE TEAM

We are a small New York-based team of Entrepreneurs, Designers, and Engineers working on Qi technology-based products. Established in 2017, we are working on a range of products improving the everyday experience while using smart devices.

We believe that user should not be affected by the environment he or she is in while communicating or working. Onyxx is among first devices we are bringing to the market.

 

GET SOCIAL. FIND US ON

     

 

- Risks & Challenges

Our team members delivered Kickstarter funded products already and we are confident with our vendors to deliver a perfect Onyxx. There are always challenges involved with every new product development, we believe our team member's skills and experience will adjust to any unforeseen obstacle.

story:
Click here - http://bit.ly/2Wn9cV7

Cab drivers, adventure seekers, and anyone else who uses a smartphone – the mobile holder of your dreams is here. Whatever makes you happy, you should be able to do it knowing that your device is going to be safe at the end of the day. Forget about keeping your smartphone in your pocket or leaving it in your glove box; when you have iFreqs, you will always have access to all your apps and messages – without risking damaged cases or cracked screens.

Cracked screens out to be a thing of the past. We know that better mobile holders are possible, and yet by and large, the old way of doing things persists. There is no reason for this! The technology that we have integrated into iFreqs is going to change the way that people think about their smartphone security and integrity.

. We are so confident in our product that we have covered it with a 12-month warranty – just one more step we are taking toward giving you the peace of mind you deserve.

iFreqs represents the next generation of mobile holders. Using innovative technology, iFreqs is the sturdy and stylish mobile holder that you have been waiting for. This mobile holder features rebound mechanical design technology and a robotic arm with triangulated brackets to maintain a constant, firm grip on your device. You can even rotate your device 360 degrees when it is in iFreqs, and we have designed it with your convenience in mind, leaving a clear opening for you to connect your charger.

. We are so confident in our product that we have covered it with a 12-month warranty – just one more step we are taking toward giving you the peace of mind you deserve.

Robotic arm design will never allow the mobile device to fall or slip.Mounting the device and removing can be made in one hand while driving.Provision for charging port allows easy charging on the go.Tilt and rotate.The last and final phone holder every car traveler needs.Travel with Technology™

Patented triangle bearing brackets leads adapt to rugged mountain roads,speed bumps,sharp turn etc.The last and final phone holder every traveler needs.Travel with Technology™

 

Rebound design allows the phone to adjust automatically during shake,sudden impact and eliminate the slips and the fall. Removing the phone from the holder and placing it back while driving is easy.Travel with Technology™

Thanks to rotating design tilting at every possible angle and rotating the phone to 360 degree according to viewers preference is possible...Travel with Technology™

Patented triangle bearing brackets leads adapt to rugged mountain roads,speed bumps,sharp turn etc.The last and final phone holder every traveler needs.Travel with Technology™

Spring back brackets powered by resilience mechanical structure allows easy insertion and removal of phones on the go..Travel with Technology™

High quality ABS material and aluminum alloy never allows deformation due to temperature color fading..Travel with Technology™

Thick silicon pad at the bottom reinforced friction prevents the phone from slipping and scratching ..Travel with Technology™

This mount is adjustable for best phone viewing angle and access. Precisely adjust the phone holder using the 360° pivoting ball joint to get a clear & comfortable view..Travel with Technology™

This mount is adjustable for best phone viewing angle and access. Precisely adjust the phone holder using the 360° pivoting ball joint to get a clear & comfortable view..Travel with Technology™

Rich black and Igloo white color, suits well for different phone colors..Travel with Technology™

 

 
 
 

 

Targeting at the top tier functions, specifications and user experience, iFreqs sits on the price which no other brands can compete with - Unfortunately, the price is for our Indiegogo backers only.

The phone cradle is designed for phones up to 6.9” in screen size and the arms have an inner adjustment range of 48–94 mm / 1.9”–3.7” .Travel with Technology™

 

We want to be the most efficient crowdfunding campaigner by fulfilling your contributions in a month. We need your support to make the project successful.

 

Right now, we have come to you, Indiegogo, for help raising the funds that we need to manufacture, market, and distribute iFreqs on a large scale. Our goal through this campaign is to put together $5000, which will cover all our operational costs in the near future and enable us to bring our cutting-edge mobile holder to a global audience. To show our appreciation for your support, we are offering iFreqs at a significant discount exclusively through this campaign.

iFreqs is a team with a mission to change the way things work.

Because we have already put product through extensive testing and analysis, there is minimal risk to what we need to do next. We have planned this launch to exhaustion, and we are confident that people are going to love using our mobile holder just as much as we do. If any logistical challenges arise during the distribution or marketing phases, we will figure out a way forward, just as we always do, following through on our plans and bringing our idea to life.

Crowdfunding offers a great opportunity to give an insight behind the scenes of a product. It is really important to us that we can show our supporters what is actually possible with Mobile holders. We have gone a long way developing the best quality and creating a Mobile holders that covers all your needs. Now we need your support to start the production. We have done a lot of tests and prototyping — now we are ready!

We are extremely grateful for the support we’ve received from our crowdfunding community. We love what we do, and it's you that make it all possible.

Our estimated shipping date is early August 2019. You will automatically see the shipping rate per country once you make your pledge. Products will be shipped from the United States. Domestic transit will be 3-5 days with international transit time of 7-21 days depending on your location. Backers from other countries may see VAT or import charges depending on their local regulations, which is not built into the shipping costs. All tracking numbers will be sent within 24 hours of your order being sent.

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION

Our prices DO NOT include VAT, GST or other country taxes.

Our terms of sale for international orders are FOB destination. This means that you pay all freight and duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through indiegogo.

If you would like to estimate your duties, you can use this online tool (remember to convert the U.S. dollars to your local currency):

https://www.simplyduty.com/import-calculator/

For international customers who are required to pay customs, you will receive an email from your local customs authorities asking for payment to have your order processed through customs. Unfortunately, there is no legal way around customs (including marking an order as a gift, which we cannot do). Once you make that payment to the customs broker your order will be processed for final delivery.

SHIPPING POLICY

It is critical that you enter your correct, valid address when placing your order. If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't get it because you’re not there, wrong address or moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package.

 

In addition to making a monetary contribution, you can show your support for what we are doing by sharing a link to this campaign on any social media platforms you use. Facebook, Instagram, Twitter: get the word out about iFreqs and the revolutionary mobile holder technology that we have to offer. All your contributions, both monetary and non-monetary, mean the world to us. We thank you for your time and support!

We'd also like to announce the IFREQS referral program. Help spread the word and we'll reward you with a free IFREQS Mobile Holder!

The Rules are Simple:

Log into your Indiegogo account and copy your unique sharing referral link.

Share your unique sharing referral link with your friends via email, social media, or word-of-mouth, and ask them to join us by placing an order on Indiegogo. A successful referral is only counted if someone pre-orders a IFREQS Mobile Holder perk via your link.  

You’ll receive a FREE IFREQS Mobile Holder when you collect 5 successful referrals!

WHO:

You must be a backer on Indiegogo to qualify. Each backer has a unique Indiegogo ID and unique referral URL.

HOW:

Log in to Indiegogo. Then, visit our campaign page on Indiegogo and look to the right of the main video to share using Indiegogo’s share tools.

How to Track Your Results:

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  2. Click on your username beside the search box at the top right of the page.
  3. Select the “My Profile” option.
  4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
  5. See the number of funders and your total referred contribution amount

MORE REFERRAL REWARDS

iFreqs, Inc. It is a group of designers, engineers and innovators who are looking for new ways to make everyday life easier. The products we create enable people to work with ease and comfort. We want to drive the products forward and bring the next generation of useful gadgets.

Our goal was to create a minimal but iconic design. We focused on providing a consumer solution which doesn't exist in the market today. We stressed the fact that the best technology is one that feels invisible.

contact us-  info@iFreqs.com

visit us - www.ifreqs.com

Whatever makes you happy, you should be able to do it knowing that your device is going to be safe at the end of the day. Forget about keeping your smartphone in your pocket or leaving it in your glove box; when you have iFreqs, you will always have access to all your apps and messages – without risking damaged cases or cracked screens.
Cracked screens out to be a thing of the past. We know that better mobile holders are possible, and yet by and large, the old way of doing things persists. There is no reason for this! The technology that we have integrated into iFreqs is going to change the way that people think about their smartphone security and integrity.
. We are so confident in our product that we have covered it with a 12-month warranty – just one more step we are taking toward giving you the peace of mind you deserve.


iFreqs represents the next generation of mobile holders. Using innovative technology, iFreqs is the sturdy and stylish mobile holder that you have been waiting for. This mobile holder features rebound mechanical design technology and a robotic arm with triangulated brackets to maintain a constant, firm grip on your device. You can even rotate your device 360 degrees when it is in iFreqs, and we have designed it with your convenience in mind, leaving a clear opening for you to connect your charger.
. We are so confident in our product that we have covered it with a 12-month warranty – just one more step we are taking toward giving you the peace of mind you deserve.

Spring back brackets powered by resilience mechanical structure allows easy insertion and removal of phones on the go..Travel with Technology™

Thick silicon pad at the bottom reinforced friction prevents the phone from slipping and scratching ..Travel with Technology™

story:
Short Summary

In modern society, people are feeling disconnected, lonely, and misunderstood. Current dating applications are largely superficial in their matching which leads people to waste time on bad dates and bad relationships and losing hope in love altogether. As a result, TypeMatch seeks to revolutionize the realm of dating apps by matching individuals based on the 16 personality types of the MBTI in order to connect them with someone that fits with their personality like a yin and yang relationship.

In order to determine personality type and find a person’s perfect match, we have developed a unique test and algorithm. TypeMatch then matches individuals with complementary yet different personalities by showing the most compatible matches first, thus being a more efficient and effective way to use dating apps. Because people often struggle to describe themselves in their profiles, the app provides a list of descriptions by personality type that users can post on their profiles. Users with the same personality type can customize their descriptions by choosing the options that represent them best. This leaves other customizable fields to further express their individuality. Finally, TypeMatch provides many benefits to its gold users, one of which is dating and flirting advice that is specific to the personality type of the person they're interested in.

App Features

Free Basic Membership:

TypeMatch is free to use and includes the following features:

  • Sign up with email, Facebook, or Twitter
  • Accurate personality test based on 16 MBTI personality types
  • Personality description to learn about yourself
  • Personality description options to post on your profile
  • Unique bio fields
  • Religion and political belief fields that are not a limited set of options
  • Open to all genders and sexual orientations
  • Block and report users for safety
  • Matches based on the compatibility of personality types
  • Most compatible matches shown first
  • Show or hide age on profile
  • Set search age range and distance
  • Fields for occupation, education, height, and personality type

Gold Membership:

A gold membership costs around $10 and includes all the basic features plus the following features:

  • See who likes you without a match
  • Direct message without a match
  • Advice for dating and flirting based on personality type
  • Search different locations
  • Undo last swipe
  • Send pictures in the chat

Vote!

Before we start the development of the app, we want to make sure there is enough interest in the market. Please place a yes vote for the app by donating $1 to show your interest.

Help Fund!

Funding for the product will go to the development of the application and marketing and advertising costs. Development is estimated to cost $20,000 and an additional $5000 is needed for initial marketing and advertising initiatives to get the app off the ground and generate as large of a user base as possible so that people have many potential matches. Even if the goals are not met, funds will be used for development costs. Not meeting goals will cause the application roll-out to be slower and smaller scale but we are dedicated to releasing it to the public

The Vision

We recognize that individuals are complex and cannot be defined completely by a set of 16 personality types. However, personality type provides a frame and a system which can be used to understand our nature and the nature of others. Compatible personality types account for that natural spark and deep connection people feel with someone even though they’ve just met. TypeMatch’s goal is to make this feeling easier to find by creating a system whereby people can identify and match with people who complement them. For many people with rare personality types, it can be particularly difficult to find someone who understands them and clicks with them, and so TypeMatch wants to help. When two people have highly compatible personalities, they can feel like someone finally understands them and that they can be completely themselves. In a perfect match, each one’s weaknesses are the other’s strengths, and so they can count on each other to have each other’s backs. The two make each other stronger, help each other grow, and communicate more effortlessly. TypeMatch seeks to help people achieve this level of love and understanding. The ultimate goal of TypeMatch is to relieve some of the suffering of the world by matching people who can understand and connect with each other so that they can build strong and healthy relationships for the future.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Help us get the word out by telling your friends and family!
  • Share our IndieGoGo page on social media
  • Follow us on Instagram, Facebook, or Twitter (@typematch) and share our posts

story:
Cut the Cord. Charge
Everything Wirelessly.

 

WIRELESSLY CHARGE YOUR PHONE AND POWER BANK AT THE SAME TIME - WITHOUT THOSE MESSY CABLES

 

THE WORLD'S FIRST POWER BANK THAT CHARGES PHONE AND POWER BANK - 100% WIRELESSLY

 

 

RECENTLY FEATURED IN:

 

THE ONLY ALL-IN-ONE CHARGING SOLUTION WITH 100% WIRELESS CHARGING 

An entirely unique wireless charging system that replaces multiple products with an elegant compact design for a fraction of the cost. No competitor does what WiBa can. 

 

2-IN-1 STACKABLE CHARGING

You can charge with WiBa by placing your phone  directly on the pad, or by stacking your phone and the WiBa power bank to charge both.

Charge your phone and the WiBa power bank at the same time!

Stack the power bank on the charging pad and your phone on the bank to charge both at the same time. Charge your Qi device and power bank 100% wirelessly. USB output for additional device charging.

With a full charge, you can take the power bank on the go, for power anywhere you are!

No need to worry if you’ll have enough to last all day. WiBa has enough power for 1-2 full charges of your smartphone or tablet.

 

Carry your Qi-enabled smartphone and charger comfortably in one hand.

 

METAL PLATE FOR STRONG MAGNETIC HOLD

Use the optional anti-slip plate to keep your phone magnetically attached to the power bank. 

With the 2 complimentary extra thin plates (Silver and Black), your phone stays securely attached for a better wireless charging experience.





 

CASE COMPATIBLE

WiBa's metal plates integrate seamlessly with phone cases of all sizes, securing your phone to the power bank while you're on-the-go. The plates even work through thick cases (up to 3mm), such as the OtterBox Defender Series.

 

GOODBYE CABLES. SAY HELLO TO WIBA, YOUR ULTIMATE WIRELESS CHARGING SOLUTION

The thin, sleek, and portable design of WiBa makes it possible to put the power bank and phone in your pocket without any added bulk. 

Secure your phone to the power bank charging wirelessly while you're on-the-go with the WiBa's complimentary thin metal plate.

 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX

Every WiBa pre-order comes with:

 

 

WIBA EARLY TESTER REVIEW


 

DESIGNED FOR ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES

 

DEVICES COMPATIBILITIES

WiBa Stackable 2-in-1 Wireless Charging System is compatible with Qi wireless charging equipped devices and all USB powered devices.

  • Apple iPhone: 8, 8 Plus, X
  • Samsung Galaxy: S9, S9+, Note 8, S8, S8+, S7, S7 Edge, Note 5, S6, S6 Edge
  • LG: V30, G6 (US version only), G4 (optional), G3 (optional)
  • Microsoft Lumia: 1520, 1020, 930, 929, 928, 920
  • Google Nexus: 4, 5, 6, 7 (2013)
  • BlackBerry: Priv
  • All other devices using the Qi-wireless charging standard

 

WIBA FROM THE BEGINNING

Built with craftsmanship from the ground up, WiBa perfectly represents just how far technology has come.

 

At Avido, we dare to challenge what’s possible. Our team is just like you - power hungry and constantly on-the-go. We know how important it is to keep your mobile life moving, and we work tirelessly to create products that do just this.

Based in Washington, D.C., our products are designed in the USA and we have 100% USA-based customer support. We’ve dedicated ourselves to create products that not only look great but are also functional and durable. With years of experience, Avido has become an award-winning company with retail sales around the world.

For us, launching on Indiegogo isn’t just a milestone, it’s motivation to keep moving forward. We are proud to introduce our latest product and can’t wait for you to enjoy it.

 


 


 

 

WE ARE ON TRACK TO DELIVER

 

SHIPPING

We are able to ship WiBa to the United States (US FREE shipping), Australia, Canada, Germany, Japan, United Kingdom, France, Netherlands, Switzerland, Brazil, Denmark, Italy, Spain, Sweden, Austria, Belgium, Chile, Czech Republic, Ireland, Mexico, and Norway. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

We have a very capable supply chain team and a logistics plan in place. While unlikely, component delays and shortages could occur. If this happens, we will be sure to keep you informed and do everything we can to solve the problem as quickly as possible.

 

WiBa will begin shipping in July 2018*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.
     
*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

 

By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first products off the line plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations
of the product.

 

#GetWiBaGoWireless

Toss your faulty cables - go wireless with WiBa. Sharing is caring, Help WiBa spread the word.

 



 

MEDIA KIT

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

ABOUT

What is WiBa?    
WiBa is a next generation 100% wireless power bank. For the first time, you can simultaneously charge your phone and power bank for a truly wireless experience. 

Why are you crowdfunding?    
Crowdfunding allows us to bring WiBa to market in the quickest and most efficient way possible.

 

FEATURES, SPECS & SETUP

What is the uniqueness of the technology? 
WiBa creates a better charging experience.
Up until now, power banks have been held back by wires. WiBa takes wireless technology to the next level. There are no cords to mess with, no tangles, and most importantly, no hassles. 

How does it work? 
Place your power bank on the charging dock and your power bank begins to charge. Then, place your Qi-enabled wireless charging phone on top of the power bank. You’ll wake up in the morning with a fully charged phone and power bank, all without plugging in a cable. 

Can I stack WiBa’s to charge more than one at a time?    
WiBa power bank can only charge by placing it on the included charging dock, or by the traditional method of plugging in a USB-C cable (included).

Can I use WiBa with a phone case?    
You shouldn’t have an issue charging your phone while it’s secured in its case, as long as it's the case is not thicker than 3mm. Please note that metal cases are not compatible with wireless charging. 

 

SAFETY & REGULATION

What certifications do you have?
WiBa will be tested to meet at a minimum UN38.3, CE, and RoHS.

 

SHIPPING

When does shipping begin?    
WiBa will begin shipping in July 2018. Orders will be shipped sequentially.

Which countries will WiBa ship to?    
We are able to ship WiBa to the United States (US FREE shipping), Australia, Canada, Germany, Japan, United Kingdom, France, Netherlands, Switzerland, Brazil, Denmark, Italy, Spain, Sweden, Austria, Belgium, Chile, Czech Republic, Ireland, Mexico, and Norway. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

What type of AC adapter is included?    
WiBa includes a Quick Charge 3.0 AC adapter. The AC adapter will be a Type A plug style (used in the USA, Canada, Mexico, and Japan). Note: For international buyers, an adapter for international plugs may be required (not included).

Does WiBa charge Apple watch?    
WiBa only works with standard Qi charging devices. The Apple Watch has a version of Qi so only specifically designed devices work with it.

Can I stack WiBa's to charge more than one at a time?    
WiBa power bank can only charge by placing it on the included charging pad, or by the traditional method of plugging in a USB-C cable (included).

 

CUSTOMER SERVICE

What is your refund policy?    
Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point, we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.

What is your return/exchange policy?    
Return and exchange are processed on a case-by-case basis. If you find your WiBa defective and unable to operate as expected, please contact support@avidopower.com,  We will get back to you timely with complimentary technical support.

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

  • Customer Support: support@avidopower.com
  • Press Contact: media@avidopower.com
  • Sales Contact: sales@avidopower.com
  • Other Inquiries: info@avidopower.com

No competitor does what WiBa can.  2-IN-1 STACKABLE CHARGINGYou can charge with WiBa by placing your phone  directly on the pad, or by stacking your phone and the WiBa power bank to charge both.Charge your phone and the WiBa power bank at the same time!Stack the power bank on the charging pad and your phone on the bank to charge both at the same time. Charge your Qi device and power bank 100% wirelessly. USB output for additional device charging.With a full charge, you can take the power bank on the go, for power anywhere you are!No need to worry if you’ll have enough to last all day. WiBa has enough power for 1-2 full charges of your smartphone or tablet. Carry your Qi-enabled smartphone and charger comfortably in one hand. METAL PLATE FOR STRONG MAGNETIC HOLD
Use the optional anti-slip plate to keep your phone magnetically attached to the power bank. With the 2 complimentary extra thin plates (Silver and Black), your phone stays securely attached for a better wireless charging experience. CASE COMPATIBLEWiBa's metal plates integrate seamlessly with phone cases of all sizes, securing your phone to the power bank while you're on-the-go. The plates even work through thick cases (up to 3mm), such as the OtterBox Defender Series. GOODBYE CABLES. SAY HELLO TO WIBA, YOUR ULTIMATE WIRELESS CHARGING SOLUTIONThe thin, sleek, and portable design of WiBa makes it possible to put the power bank and phone in your pocket without any added bulk. Secure your phone to the power bank charging wirelessly while you're on-the-go with the WiBa's complimentary thin metal plate. WHAT'S IN THE BOXEvery WiBa pre-order comes with:  WIBA EARLY TESTER REVIEW DESIGNED FOR ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES DEVICES COMPATIBILITIESWiBa Stackable 2-in-1 Wireless Charging System is compatible with Qi wireless charging equipped devices and all USB powered devices.
Apple iPhone: 8, 8 Plus, X
Samsung Galaxy: S9, S9+, Note 8, S8, S8+, S7, S7 Edge, Note 5, S6, S6 Edge
LG: V30, G6 (US version only), G4 (optional), G3 (optional)
Microsoft Lumia: 1520, 1020, 930, 929, 928, 920
Google Nexus: 4, 5, 6, 7 (2013)
BlackBerry: Priv
All other devices using the Qi-wireless charging standard
 WIBA FROM THE BEGINNINGBuilt with craftsmanship from the ground up, WiBa perfectly represents just how far technology has come. At Avido, we dare to challenge what’s possible. Our team is just like you - power hungry and constantly on-the-go. We know how important it is to keep your mobile life moving, and we work tirelessly to create products that do just this.Based in Washington, D.C., our products are designed in the USA and we have 100% USA-based customer support. We’ve dedicated ourselves to create products that not only look great but are also functional and durable. With years of experience, Avido has become an award-winning company with retail sales around the world.For us, launching on Indiegogo isn’t just a milestone, it’s motivation to keep moving forward. We are proud to introduce our latest product and can’t wait for you to enjoy it.    WE ARE ON TRACK TO DELIVER SHIPPINGWe are able to ship WiBa to the United States (US FREE shipping), Australia, Canada, Germany, Japan, United Kingdom, France, Netherlands, Switzerland, Brazil, Denmark, Italy, Spain, Sweden, Austria, Belgium, Chile, Czech Republic, Ireland, Mexico, and Norway. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.We have a very capable supply chain team and a logistics plan in place. While unlikely, component delays and shortages could occur. If this happens, we will be sure to keep you informed and do everything we can to solve the problem as quickly as possible. WiBa will begin shipping in July 2018*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.     *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date. By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first products off the line plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generationsof the product. #GetWiBaGoWirelessToss your faulty cables - go wireless with WiBa. Sharing is caring, Help WiBa spread the word.  MEDIA KIT FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONSABOUTWhat is WiBa?    WiBa is a next generation 100% wireless power bank. For the first time, you can simultaneously charge your phone and power bank for a truly wireless experience. Why are you crowdfunding?    Crowdfunding allows us to bring WiBa to market in the quickest and most efficient way possible. FEATURES, SPECS & SETUPWhat is the uniqueness of the technology? WiBa creates a better charging experience.Up until now, power banks have been held back by wires. WiBa takes wireless technology to the next level. There are no cords to mess with, no tangles, and most importantly, no hassles. How does it work? Place your power bank on the charging dock and your power bank begins to charge. Then, place your Qi-enabled wireless charging phone on top of the power bank. You’ll wake up in the morning with a fully charged phone and power bank, all without plugging in a cable. Can I stack WiBa’s to charge more than one at a time?    WiBa power bank can only charge by placing it on the included charging dock, or by the traditional method of plugging in a USB-C cable (included).Can I use WiBa with a phone case?    You shouldn’t have an issue charging your phone while it’s secured in its case, as long as it's the case is not thicker than 3mm. Please note that metal cases are not compatible with wireless charging.  SAFETY & REGULATIONWhat certifications do you have?WiBa will be tested to meet at a minimum UN38.3, CE, and RoHS. SHIPPINGWhen does shipping begin?    WiBa will begin shipping in July 2018. Orders will be shipped sequentially.Which countries will WiBa ship to?    We are able to ship WiBa to the United States (US FREE shipping), Australia, Canada, Germany, Japan, United Kingdom, France, Netherlands, Switzerland, Brazil, Denmark, Italy, Spain, Sweden, Austria, Belgium, Chile, Czech Republic, Ireland, Mexico, and Norway. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.What type of AC adapter is included?    WiBa includes a Quick Charge 3.0 AC adapter. The AC adapter will be a Type A plug style (used in the USA, Canada, Mexico, and Japan). Note: For international buyers, an adapter for international plugs may be required (not included).Does WiBa charge Apple watch?    WiBa only works with standard Qi charging devices. The Apple Watch has a version of Qi so only specifically designed devices work with it.Can I stack WiBa's to charge more than one at a time?    WiBa power bank can only charge by placing it on the included charging pad, or by the traditional method of plugging in a USB-C cable (included). CUSTOMER SERVICEWhat is your refund policy?    Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point, we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.What is your return/exchange policy?    Return and exchange are processed on a case-by-case basis. If you find your WiBa defective and unable to operate as expected, please contact support@avidopower.com,  We will get back to you timely with complimentary technical support.If I have other questions, who should I contact?
Customer Support: support@avidopower.com

Press Contact: media@avidopower.com

Sales Contact: sales@avidopower.com

Other Inquiries: info@avidopower.com

story:
Manage your content using voice commands, publishing it in real-time to the web, mobile devices and Facebook.



The VoiceAssisted Hybrid Apps are a range of web based applications that are accessible via the web, mobile devices, Facebook Apps and Facebook Tab Apps attached to your Facebook Business Page.

The VoiceAssisted technology not only allows you to upload your latest content using your voice whilst at home, in the office or on the move; but it also provides your visitors with assistance whilst browsing your application and using its features. 

VoiceAssisted Hybrid Apps provide a unique experience for visitors and users using the latest Speech Synthesis technology . Using the TechBubble GUI you can quickly personalize your Hybrid App, having it speak to visitors and guide them around the areas of the app.                                                                                                                                     



To businesses VoiceAssisted Hybrid Apps will allow their team to become more efficient, if you run a company blog, photo gallery, store and other online systems on your website, you will know that the time it takes to write down all of the information, spell check, upload and share is very consuming. Imagine a system where you could just speak to it and it would do all of the work for, that is one of the main features of VoiceAssisted Apps. Imagine you are a busy shop or takeaway and you have to constantly go to your computer, accept orders, read and write support messages, take payments as well as having to get the orders ready. VoiceAssisted Hybrid Apps take the admin away from you, notifying you of new orders by voice, helping you process the orders and sending notifications to your waiting clients on your command.



VoiceAssisted Hybrid Apps will help your users and visitors to the app by making it easy for them to navigate your application by providing the ability for them to simply speak to your app  and issue voice commands about what they are looking for or wish to do. Another primary aim of the VoiceAssisted features is to help people that have reading difficulties or people that are not used to using the internet by making your content more accessible. The sad truth is that although technology has advanced rapidly over the last few years, there is still many people that feel like they cannot use the internet due to lack of experience, I want the internet to be accessible by everyone, people of all ages should be able to benefit from the services found on the net, and this is one of the reasons that VoiceAssisted Apps were developed.


The core of the TechBubble platform is the TechBubble GUI, a centralized online operating system that has been designed to become the hub of all of your online activity, book keeping, staff management, budgeting and connected Internet of Things devices. The GUI is powered by TOA, the TechBubble Online Assistant,  who provides you with a personal assistant while managing your business. You can manually input data and content to the system or you can speak to TOA using her voice recognition functions and let her do all of the work for you.   As the GUI is a web based system and also Hybrid, it can be accessed on the web, mobile devices and even from within Facebook, meaning where you are and whatever you are doing you can manage your systems.                                                                                                                      

TOA is the TechBubble OnlineAssistant who acts as an online guide with the aim of making your life easier and your business more productive. TOA has two levels of access and features:   

FRONT END FEATURES: On the front end she has the capability to offer navigational assistance, directing users around the various pages and systems of the Hybrid App; the ability to read blog articles, product details and photo descriptions; and to provide community notifications to TechBubble Community Users. 

BACK END FEATURES: On the back end in the TechBubble GUI TOA has the capability of internet related commands such as Google, Facebook and Twitter search, as well as general commands such as telling the current time and even uploading content to the blog, store and photo gallery by interpreting voice commands issued by users.                                                                                                               


 


The idea was conceived for the platform over ten years ago when I first began to work on my own as web developer. The idea behind the platform was to develop a system that would automate the day to day tasks required to run my business allowing me to focus on customer service and researching new techniques. Over the years the platform has had many different names and got to different stages. The stage I am at now is plugging all of those different features together into one platform. 

HYBRID APPS: Currently I have store, blog, photo gallery, projects gallery. video gallery and audio gallery systems ready. Some of these systems have basic VoiceAssisted functionality integrated into them but more work needs to be done to perfect both the systems themselves and the VoiceAssisted integration.

TOA: Previously TOA was a natural linguistics program which could work out what people were saying to her and then calculate the closest answer to respond with. A few months ago I removed this feature as it needed a lot more work being done to it and replaced it with a new system that recognizes only certain phrases and executes the relevant command due to what has been said. I will soon be beginning to improve the original natural linguistics program and re integrating it with the exiting system which will create a more human like personal assistant that will understand more about general work related conversation and tasks. There is still a lot of integration and testing to be done with the existing TOA system, tuning up the usability of her features for visitors on Hybrid Apps and making her more efficient, quicker at responding and more recognition phrases. Another issue that needs to be addressed is that currently TOA has different voices depending on which browser you use and also the voice recognition features will only work in Google Chrome. These issues will be fixed by integrating more advanced recognition and voice synthesis software.

GUI: The main section of the GUI where users will manage their account is pretty much complete. Users will be able to update their account details and manage their support tickets and billing via this section. Most of this part of the GUI is integrated with VoiceAssisted functions allowing easy navigation and helpful information about using the GUI on request. I am currently in process of updating existing Hybrid App control panels to work with the new platform and integrating VoiceAssisted functions into them. You can see an example of the above to features in the TOA In Action videos above. The next stage is to integrate the features from the last few years which will allow me to reproduce these systems very quickly as the process will be automated and carried out by TOA. Once this is in place I can begin to bring the prices down and be able to produce more systems per day.

COMMUNITY: The foundations are in place for a community that is designed to bridge the gap between developers and the general public. Over the years I have come to realize that the gap between the general public and well known tech companies is pretty large and most people are not aware of security issues, new technology and innovation. The bridge between the general public and unknown developers that are striving to bring life changing technology to light is even greater and many developers are slowly drowning, this community plans to bring news, projects and products of both known companies and lone developers to help increase the chances of innovation growth and also to help educate the world with important information to ease the transition into the automated and connected era.



Android / iOS & Windows Apps: One of the future steps will be to create an Android, iOS and Windows  app for the TechBubble Platform. The option for clients to have Android / iOS & Windows Apps will also be available.

The Internet Of Things: As mentioned in the video and earlier on, the control of online systems is only the first stage of the planned features for the TechBubble GUI. The goal is to create a centralized control panel where users can manage every part of their business and home life. Currently there is one IoT project that is almost complete named TASS, the TechBubble Assisted Security System. This system integrates an IoT security device which monitors proximity, sound and light in its vicinity and users can monitor and control the board using the VoiceAssisted GUI. Many more devices are in development and some of the funds from this campaign will go towards the required parts to build the initial prototypes. The whole concept is a system that you can control wherever you are, your office will know when you are getting near and turn on your lights and heating, you will walk in and speak to your computer and listen as she updates you with your emails, latest sales reports etc.

The platform is the bigger picture. Every feature that is mentioned in this campaign and many more will create the Platform of Everyting, think of it like a department store where you will be able to find everything and anything related to modern technology and security. Currently the platform includes the following: 

(More info below this section)

Modern Technology, Security & Innovation Blog: A place to help people learn about modern technology and innovation and how to use it safely to enhance their capabilities.

Modern Technology, Security & Innovation Store: A place where you will be able to purchase the latest in modern innovating technology products ranging from social media and web systems to the Internet of Things, 3D Printing and Artificial Intelligence.

Modern Technology, Security & Innovation Gallery: A place where you will be able to find photos of the latest modern technology and innovation.

Modern Technology, Security & Innovation Community: A place where developers of all types can connect with the general public and promote their projects, news and products as well provide support and information to the general public that will them learn about technology.

TechBubble GUI: The place where users and developers will manage every feature of the TechBubble Platform and their connected businesses.

The Technology & Innovation Community:

The TechBubble Modern Technology, Security & Innovation Community is a new feature to the TechBubble Platform of Everything which allows developers, techs and businesses to upload their projects, news and products to share with community users. Content added to these areas also builds up the content of the TechBubble blog and store, making sure that everyone keeps up to date with the latest technologies that are emerging and have an easy way to purchase them. The main reason for me creating this feature is that I know how hard it is as a developer to find support and exposure for projects. A lot of my programming life has been a very steep uphill struggle and a very lonely one. I want to provide a community that bridges the gap between the general public and developers.  A place that helps developers build and market their projects on low budgets, provides a place for lone developers to meet others that are going through the same struggles, and a place where the general public can learn about new innovations and help support the developers through the development and launch of their projects.


The Technology & Innovation Blog:

The world is evolving, and most people have no idea of the massive changes that technology is making to the world around us. With so many disruptive technologies evolving, soon the way we live and do business will have completely changed leaving a lot of people in state of confusion and maybe even poverty. I want to help people learn about modern technology and how to use it safely so that when the changes hit main stream, people and businesses will be able to adapt rather than struggle. The Modern Technology, Security and Innovation Blog is the place where I keep people up to date with what is going on. It will also feature the latest content from developers and companies that use the community helping to increase awareness and provide support. Features have been implemented that allow users to use voice commands to navigate/search the blog and also hear the contents of the blog rather than read them making it easier for less experienced internet users or people with reading difficulties.


Although a lot of the foundation work is done and the prototypes are almost complete for a small part of the VoiceAssisted range, there is still a lot more that needs doing. There is more development to be done to complete the full range of VoiceAssisted Applications, expenses required to keep the platform running, marketing, equipment and software, security implementation and Android/iOS & Windows applications to be created. As it is at the moment I am working all day everyday and most the way through the nights to keep up with promotion for the blog, research for the blog content, new features that enhance the usability of the platform  and development time to complete the social network and all community features. Without your help it will be impossible for me to keep up with all this work and support myself and the platform.

You will be one of the first in the world to receive a bespoke VoiceAssisted Hybrid App, you will be able to stand out from the crowd with your own, unique voice controlled and assisted system that is accessible on the web, mobile devices, Facebook Apps and Facebook Apps for Pages. Check out the amazing perks available through this campaign below and choose one of them from the list to the right of this campaign,



If my campaign is successful in reaching target the funds gained will allow me to pay server costs, purchase software required to enhance the features of the platform and Hybrid apps, purchase more advanced security helping to ensure the platform and apps stay secure, purchase a Mac to allow me to create the iOS version of the platform and integrated apps, purchase the software and hardware that is required to get the IoT products to beta stages, pay for marketing, and allow me to support myself and the expenses of developing and running the platform.  This will allow me to dedicate all of my time to completing, testing and expanding the platform and all of the related products. If I receive funding similar to the amounts I have seen on the Indiegogo platform, then I will be looking for an office and taking the steps to create the company that I envisioned over ten years ago. My dream is to build a more connected and secure world, the only reason I am working on my own is that I have never had the funds to expand. My ultimate goal is to create a company that provides the best tech at affordable prices meaning everyone will be able to afford it. I want to create jobs and build an advanced team that covers all aspects of technology from social media and web development, to home automation and robotics.


Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone will be able to donate or invest in the campaign, but there are still ways that you can help me to meet or beat the target. Please help by sharing this campaign with your friends on social media networks such as Facebook or Twitter, the more people that see this campaign the higher chance it has of reaching target. You can also use the share features on Indiegogo to the top left of the campaign. To everyone that helps spread the word thank you for taking the time do so. Every contribution to this campaign whether money or sharing will really help.

Features have been implemented that allow users to use voice commands to navigate/search the blog and also hear the contents of the blog rather than read them making it easier for less experienced internet users or people with reading difficulties.







Although a lot of the foundation work is done and the prototypes are almost complete for a small part of the VoiceAssisted range, there is still a lot more that needs doing. There is more development to be done to complete the full range of VoiceAssisted Applications, expenses required to keep the platform running, marketing, equipment and software, security implementation and Android/iOS & Windows applications to be created. As it is at the moment I am working all day everyday and most the way through the nights to keep up with promotion for the blog, research for the blog content, new features that enhance the usability of the platform  and development time to complete the social network and all community features. Without your help it will be impossible for me to keep up with all this work and support myself and the platform.
You will be one of the first in the world to receive a bespoke VoiceAssisted Hybrid App, you will be able to stand out from the crowd with your own, unique voice controlled and assisted system that is accessible on the web, mobile devices, Facebook Apps and Facebook Apps for Pages. Check out the amazing perks available through this campaign below and choose one of them from the list to the right of this campaign,





If my campaign is successful in reaching target the funds gained will allow me to pay server costs, purchase software required to enhance the features of the platform and Hybrid apps, purchase more advanced security helping to ensure the platform and apps stay secure, purchase a Mac to allow me to create the iOS version of the platform and integrated apps, purchase the software and hardware that is required to get the IoT products to beta stages, pay for marketing, and allow me to support myself and the expenses of developing and running the platform.  This will allow me to dedicate all of my time to completing, testing and expanding the platform and all of the related products. If I receive funding similar to the amounts I have seen on the Indiegogo platform, then I will be looking for an office and taking the steps to create the company that I envisioned over ten years ago. My dream is to build a more connected and secure world, the only reason I am working on my own is that I have never had the funds to expand. My ultimate goal is to create a company that provides the best tech at affordable prices meaning everyone will be able to afford it. I want to create jobs and build an advanced team that covers all aspects of technology from social media and web development, to home automation and robotics.
Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone will be able to donate or invest in the campaign, but there are still ways that you can help me to meet or beat the target. Please help by sharing this campaign with your friends on social media networks such as Facebook or Twitter, the more people that see this campaign the higher chance it has of reaching target. You can also use the share features on Indiegogo to the top left of the campaign. To everyone that helps spread the word thank you for taking the time do so. Every contribution to this campaign whether money or sharing will really help.

story:
Short Summary

Help us fund an effective election campaign to get the Green message out in Dumfriesshire, Clydesdale and Tweeddale (DCT). Support Jody Jamieson's campaign against David Mundell.  Say no to austerity and the Tory politics of greed.

A Green MP in Westminster will work for:

  • A rejection of TTIP, the trade agreement which would open our NHS to privatisation by US corporations
  • Safeguards for public services
  • Sustain energy not unconventional gas.
  • A Living Wage now, rising to at least £10 by 2020
  • Public ownership of our railways

Unlike some parties we are not funded by large donations from wealthy landowners or by trade union donation. Anything you can give is appreciated and will be used to maximise the Green vote in DCT:

  • £15 will pay for 1500 campaign cards
  • £50 funds a a venue booking for a meet the candidate event
  • £100 printing 1000 fliers

Jody is an excellent candidate who has campaigned hard on issues such as the People's NHS campaign He opposes austerity, cuts, and in-work poverty. He understands that vital public services are just that – vital – and we need political parties like the Greens who are determined to protect them.

Realistically DCT will be a hard seat for the Greens to win, but we know that our message is a popular one when people can hear it. Campaigning in DCT will let more people hear a Green voice and help raise our support base for the future.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't donate? You can support the campaign on social media or help out with stalls and leafletting. Get in touch by emailing borders@scottishgreens.org.uk

story:
TeleQueer™ will be a 24/7 online TV station that offers queer programming directly on your computer, mobile device or existing TV.

The shift to online content is happening now, and TeleQueer™ will be one of the only stations world-wide to showcase queer programming that appeals to the whole LGBTQ community – and beyond.

It's time to showcase the diversity of our community. TeleQueer™ is the perfect opportunity for queer film-makers and content producers to showcase work that isn't seen in the mainstream market.  TeleQueer™ will also produce its own unique programming including talk shows, interviews, live event coverage, and much more.

We'll deliver the best in online Lesbian, Gay, Bi, Trans, and Queer content, all curated in two 24/7 streaming channels.

For about the price of a latte per month, you can enjoy quality lifestyle programming, adult entertainment, arts and cultural coverage and more from the comfort of your computer or mobile device. You'll also be able to watch TeleQueer™ on your existing TV using an inexpensive adapter (apx. $59.99).

TeleQueer™: Channel 1

On TeleQueer™, you'll enjoy unlimited access to 24/7 streaming content (online and through your existing TV) as well as free access to all pay-per-view content for just $4.95/mo.

Your scene will be seen on TeleQueer™ – from the best local parties to the finest queer indie films, from behind-the-scenes access with queer talent to insightful talk shows – we've got you covered. Your TeleQueer™ Subscription also includes full access to TeleQueer Adult™.

TeleQueer Adult™: Channel 2

Your access to TeleQueer Adult™ is included with your subscription to TeleQueer™. Watch some of the hottest Queer adult content online, delivered 24/7 on a separate streaming channel. You'll have full access to quality adult content ranging from soft-core to hard-core Gay, Lesbian, Trans, Bi, and Fetish videos.

Your subscription to just one channel for only $4.95 is well worth the price, but you get 2 quality queer channels for the price of one. This is a better value than any other cable TV or online station in existence anywhere!


THE PITCH

We need your help. We need at least $125,000 to launch TeleQueer™. $115,000 goes to producing and purchasing the best queer content and paying our team. We also need $10,000 for administrative costs – that money goes to web development and the legal expenses of starting up two new TV stations.

Once we have our full ask of $125,000 – our initial start up costs – we can launch TeleQueer™ within three months. From there, we expect membership fees and advertising to cover our costs. Anything over $125,000 will just make our content better, ensuring the ongoing success of TeleQueer™.

TeleQueer™ is a go – no matter what. If we can't make our full ask of $125,000, we're still going to launch the best possible on-line queer content at the best possible subscription prices.


COMMUNITY

TeleQueer™ is an empowering opportunity for queer artists wherever there's Internet.

With increasing global Internet accessibility and new technology that connects our station to your existing TV, TeleQueer™ can be among the first to bring relevant, curated LGBTQ content to queer people world-wide. Not only that, but TeleQueer™ will support upcoming and undiscovered queer video and filmmakers by purchasing content directly from the source wherever possible, as well as by making screen time for never-before-seen queer talent. We'll celebrate and showcase queer culture world-wide.

story:
Now available for shipping in September - version 1.1 for iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, and Samsung S6

Accidents can happen at work, home; even trips to the beach, bar, or bathroom, can result in a DEAD phone.

Protect Your iPhone 6, 6 Plus, and Samsung S6 from every day life in Dead Proof cases - the only waterproof cases with breathable Nano membrane covers that allow air molecules through for clear phone calls.

Accident-proof, kid-proof, work-proof, kitchen-proof, dust-proof, everything-proof it with the Heavy Duty and Toughest IP68 Certified cases from Riyo Tech.  Enjoy it no matter where and in whatever weather conditions.  

Protect it every day but if you want to change the case for a different look, easily remove it in seconds with no need for tools.

Only Riyo Tech iPhone 6, 6 Plus, and Samsung S6 cases come with Protection Guaranteed For Life* because they are built TOUGH to withstand what life throws at you.  *Exclusive for backers of this campaign.

Dead Proof cases are better than other waterproof cases because (short version):

  • Heavy duty airtight gasket and bumpers inside/outside offer deepest waterproof and highest drop protection
  • Specially formulated screenguard covers 100% of the display (including the Touch ID) and is extra sensitive for fast response
  • Exclusive breathable membrane covers provide best talk quality
  • Easy tool free installation or removal of the phone

Our patented design is better than other cases because of (long version):

  • Real IP68 Testing and Certification by an independent lab to stay waterproof up to 33 feet (10 meters).  Others claim to be IP68 certified, but It's so expensive that they can't sell enough $20 cases to pay for it. 
  • The only protective case Guarantee For Life to stay waterproof.
  • Specially formulated screen guard never cracks and is molded to fit the shape of the Touch ID sensor.

  • Most responsive Touch ID and touch screen = fastest performance with no delays.

  • Only Dead Proof cases have Breathable Nano membrane covers for the microphone and speaker to allow air molecules through for clear and loud sound on both ends.  Other cases use common materials in a box design,

  • Fully functional buttons and industrial design with kickstand.  There's even an attachment point for a hand strap.

  • Easy in/out with just 4 hand screws (no tools needed) when you feel like a different look.  
  • Internal silicone seal and shock absorbers protect your phone from OMG accidents and survive 6 foot Drop Tests.

  •  Tough industrial look and feel instead of pretty, flimsy thin look.  Yet still available in 6 fashionable colors.

Samsung Galaxy S6 (no S6 Edge)

Net Weight: 130g
Dimensions: 16.5x9.17x1.84 cm 

Size Matters

Dead Proof cases are designed and built to feel and be solid.  From the beginning in 2014, we knew what our cases should look like.  We waited to see what other cases lacked, and made sure that our materials and features were better than the rest.  We also had to wait for our IP68 certification and patent application to be granted in April 2015.

From drawing to Prototype to Engineering samples to:  

  • Submission for Patent - granted April 24, 2015
  • Submission for IP68 Certification - granted April 27, 2015
  • Kickstarter campaign for iPhone 6, 6 Plus June 2015
  • Purchase/receive materials - July 2015
  • Start production - August 2015
  • Added version 1.1, and also Samsung S6 - August 2015
  • Indiegogo campaign for Samsung S6, iPhone 6, 6 Plus - August 2015
  • Ship to backers - September 2015

Perks (6 color choices)

Samsung Galaxy S6 Case (retail $85)

  • Early Bird $36
  • Indiegogo $39 (Single), $75 (2 Pack), $105 (3 Pack)

iPhone 6 Case (retail $85)

  • Early Bird $36
  • Indiegogo $39 (Single), $75 (2 Pack), $105 (3 Pack)

iPhone 6 Plus Case (retail $95)

  • Early Bird $44
  • Indiegogo $47 (Single), $92 (2 Pack), $133 (3 Pack)

Own a hotel, resort, tour company, anything near water, sand, or FUN?  We have packages for you to rent or sell DEAD Proof cases to your grateful clients.  

Requests for wholesale or bulk prices, media review samples, etc.; please email info@riyotech.com.

Protection Guaranteed For Life - for as long as you own your phone, we will repair or replace your Riyo Tech case if it fails to stay waterproof (damages excluded).  Only for backers of this campaign!

Risks and challenges

Unlike other campaign creators, we ARE the factory for other companies. After making products under other brands, we are finally ready to launch our own designs. There will not be long delays because of "subcontractor factory issues" or "design redos".

Our Indiegogo campaign goals are:

*Raise funds to increase our materials purchase size to lower our cost
*Introduce Samsung Galaxy S6 case model
*Introduce iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus version 1.1 case models

story:
Your touchscreen is giving you a dirty look!

 

Touchscreens are bigger and brighter than ever but there's still one thing that will never change ... all those gross, oily, finger smudges! That's why we developed the CleanCard!!
CleanCard is a standardized card backed with microfiber and a super sleek screen cleaning machine.  
The CleanCard is a perfect fit for your on the go lifestyle.  The standard size card fits conveniently in your wallet, purse, bag,  pocket or carrying case  - so it's always within reach and won't wind up lost when you need it most unlike other microfiber cloths.  CleanCard keeps your touchscreens looking and feeling like new!

Microfiber reinvented

The only product like it on the market! Strong, flexible, reinvented 

microfiber card. Keep your brand in their hand with a custom CleanCard! 

(see perks for custom CleanCard)


Recommended Usage

Our CleanCard microfiber gives touchscreens that refreshed look and like-new-again feel. The CleanCard microfiber will last up to 6 months depending on usage. Use your CleanCard regularly to keep the fresh NEW look and feel on your device(s).

The manufacturer recommended use for this microfiber is around 300-500 uses. If you like to keep your touchscreen clean we recommend replacing your CleanCard every 420 uses or 3-6 months MAX. 

The CleanCard is intended to remove facial oils, make up, dirt and grime from daily touchscreen use.  These contaminants from your touchscreen will collect in the microfiber pad causing it to become less and less effective with use, so its important to keep a fresh CleanCard on hand (try our 3 pack today). 


The CleanCard is the newest, most universal accessory for ALL touchscreen mobile devices around the world.  It is a microfiber-backed plastic card that is used to remove dust, smudges, and fingerprints from any touchscreen device.  Fits easily into wallets, purses, bags, and pockets.

CleanCard marks a great gift for your friends, family, and co-workers. 

(try our 3 pack today!)

Don't let your touchscreen give you a dirty look! 

Business CleanCard

Friends CleanCard 

Social CleanCard

Family Time CleanCard 

Quiet Time CleanCard

Personal Time CleanCard


CLEANSCREENTECH TEAM


Tim and Jeff grew up in the California, San Joaquin Valley, they teamed up to design and create Clean Screen Technologies. Tim and Jeff have been working hard to to bring you unique cleaning products. These quality products are safe for all of your personal touchscreen devices.  CST works with only top quality materials to ensure customer satisfaction. For over a year they have been researching and developing standardized products, our CleanClard brand is the most universal shape and size in the world with many new products in the works. 

Thank you for funding our project and let us know how we can improve the experience. We'd love to hear from you! info@cleanscreentech.com
