story:
Sorry we have closed this campaign down due to an exciting change in direction with our security products. We will be releasing  the new product range onto the market shortly. 


For further information about these great changes. 

   email alan@travelsafeapp.com



TRAVEL SAFE APP
Personal  Safety  and  Security  System for Travellers.
WHY TRAVEL SAFE & SECURITY  SYSTEM?

  

We’ve created a complete personal safety and security system: 

Travel Safe Panic Alarm Wristband activates a 100dB siren with a tap on your wrist and sends an SMS notification to your support list of friends and family & emergency services. 

Travel Safe  Door alarm and luggage alarm with motion sensor, startles intruders with a 100dB siren 

With the world on high alert can you be without The Travel Safe System.

Even hitchhikers can be protected if the driver becomes a problem as the siren will be so loud they will be forced to stop the car by the sound intensity. 

Don’t Travel without one!

Made in the USA and patent-pending, Travel Safe makes your world a safer place


Protect yourself against muggings, burglary, sexual assault, kidnapping and murder while you're abroad - with Travel Safe App.


Travel Safe Wrist Band activated Panic Alarm.

It’s a portable, no-fuss personal security system to keep you safe abroad at home or when you’re out and about. You’ll never travel without it again.

What would you do if you were walking down a dark street, you heard somebody following close behind you and they grabbed at your handbag?

What would you do?

On your way home in the dark a vehicle stops just in front of you. Two men try to abduct you?

What would you do?

When leaving a night club and walking to  your car you notice someone following you.

What would you do?

Walking in the park an attacker moves close behind you and  drags you to the ground?

What would you do?

Your Wristband is always ready even if you are caught offguard. Instantly startling your attackers and activating the 100 dB Siren to alert others you're in danger.

Once activated an  automated SMS sends a signal to your phone contacts and uses your GPS to locate you. 

 Keeping women and travellers safe the world over - you'll never leave home without Travel Safe system again. 

Our siren has been professionally tested to international standards for sound recording methods. ( see our graphic reports )




The wristband works in tandem with the Travel Security Siren, which fits comfortably into the palm of your hand or attaches to your bag, belt.

Siren box doubles as the door alarm and luggage alarm


Travel Security System Door Alarm 

Every traveller’s must-have item.

Nervous about a potential intruder breaking into your hotel room? 

What would you do?

Imagine if you are travelling alone and you have just stepped into the shower and an intruder opens your room door? 

What would you do?

Being robbed or held hostage and belongings stolen?

What would you do?

What if you wanted to have an afternoon sleep in your hotel room and you were worried about the lock on the door not being secure ? 

What would you do?

Are you frightened that someone will come into your room while you are there.

What would you do?

Many thieves will try to gain access to your room and even if you are asleep in your room, it takes them just seconds to disarm the door latch device?

What would you do? 

Will you wake if thieves  silently disarm you door latch ( in seconds ) and quietly enter your room. ?

“Then what happens”?

Solution 

You will startle an intruder with a Powerful 100dB Siren when activated 

 if your room door is opened by just 2 degrees of movement 

·  Easily attaches to door handles, bags, suitcases, briefcases and handbags

·  Activates the Siren if your room door is opened by just 2 degrees of movement 

A warning notification sent via your smartphone with SMS to alert you and your contacts you have nominated to help you.

The small sleek design is about the size of a credit card and fits in the palm of your hand.


          



                                                 Travel Safe App 

                            Keeping travellers safe the world over

How It Works

Travel Safe App comprises a pack of compact, lightweight travel-size security and safety products. An accompanying smartphone app links to some of the products.



WHAT DO YOU THINK OF OUR PRODUCTS? WE'D LOVE TO HEAR YOUR FEEDBACK IN OUR 'COMMENTS' SECTION (NEAR THE VIDEO) or

EMAIL alan@travelsafeapp.com 


TRAVEL SECURITY USB CAMERA WITH MOTION DETECTOR

                                          Free Gift with Perks 

Protect your belongings when you’re away from your room.

Don’t forget to set up your miniature USB camera at an angle facing the door with your bags in full view to record any intrusion while away. 

It is well known that items disappear when you are not in the room. 

The camera starts recording when someone enters your room, saving the footage to your USB stick camera and turns off after all movement stops.

The miniature camera hidden within the USB has an 80 minute recording time and is motion-activated.

Discreet, portable and completely concealed, this is spy cam technology at its best – keeping an eye on your belongings when your not there. 


 




Travel Security Miniature Optical Smoke Detector 

PROTECT yourself while you're sleeping. Would you know if your hostel or resort was on fire? 

Don't make headlines - make sure you get out in time, with this handy (and tiny) smoke detector...

Put this compact, lightweight smoke detector in your suitcase or bags and carry it all over the world with you. Ideal for remote or less developed countries that don’t have stringent smoke detector requirements, this battery operated detector lasts 10 years! Use it as a back-up detector in your home and take it on holidays with you for peace of mind abroad.

The System Designed in Australia and manufactured in the USA 

(patent-pending), 



Travel Security System  makes the world a safer place to explore.

Bushwalking, snow skiing or simply sightseeing in a foreign country? 

This is a very serious feature which could save your life.

What if you have an accident while bushwalking and don’t have a preset emergency system to report in.

It may take hours or weeks to find you and it maybe to late.

Our Time Interval Reporting feature with GPS tracking sends an emergency response if you don’t check in by your pre-set time. 

Store your emergency contact numbers of friends, family and local emergency services wherever you are in the world.

Travel Security Siren, Time Interval Reporting feature will alert your key contacts that you are missing, after your check-in time and grace period has lapsed. 

The Travel Safe App links your personal security devices to your smartphone, giving you complete peace of mind.

Our Story

When entrepreneur Alan Clare learned about young people travelling losing their life staying a in accommodation without fire safety he set out to create a portable, pocket-sized optical smoke detector that was lightweight, small and unsurpassed in terms of quality. And he did.

This triumphant creation prompted Alan to take it further and what followed was the design and creation of the wristband, a luggage and room door alarm, and the USB motion-sensor camera all linked to smartphone app to make a one-stop personal safety and security travel pack - so small it can slip into your carry-on luggage.

Travel Safe App - the world’s first personal miniature travel safety and security system was born.

Award-winning innovation
Did you know, Travel Safe App won second prize at the prestigious Global Startup Battle on the Gold Coast in November 2014?

The Team

  Alan Clare CEO & Co-founder 

Alan is a University of Technology, Sydney graduate, in Marketing and Management and has extensive consultancy experience spanning more than 30 years. As an entrepreneur he has developed a diverse range of products including electronic

control systems, major software data network for member driven systems and Natural Pharmaceutical products. One product is still a market leader decades later. He has worked with many projects using Dr Edward de Bono “Lateral Thinking” teachings when in his early 20s where he promoted Dr de Bono’s thinking in Australia. Alan worked with the UTS Marketing team to design New Product Development programs. His skill set includes all aspects of assembly line manufacturing for short run electronic products.

 Lorraine Clare Co-founder

Lorraine has extensive experience as an executive in the retail sector working with major department stores for over 20 years. She was responsible for many major marketing campaigns during her time with the organization and managed and trained staff. She later ran her own marketing and distribution business focusing on her strength of forecasting market trends.


 Paul McKey, Management Consultant

As a Management Consultant, Paul has worked at the big end of town with the likes of Apple, IBM, BHP Billiton, Energex QLD, Telstra, DVA, AGSVA and Qantas. He is an internationally recognised management consultant and is considered a leader in the field of change management, business innovation, technology, learning and development. Paul works will people as an advisor at all levels including senior executives and boards, mentoring and coaching individuals, teams and entrepreneurs. He is also currently studying a PhD in Organisational Learning with SCU and writing a book on Synergistic Design, Business Development for a Digital Age.

 Dan Swan

Dan has been involved with many successful technology start-ups and listed companies in the US (NASDAQ), UK (FTSE) and Australia (ASX). Dan specializes in understanding scalable enterprise technology platforms, product and business development. As an executive manager this also includes business modelling, sales and marketing which includes a track record for revenue growth parallel with consecutive awards in digital marketing. In addition to graduating with a PhD in Innovation in the Creative Industries, (Dr) Dan has a Masters in Interactive Media (MIM) from UTS in Sydney, together with a BA (Hons) in Sociology from

Ruskin University, Cambridge UK. Dr Dan Swan is the founder of Starinno, the startup accelerator program at Byron Bay.

It’s been a lot of collaboration and hard work from a number of clever minds to bring Travel Safe App to life. Alan, Lorraine, Paul and Dan would like to thank everyone who’s worked on this project including Brandon Preze, James Thomas, Shelby Rosile plus many more.

We Need You!
We’re confident Travel Safe App will help save lives and you can be a part of that quest too! By supporting Travel Safe App through Indigogo, we’ll be able to fund further software, global marketing and distribution and get this life-saving product to market sooner. Ultimately, you’ll be assisting us on our quest to help save lives and keep travellers safe the world over.

Timeline for deliverables



Final hardware design August / September

Final software design September / October

Final app design Android ios September October November

Social Media July to September

Programming September October November

Mechanical Design September October

Test and verification October / November

Delivery schedule December / January 2016

Challenges
We have created something that has never been done before – a safety and security system made specifically for travellers. Like all innovations, we understand there could be some delays beyond our control, but we ensure full transparency should this occur and will endeavor to have your order delivered as quickly as possible. As we advance our design and manufacturing, some specifications may vary slightly from our tested preproduction prototypes, however style and functionality will not be compromised.  

From humble beginnings…
Our product has been a labour of love and like all good inventions, it's evolved during its short lifetime. At the Global Startup Challenge in South-East Queensland, creator Alan Clare submitted a patent application to protect the idea covering a range of smartphone links to fire and safety devices. The task was to design a smartphone app, build a website, create a 90-second promo video and a working smoke detector to trigger the app to sound the alarm - all within 54 hours. The prototype was awarded second place in the Entrepreneur Tract Award.

The progression of the prototype:

   


How you can support us
If you, your family or your friends love travelling – or if you simply love what we’re about and you place a priority on safety – support us by spreading the word and purchasing the Travel Safe App pack. We want to make the world a safer place for everyone to explore, and we want to help save lives in the process.

Want more tech info?

We've put a lot of time and research into our products to ensure we have utilised the best technology.

Comparative sound readings for Panic Button App alarm Vs Travel Safe App alarm.The professional sound readings confirm that smart phone apps are not capable of providing the "Startle Effect" to be a real deterrent from any  potential attacker from behind while walking down the street. 

The instant response of the TSA system of 100 Db when compared with an app is self evident from the graph and considerable delay of accessing a smart phone app at a much lower sound output  makes smart phone apps obeslete.



Travel Safe App Siren is 100 dB - 16 times louder than a standard smartphone alarm!

Findings: The professional sound readings confirm that smart phone apps are not capable of providing the "Startle Effect" to be a real deterrent from any  potential attacker from behind while walking down the street. Most at risk are slight build women or man who could be easily over powered. 

The instant response of the TSA system of 100 Db when compared with app is self evident from the graph and considerable delay of accessing a smart phone app at a lower sound output.


Shipping costs
Please be sure to consider shipping costs when selecting your perk.

FAQ  Have a question about the TSA   email alan@travelsafeapp.com

Your Global Calling Help Network

When you purchase your TSA System you are able to input phone numbers of your support group list of those you wish to be of assistance to you in a trigger event any where in the world. This will  be just a local call.

This will also direct you to information where appropriate regarding the type emergency and directory of globle  emergency listings.

System Running Costs

You may need to charge up the batteries every 3 - 4 weeks when travelling.

 It is expected that the Siren Box rechargeable batteries will likely last as long as the  the smoke detector which has a warranted for 5 years, but expected to last 10 years.

Therefore the cost over ten years would be less $20.00 per year, an insignificant cost.


Travel Safe Testimonials.

SHANE: Shane went to a friend's 40th birthday party and after the event a few of his mates went to a cafe across the road where they had coffee. Shane left to go home but as he walked out  the front of  the cafe, a group of seven guys badly bashed him, broke his jaw and he was rushed to hospital. 

He was  was put into a induced coma on a ventilator with multiple injuries for a week. He was in hospital for several weeks and missed two months of work, as he has his own business it was both financially crippling and physically painful. 

Shane is a tall, fit man with a solid build but was easily downed and left helpless in the street. Shane was rescued by one of this mates who heard the noise, came out of the cafe and the called an ambulance.

Shane has already ordered our Travel Safe App pack and is on the early list to make him more safe and secure. This assault has been fully documented by police and hospital records.

DAVID: David from New York spoke about his sister and brother-inlaw’s experience while travelling in France and staying at a five-star hotel in Paris.

David’s sister woke during the night hearing her husband wandering around in the room but took no notice and drifted off to sleep again. When she awoke, she realised they'd been robbed and in fact it was a burglar in the night, who'd stolen their wallets passports, laptops and jewellery.

She was so shocked that it happened to them, and she now wants to have a TSA system as soon as it is released for future overseas travel.

Details of this event are available to verify the room invasion experienced by David's sister during the night while staying in Paris.

Share your Story 

We would like to hear from you about your experiences while traveling the world.
alan@travelsafeapp.com

Reference (1) 30 % of homes in American have non working smoke detectors due to ageing batteries and faulty smoke detectors.  Wikipedia

Sorry we have closed this campaign down due to an exciting change in direction with our security products. We will be releasing  the new product range onto the market shortly. For further information about these great changes.    email alan@travelsafeapp.comTRAVEL SAFE APP
Personal  Safety  and  Security  System for Travellers.


WHY TRAVEL SAFE & SECURITY  SYSTEM?




  
We’ve created a complete personal safety and security system: 







Travel Safe Panic Alarm Wristband activates a 100dB siren with a tap on your wrist and sends an SMS notification to your support list of friends and family & emergency services. 


Travel Safe  Door alarm and luggage alarm with motion sensor, startles intruders with a 100dB siren 


With the world on high alert can you be without The Travel Safe System.


Even hitchhikers can be protected if the driver becomes a problem as the siren will be so loud they will be forced to stop the car by the sound intensity. 


Don’t Travel without one!


Made in the USA and patent-pending, Travel Safe makes your world a safer place

Protect yourself against muggings, burglary, sexual assault, kidnapping and murder while you're abroad - with Travel Safe App.


Travel Safe Wrist Band activated Panic Alarm.
It’s a portable, no-fuss personal security system to keep you safe
abroad at home or when you’re out and about. You’ll never travel without it
again.



What would you do if you were walking down a dark street, you heard somebody following close behind you and they grabbed at your handbag?
What would you do?
On your way home in the dark a vehicle stops just in front of you. Two men try to abduct you?
What would you do?
When leaving a night club and walking to  your car you notice someone following you.
What would you do?
Walking in the park an attacker moves close behind you and  drags you to the ground?
What would you do?
Your Wristband is always ready even if you are caught offguard. Instantly startling your attackers and activating the 100 dB Siren to alert others you're in danger.
Once activated an  automated SMS sends a signal to your phone contacts and uses your GPS to locate you. 
 Keeping women and travellers safe the world over - you'll never leave home without Travel Safe system again. 
Our siren has been professionally tested to international standards for sound recording methods. ( see our graphic reports )





The wristband works in tandem with the Travel Security Siren, which fits comfortably into the palm of your hand or attaches to your bag, belt.

Siren box doubles as the door alarm and luggage alarm

Travel Security System Door Alarm 
Every traveller’s must-have item.
Nervous about a potential intruder breaking into your hotel room? 
What would you do?
Imagine if you are travelling alone and you have just stepped into the shower and an intruder opens your room door? 
What would you do?
Being robbed or held hostage and belongings stolen?
What would you do?
What if you wanted to have an afternoon sleep in your hotel room and you were worried about the lock on the door not being secure ? 
What would you do?
Are you frightened that someone will come into your room while you are there.
What would you do?
Many thieves will try to gain access to your room and even if you are asleep in your room, it takes them just seconds to disarm the door latch device?
What would you do? 
Will you wake if thieves  silently disarm you door latch ( in seconds ) and quietly enter your room. ?
“Then what happens”?
Solution 

You will startle an intruder with a Powerful 100dB Siren when activated 
 if your room door is opened by just 2 degrees of movement 

·  Easily attaches to door handles, bags, suitcases, briefcases and handbags
·  Activates the Siren if your room door is opened by just 2 degrees of movement 
A warning notification sent via your smartphone with SMS to alert you and your contacts you have nominated to help you.
The small sleek design is about the size of a credit card and fits in the palm of your hand.

story:
Short Summary

Fire. Fire offers a line of custom fire pits and accessories to help make any outdoor event special and unique. We offer colored flames, burning sculptures, large fire pits for focal points, and small fire pits for boundary and area lighting. We create custom fire pits and accent lighting to enhance the decor of mood of the event.

Our goal is to create the very best, completely custom fire pits to ensure our clients have a unique, memorable event.  We are seeking funding so we can have our fabricator do what he does best: create incredible metal fire pits in his laboratory that excel in both form and function.  Our pit design features a two-part construction with a wide, shallow bowl to allow for the maximum viewing vantage.  Clients can customize the pits for their events by requesting personalized etching and engraving.  We plan to offer our base, “Fire. Fire,” pits for our standard inventory and offer the custom pits on demand. We also created our proprietary “Fire Vases” which are three foot, vertical fire pits designed to burn logs and long branches vertically for accent and boarder lighting.

About Us

We're more than just a fire, we set the tone and ambiance for outdoor events.  It's not about the big bonfires, for us it's about the beauty, the light, and the aroma that fire gives off.  Our service caters to those who want one big fire and to those who want anywhere up to over 20 fires, all maintained by our staff. 

Hi, I am Aaron, co-founder of Fire.Fire. This business was born out of my love for fire, the art of building and maintaining the perfect fire, and the simple fact that no one offers this service. I wanted everyone to enjoy a fire at their outdoor event without the worry and hassle of having to tend to it or to put someone else in charge.  For the past 5 years, I have been organizing and hosting private fire events for friends and family across the United States. From Campfire Fridays, to The Woodsman Ball, our fires have lit up the spirits of our guests.


What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $12,000 to get our production started (the more we raise, the more we can do!). Our first objective is set our fabricator to work making our pits.  Once he has the green light, he can begin creating our inventory.  For your support, we have some great perks to say “Thanks” and we’re even offering our pits and vases to generous contributors. The rest will go to supplies and various items needed to help ensure we have safe events.

• $3,000 for fire pit creation

• $1,500 for Fire Vase creation

• $2,500 supplies (hand truck, extinguishers, ember disposal, safety gloves)

• $5,000 for an enclosed trailer for storage and travel

If we don't completely reach our goal, we will prioritize and allocate the funds we do receive accordingly.

We have created lots of options for contributing, please check out our awesome perks!

The Impact

With your help, we can launch this great service that many can enjoy. Who knows you could attend a wedding or private event that uses our service and enjoy a nice fire. We use only locally sourced firewood, never use accelerants, and seek out the most sustainable harvesting practices.  Because our events offer a unique addition to a party, and we're Vermonters doing what Vermonters do best, we help enhance the draw for destination events in our area.  Vermont is a state heavily dependent on tourism.  When people host events here, the community at large benefits.  We like to think that offering our service, which isn't offered anywhere else in the world, helps boost our local economy.

Risks & Challenges

Being a new business, our current challenge is getting our production off the ground.  We have big ideas and a great concept but we need inventory to offer our clients.  Our pits will be used both for our supply and as custom pits our clients take home with them.  Currently, all of our resources are going toward paying for our insurance and our staff.

With your help we can get started making our pits and lighting fires for our clients.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us make new friends by sharing our story. 

See you around the campfire.

Thank you for your time,

Aaron

what he does best: create incredible metal fire pits in his laboratory that
excel in both form and function.  Our pit design features a two-part
construction with a wide, shallow bowl to allow for the maximum viewing
vantage.  Clients can customize the pits for their events by requesting
personalized etching and engraving.  We plan to offer our base, “Fire. Fire,”
pits for our standard inventory and offer the custom pits on demand. We
also created our proprietary “Fire Vases” which are three foot, vertical fire
pits designed to burn logs and long branches vertically for accent and boarder
lighting.




About Us
We're more than just a fire, we
set the tone and ambiance for outdoor events.  It's not about the big
bonfires, for us it's about the beauty, the light, and the aroma that fire
gives off.  Our service caters to those who want one big fire and to those
who want anywhere up to over 20 fires, all maintained by our staff. 
Hi, I am Aaron, co-founder of
Fire.Fire. This business was born out of my love for fire, the art of building
and maintaining the perfect fire, and the simple fact that no one offers this
service. I wanted everyone to enjoy a fire at their outdoor event without the
worry and hassle of having to tend to it or to put someone else in
charge.  For the past 5 years, I have been organizing and hosting private
fire events for friends and family across the United States. From Campfire
Fridays, to The Woodsman Ball, our fires have lit up the spirits of our guests.





What We Need & What You Get 
We are seeking $12,000 to get our
production started (the more we raise, the more we can do!). Our first
objective is set our fabricator to work making our pits.  Once he has the
green light, he can begin creating our inventory.  For your support, we have
some great perks to say “Thanks” and we’re even offering our pits and vases to
generous contributors. The rest will go to supplies and various items needed to
help ensure we have safe events.
• $3,000 for fire pit
creation
• $1,500 for Fire Vase creation
• $2,500 supplies (hand truck,
extinguishers, ember disposal, safety gloves)
• $5,000 for an enclosed trailer
for storage and travel
If we don't completely reach our
goal, we will prioritize and allocate the funds we do receive accordingly.
We have created lots of options
for contributing, please check out our awesome perks!

The Impact



With your help, we can launch
this great service that many can enjoy. Who knows you could attend a wedding or
private event that uses our service and enjoy a nice fire. We use only locally
sourced firewood, never use accelerants, and seek out the most sustainable
harvesting practices.  Because our events offer a unique addition to a
party, and we're Vermonters doing what Vermonters do best, we help enhance the
draw for destination events in our area.  Vermont is a state heavily
dependent on tourism.  When people host events here, the community at
large benefits.  We like to think that offering our service, which isn't
offered anywhere else in the world, helps boost our local economy.


Risks & Challenges


Being a new business, our current
challenge is getting our production off the ground.  We have big ideas and
a great concept but we need inventory to offer our clients.  Our pits will
be used both for our supply and as custom pits our clients take home with
them.  Currently, all of our resources are going toward paying for our
insurance and our staff.
With your help we can get started
making our pits and lighting fires for our clients.

Other Ways You Can Help
 Help us make new friends by sharing our story. 
See you around the campfire.
Thank you for your time,
Aaron

story:
To get a response in 24 hours, contact us at: esra@woodsaka.com

 

We spend hundreds of dollars to buy a case and protect our phones. But why do the cases have to be boring, all looking similar?

Made from extra-hardened real woods, slim iPhone cases, will make you feel unique.

 

 

 

 

Special Case for You

Every case we make is unique thanks to nature of the wood. Since we acquire small pieces of woods from a great number of suppliers, we create cases with astounding variety, color and pattern. We believe that you will be able to find the right case for you from the options we provide. Therefore, we picture every single case and list them with their own images. When the products are ready for distribution, you will be able to choose the pattern and color you like from our website.

 

Uniq case is developed to provide maximum protection despite the thin body. The case made from natural wood, which enhances protection three times, provides full protection against external effects.

 

The interior of the case is coated with water-based Lamous made from ultra thin micro-fibers and polyuretan.

 

Different from other wood cases, Unicase has a secret-locking mechanism which works perfectly well even after long usage.

 

 

The heightened front rim protects the screen from impacts.

 

Strengthened ultra-thin wood case. Only 27gr. The case adds only a 3.3mm thickness to your phone.

 

 

Are you bored with plastic-leather cases which all look alike? We use the most unique and exquisite woods and protect the natural patterns and colors. Therefore, each single case is unique and one of a kind.

Each case has unique colors and patterns. Therefore, we list every product with their own pictures. This way, our backers will be able to purchase the very cases that they have seen and liked.

 

Same case is used for: iPhone 6/6s

Same case is used for: iPhone 6+/6s+

Different cases are used for: 7 and 7+

 

The real wood buttons is perfectly matched with the case

 

Headgear, charging and sound jacks on the case match the case perfectly.

 

 

Unicorn iPhone Cases

Matchless Unicorn iPhone cases made from a fusion between wood and resin.

 

Walnut, cherry, sycamore, sapele, iroko, padouk. Each piece of wood is special; different from one another in their colors and patterns. So，we give shape to the most special woods, handcrafting them to the point of excellence.  

Each case is completed in 46 steps. We make sure each case we make is one of the most special in the world.

 

 

Shipping

We sell to the entire world. The tax in your country is not included in the price.

We ship our products by DHL Express. Duration for delivery: European Union countries: 1-3 days, UK, 1-3 days; US, 3’-5 days; the rest, 2-6 days.  

We start shipping Walnut cases by the end of April. For Cherry, Sycamore, Sapele, Iroko and Padouk cases and some Unicorn cases, we start shipping in May.

By placing your order now, you can have one of our unique cases at lower rates special to Indiegogo.

Warranty

Our products are under a six-month guarantee from the date of delivery to the customer against material and production defects.

Production

After a year-long hard work and hundreds of tests, we had the final product in our hands. With another 6-month long usage test, Uniq and Uniqorn cases are now ready for you.

 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Are the cases entirely made of wood?

We make our cases entirely from real wood. No plastics, no coating. We locate small pieces of woods from furniture workshops and other places. In fact, the woods that creates the most difficulty in processions are those with the most exquisite patterns and colors. Only when every step of production is completed to near perfection would it be possible to get a good result, a good product. That’s why our phone case product line is incredibly rich, diverse and colorful.

Who makes the cases?

We do. We are nine-member team and the entire production takes place in our workshop. Our brand name, Woodsaka, is composed of two words: “Wood” and “an upward path.” The entire production from product design to the delivery of the product to the customer is under our own control and done in our own unique ways.

Why crowdfunding?

We know, after a six-month long market analysis and user tests, that our products are of the highest quality. We perceive Indiegogo as a perfect opportunity to reach out a greater number of customers and to increase our manufacturing capacity.

When do I receive the case?

We will start the delivery of the walnut case by the end of April, 2017. For Walnut cases, we usually ship within two week of the order. For other cases made from cherry, padouck, sycamore, padouk and sapelle (as well as Unicorn case series), we will start deliveries in May 2017.

For which current models do you design cases?

We have cases for iPhone 6/6s/6+/6s+/7 and 7+ models.

From which woods do you make the cases?

Walnut, cherry, sycamore, sapele and padouk. When we reach our target, we will start making cases from wenge, ebony and purple heart, as well.

Does wood case protect my phone?

Our cases are rather sturdy. We have increased the resistance of the cases by a factor of three via some special (and natural) methods. We have strengthened the required points on the case to make it more sturdy. In case of dropping by accident, the case will protect your phone. But, it should not be forgotten that wood is a natural material. Nonetheless, if you are not jumping from one car to another at high speed or drop your case from a high bridge onto the concrete road, our cases will not only protect your phone, but also will make them look great.

The interior of the case is coated with Alcantara fabric, which will firmly but gently cover your phone.

What is the weight of the cases?

Depending on the woods that are used, the weight varies from 24 grams to 35 grams. For instance, the average weight of walnut cases are 27 grams.

Would putting on and off the cases cause any problem?

Thanks to the two-part design, our cases are much easier to assemble and dis-assemble.

Are the cases durable?

Our cases are durable against factors from daily use, such as heat, water, and humidity.

Are charging and ear-bud docks are still accessible?

Yes. The case can easily be used with standard iphone charging cable and ear-buds.

What are the shipping policy?

We deliver to the entire globe. We trust DHL Express for timely and accurate delivery. The shipping time changes from region to region. But, in most cases, it varies from 2 to 5 days.

Do you have warranty on the cases?

Yes. Our cases are covered with a 6-month warranty. This warranty includes all potential production defects from normal use.

What is your return policy?

We have a 15-day, no-question-asked return policy.

If you want to exchange the product you have purchased, contact us within 15 days of the purchase. For return, the cost of shipping is borne by the buyer.

If I have other question, how could I contact you?

For inquiries of any sort: esra@woodsaka.com

For companies: sales@woodsaka.com

story:
Short Summary

Why Clean Fuel Screen Filter?

Because the fuel injector or the throttle body are not fuel pumps they must depend on the pressure (psi) of the fuel pump in  the tank, if the fuel pump filter on the bottom of the pump becomes restricted due to debris or other particulates the pressure is not correct and it creates a condition called lean burn, meaning that there is too much air and not enough fuel. 

This condition is not as powerful and is very very hot, creating a very hot exhaust. and loss of power. Over time this hot condition burns up the o2 sensor and melts the inner meshing components of the catalytic converter, it also causes the pump to burn itself up 
The cleaner the fuel the better the performance of the vehicle will be.

THIS IS THE FIRST OF ITS KIND AND A TOTAL SOLUTION TO THE DIRTY FUEL PROBLEM. 

The Clean Fuel Screen Filter was invented by Ernie Washington, an aviation & automotive mechanic of 60+ years. This product was invented while contracting in the Middle East. 

While servicing a large fleet of vehicles in support of the military, we noticed a gross amount of unserviceable vehicles due to failure of major components in the fuel delivery system. This was caused by particulates, debris, & sediment being introduced into the tank during refueling. 

Although we already have at least 2 filters in most vehicles systems, they are all post filters, meaning that they are attempting to filter the fuel after it has already entered the tank. 

This got us thinking..Not only is this a major issue in the Middle East, but during my 50 years of owning my own repair facilities across the U.S., I have encountered this same "dirty fuel" problem over & over again.  I knew that something needed to be developed that would eliminate this problem for good. That's when I came up with the idea of filtering the fuel before it enters the tank. 

The Clean Fuel Screen Filter is a revolutionary product that does just that. 

No auto mechanic needed. 

It's low price, & simple installation or removal makes it accessible to almost anyone. Once it is installed, it aids in prolonging the life of the fuel pump, the fuel filter, the fuel pressure regulator, the fuel injectors and more. Which, in turn, will leave your wallet thanking you.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We would like to reach our initial goal of $10,000.  

We have single, couple & family packs available in our perks section. Each perk except the single pack is priced at a discount.

We've tested the Clean Fuel Screen Filter to fit many vehicles, but we'd like to expand our testing to include as many vehicles as possible.  You can support the project by letting us know if the Clean Fuel Screen Filter does not fit your vehicle.  If you find that the Clean Fuel Screen Filter does not fit your vehicle, visit www.cleanfuelscreen.com/compatibility and add your vehicle year, make , and model to our list to help us expand the project so everyone can benefit from having a vehicle that functions at peak performance and a prolonged life.

If we don't reach our initial goal, all orders that have been placed will be fulfilled and we will continue sales via our official website as well as other internet outlets.

The Impact

This product is one of the most needed parts in the fuel delivery system. It really allows the vehicle to function at it's peak performance. At present, we are fighting the detrimental results of fuel filtering that begins at the vehicles fuel pump filter. We set out to change this by introducing our product (Clean Fuel Screen Filter) which filters the fuel at the fuel pump nozzles end - before it enters the tank. 

With extensive internal testing and use of our original prototype, upon application of our product, we found that debris, particulates and sediment were trapped, preventing it from entering the tank in the first place. The problems we encountered on the test vehicles prior to installing the Clean Fuel Screen Filter were no longer occurring. With these successful results we were employed to install this product on all the vehicles in our fleet which was our first major purchase order of $137,000.00.

story:
Short Summary

Hi we came across this idea because of the need to have access to the lightning port thru more than one way simultaneusly, so the idea is quite simple, we design the smallest nd durable lightning adapter ever, in that way that you and everybody else can use earpods while charging. The idea came pretty much from the need to be in a college library and hear thru headphones podcasts but the battery life goes out quickly, so with that adapter you can plug your powerbank or just plug it to the wall and enjoy.

What We Need & What You Get

We see some projekts on the market but they are so complicated cheap made and bad designed that they make their cause harder, they plug cords and adapters and more cords is endless unusability.so we rty to create an efficient product that be there for you when ever you need it small, light and durable, selected perks give you access to early birds, beta versions and discount codes. 

Risks & Challenges

So far the risk is to fit the all new for these needs dual layer closed circuit into that small area inside the adapter, there for we working with some engineers they can help, but we need your support because of pre-production costs and construction factory payments

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Get  the word out and make some noise about the campaign
  • Share it on Facebook, Twitter e.c.t

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-smallest...

story:
We all cannot live without smart devices, as well as charging cables. Unfortunately, we have gone through unpleasant experiences of plugging and unplugging our smart devices while driving, in a rush or from a messy table. Charging cables are often tangled, stained, damaged and lost. To minimize the potential hazards and financial lost, here, we are now introducing the TAPY - adherent & retractable USB charging cable!


We have invented the smart adherent design that can locate your charging cable on almost every surface! You will no longer be stepping on or searching all day long for your charging cable, no matter at home or in a vehicle. Conveniently, the cable is retractable after every single use. Charging experience is totally chaos-free from now on!


When the adhesive comes along with dirt and dust, what you need to do is simply rub it with your finger and a few drops of water! Made of ultra long-lasting adhesive, stickiness resumes after washing in just seconds. You may relocate your charging cables repeatedly anytime.


Bringing charging cables for different devices with you might be a big trouble. Say “thanks” to the 2-in-1 connector and say “bye” to the problem right now! TAPY is designed for both iOS and Android devices and it supports charging process, as well as data synchronization. No adapter is needed!



 

The smart adherent design helps you to collect and store your charging cables easily by winding them around your portable charger or even your wrists.


The cord is made of 100% plate copper with silver conductor for 2.4A high speed charging, which increases charging speed by up to 40%. For improved durability and appearance, connectors are made of Zinc Alloy with integrated molding design to prevent rust and fragileness.
 

Tangled cables are messy. We designed TAPY to tackle the problem with a stylish flat cord. More than that, the cord utilizes P2i military-grade nanotechnology which makes it water-repellent. TAPY provides you with convenience and style, with no doubt.
 

You will no longer need to search for your charging cables while driving with the Smart Adhesive Design. Driving is even safer, you are less likely to get into accidents from now on!

 

 

 

 


 


 

 

ABOUT US

We specialized in innovative technology development and hardware design. Our team aims to improve your experience associating with technology and make your life easier. We collaborated with many talented professionals to develop innovative products. We are now ready to bring a wide range of pioneering products and we need your support!

Find us on:

story:
VoXy phone software will use a telephone coupling module connected to the computer sound card. The software will recognize the components of a noisy incoming speech signal  and convert it into a visually-displayed string of words in the French or English language. The sound-to-text translation will be done in real time and directly (i.e., without the need of any intermediary, whether it is a human telephonist or an application on a multi-user server). Moreover, the speech-recognition process will be based on a best-fit analysis from the output of many models’ algorithms. A self-contained application for Android and IOS phones will also be developed.

We currently have a functioning prototype that relies on Google Chrome’s WebSpeech API. This temporary solution is not desirable as it is contingent upon having:

  1. an internet connexion;
  2. voice transmission across the network;
  3. voice recognition through an external server;
  4. decoded text transmission across the network from the server back to the web application that displays it on screen.

Another drawback of this indirect speech-to-text translation is that the voice-template models used by WebSpeech API have been sampled at a much higher frequency (i.e., higher temporal resolution of signal) than that actually used in digital phone lines, thereby increasing the number of transcription errors. Our system will use an adaptive multi-frequency model that optimizes transcription quality at the receiver's end. Furthermore, it will detect touch-tone tonalities in such a way as to facilitate the unambiguous interpretation of  digits. Indeed, numbers are often very difficult to understand via the phone, even for normal-hearing receivers. Our product will target deaf as well as hard-of-hearing individuals, the latter being on a steep increase with the aging population and thereby representing a large proportion of the market for VoXy phone.

For French version please visit: http://www.voxyphone.com/?lang=fr

Here is our prototype using a telephone coupling device to decode in realtime the received voice over the phone from a voicemail.

Itus: The Greek God of Protection; Spends his days protecting the innocent from those that would do them harm.

 

We all know the world seems to be getting less and less safe. Those of us who have children feel that uneasiness in ourselves every time we send them off to school or allow them to go out with their friends. How do we ensure their safety when we are not there to protect them? Can we fully depend on local law enforcement to be there at that crucial moment? What happens in the event of an unforeseen traumatic injury? Can we fully depend on the timely arrival of emergency services?

We know that the dedicated men and women who serve our communities volunteer to put themselves in danger and do whatever it takes to save each and every one of us. We also know that when they are called upon they make every effort to make it to us as soon as they possibly can. Sometimes, it isn't soon enough. Sometimes, no matter how fast they drive they just can't make it to us or our loved ones in time. 

The national average response time for law enforcement and emergency services is 10 minutes. From a medical standpoint as well as a law enforcement perspective we know that TIMING IS CRUCIAL! 

TaylorMade Security is proud to present Itus and Itus Guardian. 

Itus is the world's first and only voice activated personal protection and emergency services app that can be used in conjunction with wearable devices such as the Apple Watch and Android Wearable. 


Itus Guardian is the first app on the market that enables qualified users to receive "distress signals" from individuals within a designated range, who are injured or under duress. Guardians will then be able to intervene, potentially saving a life or protecting an innocent victim. If they are unable to intervene, they could be that crucially needed witness that enables justice to prevail.
  

How does Itus Work:

During the initial setup users are prompted to establish a "safe word" which enables them to activate emergency services as well as other life saving features including GPS tracking, audio/video recording and a distress signal sent to Itus Guardians. These features will enable law enforcement and emergency medical services to locate the user in the event of an attack or any other life threatening situations. 

Should an attack occur and the assailant escape before law enforcement arrives, the audio and video that is captured upon activation will provide the crucial evidence that will be needed in order to arrest and successfully prosecute the criminal or criminals. 

During a traumatic event the victim may be unable to physically dial for help due to being restrained or physical injury. Voice activation is the crucial feature that sets Itus apart. 

The most amazing feature that Itus offers is the free Itus Guardian companion app. 


How does Itus Guardian work:
Qualified users who select the Guardian feature will be able to receive "distress signals" that have been activated by Itus users within a particular range of the Guardian. This will enable qualified individuals as well as good samaritans to assist with preventing a crime or provide potentially life-saving assist during a medical emergency.
Guardian users could be anyone from off-duty law enforcement, licensed medical professionals or trained concealed carriers, to a good samaritan trained in CPR. They are referred to as Guardians for a reason.  


Features of Itus include:

  • Emergency Text Alert with up to 5 contacts and local authorities.
  • 4-Digit Emergency "Fail Safe" in case of accidental activation.
  • Activation initiates camera and microphone, recording up to 2 minutes of video and sound. Audio/Video is then transmitted to the Cloud to ensure safe recovery in the event that your smart phone is destroyed or stolen. 
  • GPS coordinates are broadcast to emergency contacts and the local authorities as well as Itus Guardian users that are within range*.

*Itus Guardian notification is an optional feature that Itus users can opt out of should they decide.

Why?
According to the FBI, in 2014 a violent crime occurred every 26.3 seconds. That means in the time it takes for you to read our pitch 9 people have been violently assaulted, 7 muggings have occurred, and at least 2 people have been raped. There were almost 1.2 million violent crimes committed in the United States in 2014. 
We at TaylorMade Security believe that it is time for each and every one of us to stand up for one another. It is time that we, as a people, stand up against violent crime against our fellow human. It is up to us to protect those that cannot protect themselves, to give a voice to those who remain voiceless and to help those who would otherwise be helpless. Itus will enable us to unite together against these senseless and violent crimes and hear the cries that would otherwise be unheard.



Where does the funding go?
Contributions for this project goes towards the development and the launch of this amazing life saving app. Your contributions will save lives in the very near future. We will use this funding to complete the final phases of Itus. The remaining contributions will be to market and distribute as well as ensure the network of Itus Guardian users are the most qualified individuals.

story:
Sylky is a new app that helps connect tradies and customers for all types and sizes of jobs. 

Sylky was created by Sylvain Hollinger and Matt Morgan, two guys from Sydney’s northern beaches who, after working as tradespeople for more than a    decade, understood better than most that the industry needed to change. 

For many years, the industry had relied on outdated ways of getting new business with many tradies not understanding the concerns of their customers. Sylvain and Matt wanted to design a better way for tradies to be able to work as much and when they wanted, while at the same time improving the way consumer’s hired and worked with tradies. 

So, with this unique perspective and a strong desire to change the way people feel about hiring tradies, Sylvain and Matt have created Sylky, a reliable, transparent and easy to use way to take care of any job from a small plumping emergency in your home or a electrical problem at work, to a full renovation of your home. 

    ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                                         
For tradies, Sylky helps you to build the business you want without expensive advertising costs or concerns about where your next job is coming from.                                 
For customers, Sylky reduces the hassle of online searches and  the worries that come with using an unknown tradesperson for the first time.                             


   

          Support us and be in the draw to win one of our amazing prizes!  * More info at the bottom of this page.



      

      


SYLKY was built by tradies (and a very clever tech team) for tradies and customers to finally bring everyone together on one platform that does it all. Having a solid team behind us has allowed us to implement so many awesome features to SYLKY like:


        







By raising $15,000 from this campaign we will be able to finish full development on both Android and IOS, having everything ready for release within a few months after the campaign.

If we raise over $15,000 we will be updating our website to work in conjunction with SYLKY app to give more options to you (the user). We will also push our marketing campaign to make sure as many people as possible hear about and know they have access to SYLKY. Pushing over our goal will also allow us to speed up the process of finishing SYLKY App quicker by bringing on an extra developer during the final stages.

THANK YOU in advance for all of your support.



           



To be in the running for all prize draws, all you need to do is spend $25 or more on Sylky campaign. 

#1 EXPERIENCE LUXURY. 

Proudly sponsored by Boating Partnerships.

Boating Partnerships are the only syndication company with the official endorsement and support of Australia’s most awarded luxury motor yacht builder, Riviera.

Boating Partnerships are offering a private cruise aboard their brand new Riviera 6000 Sport Yacht for the lucky winner of the prize. The winner of this will cruise within the largest natural harbour in the world, Sydney Harbour, and cover over 50km of waterways between Darling Harbour and Middle harbour. Enjoy a lifestyle from the water that not many will ever experience.

  This Riviera 6000 Sport Yacht has four bedrooms, four bathrooms, and is powered by twin Volvo Penta IPS 950’s boasting a total of 1450 horse power. Measuring in at just over 63 feet overall, she features a huge 10.5 meter squared cockpit and an open plan one level living and dining area, giving her the name as the is ultimate entertainer.

Sit back and enjoy the stunning views of Sydney Harbour while Boating Partnerships take care of the rest. 

Total prize worth over $5000

Proudly sponsored by Tom van Vliet, Managing Director of Boating Partnerships - we invite you to compare the difference. 

T’s & C’s – limited to four people, to be used between 1/12/16 and 28/03/17,  date and times are at Boating Partnerships discretion. 


#2 Heres a flashy prize for all of you to snap up!

Presented by RM Media.

Ryan Magee of RM Media, is a young talented photographer/videographer that has the most incredible perception of the world that he is able to perfectly capture through that of the lens of his camera.

Ryan has traveled many beautiful places perusing the love of his art and now currently resides in the northern beaches of Sydney.

 Ryan is giving away a 1-hour photography session on and around the scenic freshwater beach Sydney.

This is a great opportunity for you and your family or friends to have some special moments beautifully captured for a lifetime.

Prize worth over $450

Proudly sponsored by Ryan Magee of RM Media.

*time and date of prize claim is to the discretion of Ryan Magee 



When will SYLKY be ready?

We are aiming to have the Android version of SYLKY ready for you Backers to test by mid July 2016. The IOS version should be ready for testing by end of October.

Will a free version of the application be available?
Yes, the app is always free for customers. For workers on Sylky there will be a plan that is free to apply for jobs, but when accepted there will be a 12% surcharge on all jobs. Also making a profile will be limited on the free version. Sylky Premium subscription has many benefits.

Why are you making the Android app before the IOS app?
For us Android has been a more malleable platform to construct SYLKY on. We will then make design changes to suit IOS and copy the process to suit the format.   

Do you have more questions?
Don't hesitate to email us at info@sylky.com :)

story:
Help to develop Privacy Optimizer forward and make it free for all!



Who we are

We are a professional software developing company  with crazy enough people that believe they can make the world a little better place! More info: www.badosoft.com

What We Need

We need funds to develop our privacy protection software forward to give it for free to the world to make the internet a safer place! We believe its about time to make data spying harder to some big companies,  some governments and some individuals.

Why online privacy protection?

The Internet is part of our lives and we use it on a daily basis. No matter if you are just surfing, downloading music, videos or software; making online payments via online banking or any other online payment provider; opening accounts, sharing your pictures and videos or engaging in social networks. Regardless if it's data about your computer system, your searching behavior while using search engines, your financial data while shopping and even your personal data are used by some websites or web services and might not only be stored, they might be sold or used against you as well!

Besides this, internet crime has increased dramatically, spies and hackers are gathering passwords, credit card data and other delicate files or information about users. It is time to protect your privacy and files!

The Privacy Optimizer tools suite includes more than 10 tools to assist you with optimizing your privacy settings, and protecting your files, folders, passwords, and credit card data. You can also hide your identity more easily and quickly and share your experience with other users, while surfing with a privacy-optimized web browser.


Current status


We did develop a prototype software that needs further development like simplifying, easier handling, more intuitive user interface, bug resolving, OS updates and stability.

In order to make this Software FREE4ALL we need to make major changes to the software and also improve detection mechanics to achieve best results for all users.


What You Get

The only thing we can offer is that you made the right choice by funding this project to help the fight against privacy violations for this and the next generations!


Other Ways You Can Help
If you are experienced with open source, give us a shout we would like to go open source but lacking experience!

story:
Store all your usernames/passwords in your fingerprint

 

SAY GOODBYE... to complicated usernames and passwords - with FingerFile you can access all of your favourite apps and websites using just your fingerprint.

 

UNLIMITED Cloud Data Storage for your Smartphone or Tablet

 

SAY HELLO... to unlimited cloud data storage forever, so you can safely store and backup all of your private media and access it anytime anywhere and on any device.

 

 

All of your data and files in one secure vault.

 

 

Unique, encrypted and exclusive access for you and only you.

 

 

Anytime, anywhere on any device, platform or operating system.

 

Key Features

  • No need to remember your usernames or passwords with fingerprint access.
  • Store your private media in the cloud knowing it's safe and secure.
  • Access your private media whenever and wherever you want to.
  • Create folders of pictures and videos, share them with friends and family where they  too can print or download them privately and securely.
  • Keep a parental eye on your childrens online activity
  • Complete complicated online forms with just your fingerprint.

 

 

Damaged / Lost or Stolen phone

PROBLEM? -  Have you ever lost your phone, had your phone stolen, smashed the screen or dropped the phone in water and been unable to access or completely lost all your information including pictures, videos, contacts, sms messages and other files. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Forgot Username / Password?

PROBLEM? - Have you ever forgot a username/password for a website you are trying to access and had to set up a second or third account to get into that particular site, or used the password recovery service only to find its been sent to an email account you no longer use and can not access. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Lost/Damaged Back up

PROBLEM? - All your files are backed up to a pc, laptop or hard drive that decides to stop working or the machine breaks down or is lost/stolen. Unless you have a further backup all your memories and data is gone forever

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Embarrassing moment

PROBLEM? - Have you ever handed your phone to a friend/family member and shared pictures/videos or other information that you would have preferred remained private. With FingerFile these files can be placed in a secure folder accessible by you and only you and removed from the device so the device can be handed over and used safe in the knowledge none of your private files will be viewed.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Partner has accessed my device

PROBLEM? - Your partner has accessed your device while you are out or sleeping and has found something on your device that they are not happy with and it causes a huge problem. The image or conversation they have found may well be innocent but you’ve got some explaining to do. Fingerfile will ensure this never happens again as you can secure private conversations videos and images behind your fingerprint and additional security levels.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Our Pledge Goal is only £5000, whilst we value and appreciate all levels of contributions pledged our main goal is to create our community of early adopters of the app and offer exclusive subscription levels, incentives and benefits to those generous consumers.

if you are unable to pledge any of your hard earned then please use the social media or the tools provided by Indiegogo to like, share or reply with your positive feedback.

 

Please direct all press / media and any investment enquiries to Lois Ashbee – 07508 357280 / lois.ashbee@fingerfile.com . We are still actively seeking investment for later versions and global rollout of the app due Aug/Sep 2017.

Keep a parental eye on your childrens online activity
Complete complicated online forms with just your fingerprint.
  Damaged / Lost or Stolen phonePROBLEM? -  Have you ever lost your phone, had your phone stolen, smashed the screen or dropped the phone in water and been unable to access or completely lost all your information including pictures, videos, contacts, sms messages and other files. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Forgot Username / Password?PROBLEM? - Have you ever forgot a username/password for a website you are trying to access and had to set up a second or third account to get into that particular site, or used the password recovery service only to find its been sent to an email account you no longer use and can not access. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Lost/Damaged Back upPROBLEM? - All your files are backed up to a pc, laptop or hard drive that decides to stop working or the machine breaks down or is lost/stolen. Unless you have a further backup all your memories and data is gone forever------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Embarrassing momentPROBLEM? - Have you ever handed your phone to a friend/family member and shared pictures/videos or other information that you would have preferred remained private. With FingerFile these files can be placed in a secure folder accessible by you and only you and removed from the device so the device can be handed over and used safe in the knowledge none of your private files will be viewed.------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Partner has accessed my devicePROBLEM? - Your partner has accessed your device while you are out or sleeping and has found something on your device that they are not happy with and it causes a huge problem. The image or conversation they have found may well be innocent but you’ve got some explaining to do. Fingerfile will ensure this never happens again as you can secure private conversations videos and images behind your fingerprint and additional security levels.------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Our Pledge Goal is only £5000, whilst we value and appreciate all levels of contributions pledged our main goal is to create our community of early adopters of the app and offer exclusive subscription levels, incentives and benefits to those generous consumers.if you are unable to pledge any of your hard earned then please use the social media or the tools provided by Indiegogo to like, share or reply with your positive feedback. Please direct all press / media and any investment enquiries to Lois Ashbee – 07508 357280 / lois.ashbee@fingerfile.com . We are still actively seeking investment for later versions and global rollout of the app due Aug/Sep 2017.

story:
Our Team:

  • CEO/Co-Founder – Morgan Gonsalves
  • Owned Unhallowed Paintball for 11 years and was Team Captain of Team Unhallowed.
  • Bachelors in Marketing/Management and 15+ years of business experience
  • Background in Graphic Design, Virtual Engineering, and Advertising.

 

  • CIO/Head Programmer/Co-Founder – Thomas Whalen
  • Graduated New England Institute of Technology with a Software Engineering Degree.
  •  Specializes in software development on networked embedded devices.
  •  Background in web development. Specifically large scale database driven applications.

 

  • CTO/Head Sound Engineer – Jeffrey Palermo
  • Experienced in managing technology solutions for Enterprise Level Companies
  • BA in Music Performance from UMass Lowell
  • Background in Architecting and Implementing "IT As a Service" Solutions

 

Our Campaign:

We are developing a Real World FPS Laser tag experience to bring the love of video games outdoors. Utilizing augmented reality and Motorola’s Moto Mods platform, we give our players the ability to make the world their arena! Through full integration with your Moto Mods Enabled Phone and integration with social media sites such as Facebook and Google+, players will be able to set up and join games, invite players, and more. Our LaserCore Controller is completely customizable. Players will be able to mix and match components on their LaserCore gun to achieve a personalized look.

            LaserCore is inspired by our love for paintball, video games, and emerging mobile technologies. We’ve drawn a lot of inspiration and knowledge from operating a successful New England Paintball business. Through the years, we’ve met hundreds of people who want to get into Paintball, but get discouraged due to the cost of playing, or the fear of getting hurt. LaserCore allows players to play on their terms; anywhere, anytime, and without the painful hits to both your wallet and body. We love seeing people of all ages getting excited about a sport or a game where they can be creative and be with friends at the same time. That is our vision for LaserCore.

 

 

Our Contributors:

We need your help! The funding from our Contributors will go directly to the purchase of manufacturing supplies, software development, testing, marketing, and distribution. Want to help more? With some of the perks we have you can help promote us with tee-shirts, stickers, or even beta testing!

 

What we need for funding:

We are looking for $80,000 of funding. This will allow us to produce, test, and perfect our demo devices and will also cover the cost of producing the first round of retail product. Below we’ve outlined where we are now and where we plan on taking this project.

  • Stage One: Prototype
    • Electronics
      • Complete prototype circuit boards for weapons system operation.
      • Test and perfect recoil feedback to make the system feel as real as possible
    • Enclosure
      • Current design for base model and Apex Predator model produced with 3D Printers utilizing ABS plastic.
      • Multiple example bolt-on components to give players the ability to customize their LaserCore Device.
    • Software
      • Develop a prototype game server based on WebSockets.
      • Develop a prototype game client using the Moto Mods and MapBox API’s.

 

  • Stage Two: Pre-Production
    • Electronics
      • Order a short run of our completed circuit board design for beta testing.
    • Enclosure
      • Cast a mold for injection molding of our final gun enclosure.
      • Order a short run of injection molded enclosures for beta testing.
    • Software
      • Perfect the prototype WebSocket server and get it production ready.
      • Perfect the prototype game client.
  • Stage Three: Production
    • Full production will be Injection modeled and professionally packaged for consumer market

 

 

Cost Breakdown:

The funding we gather from the campaign will be mainly used toward finishing development, buying equipment for production and getting to market. We will be informing our supporters with frequent updates and videos keeping you part of our team.

 

 

Coding and Development

10%

Equipment and Software Purchases

30%

Testing

5%

Licenses and Fees

5%

Production and Distributions

40%

Marketing and Advertising

10%

Perks, Perks, Perks:

  • $1-$4 – Get added to our supporters Wall of Fame on our website
  • $5 –      Get a LaserCore Promo Sticker
  • $20 –    Get a LaserCore Swag Pack including Promo Sticker and Tee-Shirt
  • $50 –    Get a custom limited edition trigger to mod your LaserCore gun
  • $100 -  Get a Custom Combo; limited edition trigger and stock
  • $150 -  Get the Early bird Alpha CQB LaserCore model gun
  • $200 –  Get the Early bird Alpha Apex Predator LaserCore model gun
  • $500 -  Get the King of LaserCore package; Alpha Apex Predator LaserCore model gun, custom trigger, custom stock, and Swag Pack including Promo Sticker and Tee-Shirt

The Funding:

We are committed to LaserCore and all funding will be put directly into the project. This covers development, coding, legal fees, equipment, packaging, facility, production expenses, testing, promotional materials, advertising, and other expenses to get LaserCore ready and available for all of you to enjoy. If we do not reach our campaign funding goals we will still push towards completion to honor the perks and seek alternative ways to carry LaserCore to market.

 

LaserCore…and the World:

Our project comes from the love of new and exciting outdoor activities with friends and family. We are all gamers, but want to be free and untethered to play wherever and whenever! We also like seeing people being able to customize, mix and match, and tweak their equipment to make it their own without spending a ton of money. We want to take what we loved about laser tag and paintball when we were kids and make it explode with new life, in new environments for new…and old players. Family time, friend hangouts, company retreats, LaserCore can be the life of the party!

Past Projects:

Unhallowed Paintball – Cumberland and Chepachet RI: Owned and Operated for 11 years

  • 2 Paintball fields, Pro Shop, Private party rooms, Mexican Restaurant
  • Managed Team Unhallowed for 6 years capturing multiple 1st and 2nd place Tournaments
  • Developed  custom parts for paintball markers
  • Developed Trade show and Vendor networking contacts

Development of Virtual Client Services – Citizens Bank Account 6+ years

  • We are a combination of Virtual and Desktop engineers with backgrounds in Citrix, Project Management, hardware/software support, and Service Delivery Management.

 

Risks & Challenges

Risks and challenges are a natural part of any adventure, and it takes an experienced adventurer to be able to surmount them.  All current members have, at one time or another owned and operated their own business.  Also, working in the technical service industry, we all understand the customer comes first and at the end of the day “It Must Work”.  A combination of working with the public as well as overcoming various technical, creative, and personal challenges makes us the ideal team to work through any issue.

 

Challenges

Manufacturing: Cost and logistics of manufacturing can be daunting.  We have hands on experience and a modular design for our equipment, which will help drive down costs.

 

Usability of Equipment: As we go through development and testing, the usability of our equipment as well as the program will be a top priority.  We will overcome this challenge by vigorous testing by our developers and everyday users.  We will be paying attention to user feedback and ensuring the equipment and UI is fun and easy to use, even for the most novice of players.

 

User Feedback Analysis: Feedback from our valued customers is what will keep the product fresh, efficient, and desirable.  Analyzing constructive feedback will be instrumental to adapting our project for the better.

 

Lower amount of Data Charge(s): It will be a focus to keep data costs low for users who have data plans.  Keeping code simple using web sockets will help to address this issue.

 

Risks:

 

Marketing Strategies: Since this is a new type of game that is not widely available, marketing strategy will also be new and untested.  Our current plan is to follow the popularity of similar games that utilize augmented reality and target those customers.

Additional Equipment Purchase needed for play:  Since there is no base-play model, users will need to spend additional money on the equipment.  We will keep additional costs low by offering various models of additional equipment.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute, please get the word out!  We believe this product will fill a void in the fascinating world of Augmented Reality!
