story:
Earless, is a social networking solution with a radical difference: it has built-in respect for your personal information. While present social networks are deliberately designed to collect information about people, both personal information and by analyzing their communication, which they then monetize directly or through targeted advertisement, Earless is purposefully constructed in such ways so that it cannot access your personal information or your communication even if the people behind it wanted to or were asked/requested to do so. Earless combines a fresh approach with proven cryptographic technologies to create a socializing environment that delivers all the functionality and benefits of a classical social network but at the same time keeping your private information, private.

We are at a turning point. The seemingly innocuous information that is being collected from each of us on a daily basis, combined with the increasingly cheaper cost of storage and the exponential increase in computation power, is setting us up for a perfect storm. When all the pieces fall into place, these companies will have an accurate model which they can use to predict and manipulate society at large. We blame governments for spying on us, and with good reason, because instead of protecting us they happily tap into this information paradise to make their job easier, but the way things progress, tomorrow's Big Brother, will be traded on Wall Street.

Social networks are one of the biggest vectors that facilitate this trend because people inadvertently disclose enormous amounts of details about themselves, their friends and their environment, simply because, well, that's what socializing is about: we expose ourselves amongst our friends. We often just dismiss the uneasy thought that the network itself is peering down on us, because there is little or no alternative, plus if they all do it, after a while it just becomes normal. We think it is not, so we created Earless, a social network where you can disclose yourself among your friends without being watched by who knows who.

We are a very small team, from various backgrounds like IT and social sciences, but with a crazy ambitious goal: to disrupt this vicious trend by giving everybody an alternative to hold onto their privacy and by this to restore the informational balance between society at large and these giant corporations. To us, any other outcome is unthinkable.

Where is Earless Now ( Existing Functionality )

The Earless Network is a mediated peer-to-peer social network, which means that the server only acts as a middle man in the information exchange and the data resides on the sender's computer and the computer of the person it is being sent to. Data reaches the server in its encrypted form and is stored there only temporarily. When all recipients downloaded the information, the content of the message is purged from the server.

Communication in Earless has a strong end-to-end character. The inner layer encryption employs a 2048 bit RSA asymmetric algorithm which links messages back to their sender. Messages sent by "Person A" to "Person B" have a different encryption than messages sent by "Person B" to "Person C", even if "B" is re-sharing the information received from "A". Therefore unlike with email, the author of a message cannot masquarade as a friend. By the same token, you cannot accidentally send your message to a total stranger, because if he or she doesn't have the key you shared with your friends, he or she cannot read your messages.

In spite of these stringent security constraints, which make Earless well suited for businesses too, the dynamics of the application are very much like that of your usual social network, and more:

Double layer encryption protects all your data from outside eavesdroppers,
End-to-end encryption protects all your data from the server,
Zero knowledge, the server knows nothing about you (personal information or communication),
No advertisement, third party or any kind,
You can share simple text in a blink of an eye,
The story share functionality allows you to write rich text messages to emphasize your creativity,
Embed and watch video you host on your favorite channel,
Share images, both individually or in bulk, apply size optimization and rotation while you are at it,
Organize images in albums and share them with ease, 
Organize various types of posts in conversations to keep them together,
Exchange documents (files in general),
Control the degree of privacy of your message,
Comment yours or other people's posts,
Organize documents with a hierarchical tagging structure so that you find important documents easier,

Group your connections in categories and address them as one, avoiding awkward selection of friends during sharing process,
View your messages in timeline and filter them by tag or by connection,
You can export documents, or choose to view them directly in the Operating System default viewer,

Being a desktop application, Earless integrates much better with the operating system than the usual social network. It also has a built-in web browser which is full Java Script enabled and temporarily accepts cookies, this allows for functionality you will not find in a web based social network.

Open shared links in the operating system browser,
Browse shared links with the built-in browser,
Browse anywhere you like and lose your trail; when you exit the application all cookies will be purged,
Take screenshots of pages and only show relevant content,
Take screenshots of pages behind log-in and share them with your connections (connections will not be able to browse to these pages, but will be able to see the screenshot),

You can do all these without leaving a trail of breadcrumbs behind you because the page sharing system works radically different from the usual web based social network.

Roadmap ( Where Will the Funds Go )

All of the above functionality is already built into the Earless system which although in beta, is fully functional. Because of this, we believe we will be able to give access to all contributors within a relatively short period.

We structured the growth of the network into four waves, because we want to make sure everybody on board has a good user experience. Only when this is ensured, will we move further to the next wave.
We estimate that our present infrastructure will be capable to handle the first two waves of members, therefore, we intend to start delivering to those who buy into these waves even before our campaign ends, with the "Early Access, 1st Wave Members" starting to receive access as early as 3 to 7 days.
After we make sure the first wave of members have a quality user experience, we will proceed with delivering the perks for the second wave of members. Based on our estimation, this will happen between 6 to 8 weeks. This will be an important step in Earless's development because it will help us calibrate the load on our servers and determine the parameters of the infrastructure we need.
With the funds raised up to the goal of this campaign, we are going to upgrade our server infrastructure. This process will take some time (we estimate 10 to 12 weeks), so please be patient. We will do our best to hasten the process and we will keep you apprised of the evolution of things.
The "Early Public Opening" is an intermediate step we reserved to ensure that we can make good for everybody who participated in our campaign. While we remain committed to the goal of the campaign, to have a "Public Opening", we'd like to provision for the situation that we will have a lot of participants, and deployment will be more difficult than expected. If that were the case, a delayed public opening will help us better deliver on our promises.
If we raise our goal, the infrastructure that we will be able to acquire will help us kick-start an organic growth process in which we will have enough resources to accommodate new clients that will pay for further growth and so on. Provided that we reach our goal, the public opening will follow soon after the "Early Public Opening" and we will start opening bigger batches of users, potentially even eliminating the account limit completely.

Our resource needs are linear. They basically grow proportionally with the number of users in the network. Due to this, we feel confident that even if we do not meet the goal, we will be able to accommodate the number of people that contributed to the fundraising and at least a small circle of their friends. While this road would be a lot harder, and it will take much longer, it is a road we are committed walk.

We greatly appreciate and respect all those walking with us.

Roadmap Continued ( Where We See Earless )

The history of Earless will not end with the "Public Opening", in fact that's when it really starts. By this time, with your help, we hope we will extended our infrastructure sufficiently to turn it into a self sustaining mechanism, and we will have fine tuned the network and fixed sufficient bugs to be able to bring Earless out of beta. During all this period our focus will mainly be on perfecting what exists today in Earless.

At that point we will split our efforts in two: continue to grow the network by opening it to more and more people, and growing Earless's functionality suite to cover a larger spectrum of communication pathways. We know that people need to use many different communication methods, so the more of these methods we cover, the better our privacy umbrella becomes.

While we have ambitious plans with regards to the future set of functionality, the timeline for the implementation is somewhat uncertain and it is not captured within the scope of the current crowd-funding campaign. However if we do manage to raise more than it is necessary for our immediate goal, we would be able to fast-track some or all of these enhancements, based on the amount raised and their priority.

An estimated $300K would help us build mobile clients for Earless. Should we raise in between this and our targeted base, we will prioritize building these clients. We are going to get back to you with a poll to evaluate the importance of each of these clients to the community, and build them accordingly.

At around $500K we estimate we would be able to expand our team sufficiently to implement, chat, group chat, direct video sharing, voice messages and video messages.

We estimate $1M would help us build voice-to-voice communication that benefit from the stringent security measures Earless adheres to. With some luck, we may even be able to develop voice conferencing and video calls within this frame.

This is probably the coolest feature but it is also the most expensive and as such, last on our list. Group Video Conferencing is difficult to solve even without encryption. Witness to this, the limited number of solutions on the market. Within the context of our rigid encryption rules, this will be an order of magnitude harder. We are not even going to put a price point on this, nevertheless, we consider it to be a very important summit and we will redirect available resources into achieving it.

Thank you very much for all your help!

Cost Structure

We have estimated a fair value cost for the Earless Service of $18 a year, which amounts to $1.5 a month. However, we realize that even this low price per month, which is less than a coffee in most countries, some people may not be able to pay, so we devised a somewhat unconventional charging system, where we give an unconditional discount. Additionally we also provide a completely free version which has a connection limit but otherwise is fully functional.

We also offer the possibility for people to pay more than the fair value if they have the possibility, this way we hope to offset the loss we incur with our discount and free service. If this call is going to be answered, we are going to increase our discount rate accordingly. We are hopeful that people will understand that it is not enough if 10% of the population has privacy protection. The inability of those who cannot pay for their privacy will be exploited and if they form the majority, this will drag the minority and society in general in that direction. Rich and poor, our destinies are linked.

Family Edition ( < 10 Connections ), Free
We call it family edition but we don't know who you are or who your family is. Use the application for free for up to 10 connections, no questions asked.
Starting from the moment you exceed the the 10 connections, you will have a 1 month period to choose a plan

Low Income Edition, $9 / year or $0.75 / month
This is a good will discount. We are not going to request any proof from you that you have a low income, we take your word for it. Furthermore, you will receive the same service as everybody else and you will not be labeled in any way for paying less.
You should understand however that abusing this option can have a negative effect on our business and our capacity to continue providing our service to everyone in the future. Use this edition only if you really have to.

Fair Value Edition, $18 / year or $1.5 / month
This is what we consider a fair price. Unless you want to provide extra support choose this edition.

Philanthropist Edition, > $27 / year or > $2.25 / month
This is a good will surcharge :). By choosing this option you endorse our philosophy and you provide extended support to our quest for enforcing respect towards people's privacy. Please understand that we cannot advertise your participation as this would create pressure on your peers.
While your gesture is purely philanthropic, it means a lot to us and it is greatly appreciated. Thank you very much!

Perks

Perk Cost Value Discount Delivery Starts
Privacy Champion $10 Set Of Stickers N/A EOC
Early Public Opening $25 Earless 2 Year 30% Off Yearly Price EPO
Early Access, 2nd Wave Members $50 2 x Earless 2 Year 30% Off Yearly Price EA - 2
Early Access, 1st Wave Members $75 3 x Earless 2 Year 30% Off Yearly Price EA - 1
Earless For Life $100 Earless Life Life at cost of 5.5 Years EPO
Bring the Gift of Privacy $250 4 x Earless Life Life at cost of 3.5 Years EPO
Social Network for Businesses $500 10 x Earless Life Life at cost of 2.7 Years EPO

EOC = End Of Campaign
EPO = Early Public Opening (End Of Campaign + 10 - 12 Weeks)
EA - 1 = 3 - 7 Days
EA - 2 = 6 - 8 Weeks

Note: Perks that contain Earless subscription other than "life" and are activated during the beta period will have their time intervals adjusted to begin on the Early Public Opening, once the date is known for certain. In other words, the beta period is not be calculated into these subscriptions.

The Earless Team

Stefan Harsan Farr (Founder, CEO)
Stefan has an engineering degree in automation, more than 15 years of experience in software development, web, computer aided analytics, computer semantics and IT in general. He believes the next revolution in human history must be a personal one. One that will elevate us to a higher level of understanding and allow us to responsibly harness all the wonderful technology that we have already unlocked. This will lead to a world, which by today's definition is nothing short of Utopia.
Ciprian Oltean (Marketing, Design)
Ciprian has extensive experience in marketing and brand management and as the managing partner of an online small business, knows the importance of excellent customer support. He values privacy and strongly believes that it is a fundamental right and that one should not have to go to extreme lengths to enjoy it.

F.A.Q.

For any questions you have regarding Earless please contact us through our Indiegogo campaign, through our website (contact page), or email us directly at support@earless.net.

Here are some of the questions we've been asked so far:

How can I get on the waiting list?

The easiest way to get into the waiting list is to download and install the application and register to reserve your user name. This process does not require any personal information and although your account will be initially blocked, you will have reserved your user name and your place in the line. As we increase our resources, we will be unblocking batches of accounts in the order of registration.

Exceptions from this rule are those who purchase subscription plans during the fundraising campaign, who will receive priority access according to the perk purchased. They can also ask for prioritization of their potential connections.

How will I receive my perk?

Except for the stickers, your perk will consist in one or more "Earless Codes", which you will receive electronically. After you installed the desktop, simply follow the instructions to claim your gift (subscription plan or priority access), everything will be in the code.

Note: Codes can be used a single time and for a single account

How can I ask for the prioritization of a connection?

You must first use your perk to unlock your account and get your subscription. Ask your potential connection to join the network as well to get onto the waiting list. Then simply send a connection request to this person. The pending connection request from an active subscription will place the target account on the priority list.

Note: Please understand that although we will treat these accounts with priority, we can only get to them after we honor all subscriptions purchased during the fundraising.

So the server can see these connection requests?

The server can see that it is a connection request, who the requesting user name is, and to which user name is directed. The content of the request will be encoded with your key so we do not have access to it. The key exchange is a two step, two pathway process designed to protect your key while in transit from both us, the network, and anybody who might intercept it. It's a neat process, if you are curious how it works, please see here: Connecting in a safe way.

If you have end-to-end encryption, how come I can receive messages from the Earless Administrator account?

The Earless Administrator account has a special status, it is basically half-a-connection to you, which means that you can receive messages from the administrator but the administrator cannot receive messages from you. This is because you have the administrator's public key (it is shipped with the installation) but we do not have your public key. So even if you sent messages to the administrator we would not be able to read it. This needs to stay like this, so if you want to contact us, please do so on our portal or write us an email.

Where are your servers located?

Presently our servers are located in Germany but this location is really irrelevant because any block of data that contains your personal information or communication is encrypted with your key, the one that we do not have access to. Since we do not have this key it cannot be stolen from us, so your information and data remain safe even in the unlikely event our database got hacked.

How safe is this key anyways?

The Earless asymmetric encryption employs a 2048 bit RSA algorithm, which although is not considered unbreakable, it would take a very, very long time to break and enormous amounts of computational power. By the estimation of a reputable certificate authority, (see https://www.digicert.com/TimeTravel/math.htm), it would take 6.4 quadrillion years for a standard desktop computer to crack such an encryption. This is much longer than the time scientists estimate our universe will live for. That being said, Internet security analysts recommend the use of 2048 bit key for asymmetric encryption. While the 1024 bit key is now considered to be breakable within reasonable time-frame, the 2048 key, which is 2^32 (~ 4.3 billion) times harder to crack that the 1024 bit key, is considered to be safe for several decades to come. While it is impossible to state with a 100% certainty that the key is unbreakable, this safeness should hold true, even if we factor in the progress in IT and the fact that code breakers would employ supercomputers not desktops.

Why not a browser based application?

There are two main reasons why Earless is a desktop based application:

a). Browsers based application are extremely insecure. Based on the 2014 vulnerability report (http://www.gfi.com/blog/most-vulnerable-operati...), browsers account for more than half of all application vulnerabilities. By building a browser based application, these vulnerabilities would form a baggage we would deliver to you together with our application and even worse, this would be something that would not be in our power to fix. This is not what we had in mind when we built Earless.

b). Even if the browser environment would be 100% foolproof, there would still be a problem that would eliminate it as a suitable platform for Earless. In a browser based application (your typical SOA), the entire application resides on the server, even the UI is rendered at server side into HTML + Java Script code and the browser (on your computer) only displays it. Even if this application runs through SSL, the information that travels inside the SSL channel is not encrypted. In other words your communication is encrypted to the outside world, but it is not encrypted to the server your sending it to. While this is logical in SOA environment, it also means that the server has access to your personal information and communication no matter what, which is exactly the problem we wanted to eliminate. With Earless, the server receives your information in an already encrypted form, therefore it cannot access it. This is only possible if the encryption, and thus the computation, is done not on the server, but on your computer.

Does it mean that if I start using Earless the privacy issues will be solved?

Well, yes and no. If you and everybody else would only be using Earless, privacy would not be an issue, but it is hard to imagine that this would be possible. Earless provides means for private and secure communication, so use it as often as you can to preserve your privacy. Information that you exchange there will not be tracked by anybody, stored or analyzed in any way, but phones will continue to require you to log into your account and Smart TV's and other gadgets will do the same. But if sufficient people start using Earless, they will become aware of this danger of privacy violation and will start voicing their concern, they will force their governments to act upon it. Instead of joining in with the personal information hoarding, as the current tendency is, they will act to regulate what these giant corporations do with the information they gather. This is the Earless long term vision.

How can I help, other than contributing?

You can share our message with your friends, and make them aware we exist and ask them to do the same. You can also download the application and register in the network. Although your account will be blocked for the moment, this will help us a great deal, because we will be able to assess the demand which is an important factor in the infrastructure deployment decision.

Any help is greatly appreciated.

30% Off Yearly Price

Earless For Life
$100
Earless Life

Bring the Gift of Privacy

Social Network for Businesses

10 x Earless Life
Life at cost of 2.7 Years
EPO





EOC = End Of Campaign
EPO = Early Public Opening (End Of Campaign + 10 - 12 Weeks)
EA - 1 = 3 - 7 Days
EA - 2 = 6 - 8 Weeks


Note: Perks that contain Earless subscription other than "life" and are activated during the beta period will have their time intervals adjusted to begin on the Early Public Opening, once the date is known for certain. In other words, the beta period is not be calculated into these subscriptions.  

The Earless Team



Stefan Harsan Farr (Founder, CEO)



Stefan has an engineering degree in automation, more than 15 years of experience in software development, web, computer aided analytics, computer semantics and IT in general. He believes the next revolution in human history must be a personal one. One that will elevate us to a higher level of understanding and allow us to responsibly harness all the wonderful technology that we have already unlocked. This will lead to a world, which by today's definition is nothing short of Utopia.


Ciprian Oltean (Marketing, Design)



Ciprian has extensive experience in marketing and brand management and as the managing partner of an online small business, knows the importance of excellent customer support. He values privacy and strongly believes that it is a fundamental right and that one should not have to go to extreme lengths to enjoy it.



F.A.Q.
For any questions you have regarding Earless please contact us through our Indiegogo campaign, through our website (contact page), or email us directly at support@earless.net.
Here are some of the questions we've been asked so far:
How can I get on the waiting list?
The easiest way to get into the waiting list is to download and install the application and register to reserve your user name. This process does not require any personal information and although your account will be initially blocked, you will have reserved your user name and your place in the line. As we increase our resources, we will be unblocking batches of accounts in the order of registration.
Exceptions from this rule are those who purchase subscription plans during the fundraising campaign, who will receive priority access according to the perk purchased. They can also ask for prioritization of their potential connections.
How will I receive my perk?
Except for the stickers, your perk will consist in one or more "Earless Codes", which you will receive electronically. After you installed the desktop, simply follow the instructions to claim your gift (subscription plan or priority access), everything will be in the code.
Note: Codes can be used a single time and for a single account
How can I ask for the prioritization of a connection?
You must first use your perk to unlock your account and get your subscription. Ask your potential connection to join the network as well to get onto the waiting list. Then simply send a connection request to this person. The pending connection request from an active subscription will place the target account on the priority list.
Note: Please understand that although we will treat these accounts with priority, we can only get to them after we honor all subscriptions purchased during the fundraising.
So the server can see these connection requests?
The server can see that it is a connection request, who the requesting user name is, and to which user name is directed. The content of the request will be encoded with your key so we do not have access to it. The key exchange is a two step, two pathway process designed to protect your key while in transit from both us, the network, and anybody who might intercept it. It's a neat process, if you are curious how it works, please see here: Connecting in a safe way.
If you have end-to-end encryption, how come I can receive messages from the Earless Administrator account?
The Earless Administrator account has a special status, it is basically half-a-connection to you, which means that you can receive messages from the administrator but the administrator cannot receive messages from you. This is because you have the administrator's public key (it is shipped with the installation) but we do not have your public key. So even if you sent messages to the administrator we would not be able to read it.
This needs to stay like this, so if you want to contact us, please do so on our portal or write us an email.
Where are your servers located?
Presently our servers are located in Germany but this location is really irrelevant because any block of data that contains your personal information or communication is encrypted with your key, the one that we do not have access to. Since we do not have this key it cannot be stolen from us, so your information and data remain safe even in the unlikely event our database got hacked.
How safe is this key anyways?
The Earless asymmetric encryption employs a 2048 bit RSA algorithm, which although is not considered unbreakable, it would take a very, very long time to break and enormous amounts of computational power. By the estimation of a reputable certificate authority, (see https://www.digicert.com/TimeTravel/math.htm), it would take 6.4 quadrillion years for a standard desktop computer to crack such an encryption. This is much longer than the time scientists estimate our universe will live for. That being said, Internet security analysts recommend the use of 2048 bit key for asymmetric encryption. While the 1024 bit key is now considered to be breakable within reasonable time-frame, the 2048 key, which is 2^32 (~ 4.3 billion) times harder to crack that the 1024 bit key, is considered to be safe for several decades to come. While it is impossible to state with a 100% certainty that the key is unbreakable, this safeness should hold true, even if we factor in the progress in IT and the fact that code breakers would employ supercomputers not desktops.
Why not a browser based application?
There are two main reasons why Earless is a desktop based application:
a). Browsers based application are extremely insecure. Based on the 2014 vulnerability report (http://www.gfi.com/blog/most-vulnerable-operati...), browsers account for more than half of all application vulnerabilities. By building a browser based application, these vulnerabilities would form a baggage we would deliver to you together with our application and even worse, this would be something that would not be in our power to fix. This is not what we had in mind when we built Earless.
b). Even if the browser environment would be 100% foolproof, there would still be a problem that would eliminate it as a suitable platform for Earless. In a browser based application (your typical SOA), the entire application resides on the server, even the UI is rendered at server side into HTML + Java Script code and the browser (on your computer) only displays it. Even if this application runs through SSL, the information that travels inside the SSL channel is not encrypted. In other words your communication is encrypted to the outside world, but it is not encrypted to the server your sending it to. While this is logical in SOA environment, it also means that the server has access to your personal information and communication no matter what, which is exactly the problem we wanted to eliminate. With Earless, the server receives your information in an already encrypted form, therefore it cannot access it. This is only possible if the encryption, and thus the computation, is done not on the server, but on your computer.
Does it mean that if I start using Earless the privacy issues will be solved?
Well, yes and no. If you and everybody else would only be using Earless, privacy would not be an issue, but it is hard to imagine that this would be possible. Earless provides means for private and secure communication, so use it as often as you can to preserve your privacy. Information that you exchange there will not be tracked by anybody, stored or analyzed in any way, but phones will continue to require you to log into your account and Smart TV's and other gadgets will do the same. But if sufficient people start using Earless, they will become aware of this danger of privacy violation and will start voicing their concern, they will force their governments to act upon it. Instead of joining in with the personal information hoarding, as the current tendency is, they will act to regulate what these giant corporations do with the information they gather. This is the Earless long term vision.
How can I help, other than contributing?
You can share our message with your friends, and make them aware we exist and ask them to do the same. You can also download the application and register in the network. Although your account will be blocked for the moment, this will help us a great deal, because we will be able to assess the demand which is an important factor in the infrastructure deployment decision.

Any help is greatly appreciated.

story:
'Stop Fire' is about saving lives and homes during the many bush fires that ravage Australia every Summer.

The idea is, We install protection sprinklers around a property, along the gutters and eaves, along the fence line, on roof top air-conditioning units - any where that burning embers could potentially land and ignite a fire.

All sprinkler controls are run via an app for a smartphone or tablet, which means that the sprinklers can be operated remotely.

What We Need

Your contribution to our campaign will assist us with the set up cost to build our website and mobile app.

You can be among the first to have our system installed on your property!

Pre-order your Stop Fire Sprinkler Protection System now!  by contributing $1000 to our campaign, we will install a fire protection sprinkler system connected to our App on your property, this is a massive saving!

The Impact

I have been a firefighter in Western Australia for over 20 years, having attended dozens of incidents every year. Using my experience and knowledge of fire behavior, I have designed a number of protection sprinkler systems, which will dramatically increase the chances of your property surviving a Bush Fire.

As all the protection systems can be operated remotely, you don't need to be home to turn on the sprinklers! another feature of our app will be a 'fire alert' connected to local fire services, you will receive a notification that there is a fire nearby, then you simply log into the app and activate your protection systems, meaning your home will be protected from approaching fire!

This will be most useful if you are away from your property at the time of the fire, imagine being at work and receiving notice of an approaching fire and actually being able to do something to protect your property! or if you need to evacuate due to the conditions of the fire, with this program you can leave early enough to remain safe and yet still be able to protect your home!

Our protection systems can be installed on any structure, from the family home to the garden shed, or equipment sheds in rural areas, or even residential complexes such as retirement homes, hospitals or schools!

We have a team of people ready to get to work, electrical engineers, computer programmer and web designer, plumber and marketing specialist.

All we need is the funds to get us moving, which is where you come in!

Please consider supporting our project and help us to save homes and lives every summer!

Read about the most amazing tech gadget, by GRM-Trade DE


*We use (EUR) because of our trading partner



The product


THE WORLD'S BEST GADGET- THE COOLEST HAT CAP

  • Stay warm and enjoy hands-free music and calls. Perfect for outdoor sports, running, skiing, skating, hiking, working out, dog walking, holiday travelling, and so on. Premimum soft warm double knit beanie hat is perfect for spring, fall, and winter
  • Syncs to any Bluetooth device in seconds such as iPhone, Samsung, HTC, Nexus tablets, iPads, and all other bluetooth compatible devices
  • High quality built-in stereo speakers produce excellent sound quality to make any activity fun
  • Large battery life gives it 60 hours standby time and 6 hours talk time. Then easily recharged by Micro USB (charging cable included)
  • One Size Fits Most & Fully washable (Just remove the internal speakers from their pouches before washing)



    Whats Good Bluetooth Hat Cap is a classic winter hat that allows people to use Bluetooth-enabled devices hands-free and headphone free.

    Talk on your phone with the beanie with a microphone and speakers


    Hands Free Phone Calls

    Once synched, make calls or listen to music, using this state-of-the art control system with stereo-quality speakers. Perfect for outdoor enthusiasts.






    In Many Colours it is always a cool accessory

    Once synched, make calls or listen to music, using this state-of-the art control system with stereo-quality speakers. Perfect for outdoor enthusiasts




    DON'T MISS IT!!!




Other Ways


Some people just can't contribute or make a pre-order

  • So you can ask it as a gift from a friend of yours
  • Use the indiegogo's sharing tools to make our community bigger.


And that's all there is to it.

by GRM-Trade



Feel Free to Contact Us

story:
Short Summary

  • I'm Alessandro Guarino, 27 years old, Social Media Manager. I've been working on Nike, Durex, Honiro.it, Heineken. In spite of my young age, I have a full time experience in live events and communication. 
  • With this campaign I would like to find funds for my startup, MemoMe. MemoMe is a wearable gadget able to connect people on social networks and save stranger's contacts with just a hand-shake.
  • With your contribute, we will innovate the world of communication and we'll give a new meaning to the world networking.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need first 5k to produce the first stock of wristbands. 
  • There are wristbands that can communicate. But there aren't wristbands with a social platform dedicated. Take a look at MemoMe.network
  • If we don't reach the contribute, we will use the money you kindly invest on us moving around on festival and meetings presenting and selling our idea.

The Impact

  • MemoMe is something that connect people instantly. No more paper business cards or paper CV. Never loose a contact, never loose a chance.


Risks & Challenges

  • There is just one big risk: the world will never get to know MemoMe.


Other Ways You Can Help

  • MemoMe is on Facebook (MemoMe) and on Twitter (MemoMe_it). Follow us and help us creating the future of communication sharing and talking about MemoMe.

story:
==) Share this project by clicking on the Facebook or Twitter buttons, Thanks


Save money in electricity now - The future is here...!

CANDELA is the new way of heating your room, using Aluminum that radiates the heat fast and using a Magnetic Propeller to move the hot air now you can get a warm room in less time and using no electricity at all.



Candela needs 1 minute to get to the right temperature. Once the candle is lighted up, it will warm up (between 140° and 180° degrees). The heat is then moved up with the Magnetic Propeller (between 30° and 50° degrees).


The Magnetic Propeller attached to this design look cool and modern at the same time.


After only 15 minutes the temperature of the environment surrounding Candela will be increased between 10° and 15° degrees.


Risks and Challenges

The first prototype were built handcrafted, in order to assess the efficiency according to the shape and volume, and then be painted by hand. We are already in contact with different suppliers, for the production of individual parts, and with a network of international shipments, which will not go beyond the deadline.

It's advisable to use 1 candle to avoid concentration of a high level of temperature in the lower part. Do not use candles of low quality because of possible emission of harmful substances into the wax.

Keep away from children when CANDELA is in operation: the temperature of the outer frame reaches temperatures between 80-110 F° degrees. We recommend to handle with care and do not move when in use.


Thank you so much for checking out our project!!!

Remember if we don't reach our goal then we won't get funded, and no one will get to use Candela. So please share with your friends and family! and make this happen.

==) Share this project by clicking on the Facebook or Twitter buttons, Thanks

story:
Introducing SensorJacket, the world’s first smartphone case that accurately, measures temperature of any object.
My name is Dr. Jacob Fraden,  Inventor of SensorJacket.  SensorJacket was developed during last 3 years, and we are ready to bring to you first. 

Our over 35 years of expertise includes inventions and patents involving non-contact temperature measurement, security devices, medical monitors, infrared motion sensors, and more, with notable clients including Johnson & Johnson, Novartis, Braun, Gillette, CleanAlert, Advanced Monitors Corp. and others. 

I hold over 50 patents, wrote the book Handbook of Modern Sensors: Physics, Designs, and Applications, which has been used for college instruction for over 25 years, and is now in its 5th edition.  

I have invented highly popular products such as the Thermoscan infrared ear thermometer, home blood pressure monitor and motion controlled light switch, among many other devices. 

Our team consists of having a strong engineering and scientific background in physics, mathematics, electrical engineering, computer science, physiology, medicine and other fields. 

SensorJacket is truly a smart case for your smart phone.

What Problem Are We Solving

The problem: current medical devices to measure temperature need to be carried separately, are easy to lose or misplace, need to attach and detach for use & easy to break. 

Our solution:  With SensorJacket, you can measure temperature right from your cellphone by providing easy of use, convenience and accuracy.

This campaign is important to me because we are innovating how smart phone technology are used to measure temperatures.   A SensorJacket miniature sensing module incorporated into a protective case transforms your smartphone into a powerful multi-sensing device.  This invention is truly revolutionary.

The currently available Sensing Module is a 1-s non-contact infrared thermometer for medical and general uses.  It has clinical accuracy, broad temperature range and low cost that is economical for anyone. 

How It Works

The SensorJacket is a phone protective case that contains a specially developed module built-in infrared sensor that passively measures temperature without any contact. It emanates no radiation and measures infrared signal that is naturally comes from any object in relation to its temperature. It’s non-contact, fast and in a Medical Mode has a clinical accuracy.

Get Results In One Second: using our app, aim it at the object such as a child's forehead, and you will get an instant and accurate reading of your child's temperature.

Specs



FAQ


Features In Development For Future SensorJackets


  • Breathalyzer
  • Stethoscope
  • Blood Glucose Meter
  • & more


What We Need & What You Get


  • We have brought some great perks for you including the opportunity to own SensorJacket.  All rewards, except the actual SensorJacket, will be shipped within 30 days from the conclusion of the Indiegogo campaign.

  • The SensorJacket will be available at the end of March 2016.  By donating $150, you will be securing your pre-order.

  • We're looking for $65,000 in funding.  The money raised during this campaign will be used for converting a lab prototype into a consumer product. This requires design and building a special set of tools, calibration machine and the robust app.

The Impact

Everybody who ever needs the ability of measuring temperatures – parents, doctors, nurses and also machinists, technicians, students, scientists will have a non-contact instant thermometer right in their smartphone. No need to carry any attachments – the phone will be always ready to make an accurate measurement.


Our Team


In The Media

-  Read our past articles on Forbes, NBC San Diego, San Diego Business Journal and Cult of Mac.

Risks & Challenges

We are building a special smart phone sensory case  based on a mature sensing technology. While there may be manufacturing and production delays outside our control, we promise to keep you up to date every step of the way.

 

Media

For media inquiries please contact media@sensorjacket.com.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share SensorJacket and our Indiegogo campaign with your friends, family, coworkers and colleagues - every dollar helps!  Thank you for your support!

story:
Flexible Charging Solutions For the Whole Family!

Androids, tablets, iPhones and iPads. There's bound to be a few at home. Charging them can be a hassle sometimes, and always a mess.

There are charging stations that organise the cables, but none really solve the problem of multiple devices laying on the table.

Does this look familiar?

We thought to ourselves; there has to be a better way!

We created the Zentree just for that purpose! Not only does it handle cable management, but it also provides a soft flexible surface which supports multiple devices of different sizes.


The top is made of a soft silicone rubber which protects your devices from bumps and scratches. Viewing angle can be customised if you want to watch a movie while it's on the Zentree.


Where you come in

GELID Solutions isn't a new company, we have experience in production. GELID Solutions is a Swiss company that is strategically based in Hong Kong to aid in our communications with factories in China.

The R&D phase is complete and we have working samples produced that we will send to relevant agencies for necessary certifications.

We need your help to fund the final plastic and silicone mold for production.




If all goes well, we'll be shipping Q1 of 2016!


Risks & Challenges

Does our product work? Yes it does! We have multiple working prototypes already. The prototypes are 90% of what the final product is going to be.

The smart IC which auto-negotiates the best charging current for your device has also been tried and tested.

Specifications

  • 4 Ports
  • 2.4A per Port
  • 48W total Power Output
  • Smart IC for Safe and Efficient Charging
  • Smart IC Auto-negotiates Best Charging Current for Your Device
  • Smart IC Prevents Over-charging
  • Supports iPhones, iPads, Androids, Tablets, Phablets or Really any other USB Device
  • Individual Surge-protection
  • 3-Dimensional Tree Array for Unlimited Flexibility
  • Non-scratching
  • Anti-slip
  • Seamless Cable Management
  • Eco-friendly Materials 


Featured On


Hispazone Review
Cool Smart Phone Review
E-Zone HK
Mega Tech News
Tom's Hardware DE Preview
Tom's Hardware DE Review
HKEPC
Hardware Slave
Pro Clockers
PC3 Review
Review of a Cyclist


The Team



VC: Co-founder of GELID Solutions. With his experience in Marketing and Consumer Behaviour, he provides a valuable insight to how the mind ticks and adds that extra touch to the product to make it stand out from the rest. Being Swiss, he leaves nothing unquestioned, until it's perfect.



Gebi: Co-founder of GELID Solutions, with an in depth knowledge of sales strategies, Gebi, over the years has taken many products from drawings to global launch. Did we also mention he's Swiss?


Tony: With over 15 years of experience in Product Development and Engineering, Tony has built up quite an impressive list of products that has passed through his hands. With his experience, many engineering and manufacturing problems are solved before they even leave the drawing board.


Christian: From the famous words of James Bond and Q: "Age is no guarantee of efficiency, and youth is no guarantee of innovation". Christian certainly puts those words to the test combining youth and innovation. We have to tie him down or his creativity runs wild!


Vitaly: Our marketing guru, dreams and bleeds technology. He's plays the Balalaika, which looks miniature in his Russian hands. Vitaly is Russian, so he drinks vodka like it's water!


FAQ

What is the Zentree?

It's a USB charging station, for all kinds of devices.


How much does the Zentree cost?

For the early bird offer, we have 30 units at USD 30, after the first 30 units, we have 50 units at USD 40. Pre-orders afterwards will be USD 50.


What do I get when I order a Zentree?

You get a 4 port charging station, 4 micro USB charging cables, cable ties, power cord and a user manual.


How many devices can the Zentree charge?

Up to 4 devices can be charged simultaneously. You can use a 3rd party Y-cable to connect 2 devices to 1 USB port. But please be advised, that poor quality cables pose a risk of severe electrical failure and may damage the Zentree when used with high powered devices such as tablets and phablets. So use it at your own risk. Charging times generally are slower as well.


What is the max power output?

Zentree can output 2.4A per port and can provide a total output of up to 48W max.


What does the Smart IC mean?

The Smart IC will automatically detect your device's proper charging current.


Can I use my own USB cables?

Yes, you can use any standard USB cable. But please be advised the cable should be connected properly to the Zentree and to your device. Otherwise, it may cause damage to your device and the Zentree.


Can I charge an Apple™ iPad Pro with the Zentree?

Yes, the Zentree's smart  IC fully conforms to the latest Apple device charging standards.


Do you have any other color options for the Zentree?

Currently, no. But if there is a demand for other color options, we may consider releasing them at a later date.


When can I get the Zentree?

If you order by February, your Zentree will ship by the end of March and be delivered by April.


Where does the Zentree ship to?

We ship with Hong Kong post worldwide.


Is the cost of shipping included?

No, the cost of shipping to your country will be charged separately. Shipping to the US will be USD 25.


Can I get a refund?

OF COURSE NOT! Just kidding! We're sad that you don't want to be a part of Zentree anymore. Please follow Indiegogo's refund support.https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367


How do I upgrade my perk to a better one?

Awesome! If you'd like to upgrade your perk to a high-priced perk, you can do so on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile. For example, if you originally claimed a USD 5 perk but now wish to upgrade to a $50 perk, you can click "Upgrade to Higher Priced Perk"next to your USD 5 perk. This will direct you back to the contribution flow. You can then select the new higher-priced perk you would like to claim. When you complete the transaction, your original contribution will be automatically refunded. https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756-How-to-Upgrade-Your-Perk


How do I choose more than one perk?

Unfortunately, the Indiegogo system is not setup to choose multiple perks at once. If you'd like to choose more than one perk, you will need to initiate a separate order.


I preordered a Zentree but i didn't get a confirmation email. How can i check the status?

Please see the article on How to Know if Your Contribution is Successful.


What safety certificates does Zentree have?

FCC, CE-LVD, CE-EMC and DOE VI.


Where can I use the Zentree?

The Zentree is designed for indoor use and is not waterproof.


If I have other questions, who should I contact?

Please contact support@zentree.co with any other questions you may have.


www.zentree.co



Zentree was created by 

The leader in thermal cooling solutions



Photo Credits: https://www.flickr.com/photos/dno1967b/20090436981  https://www.flickr.com/photos/comedynose/410314...
story_txt:
Flexible Charging Solutions For the Whole Family! Androids, tablets, iPhones and iPads. There's bound to be a few at home. Charging them can be a hassle sometimes, and always a mess.
There are charging stations that organise the cables, but none really solve the problem of multiple devices laying on the table.



Does this look familiar?
We thought to ourselves; there has to be a better way!
We created the Zentree just for that purpose! Not only does it handle cable management, but it also provides a soft flexible surface which supports multiple devices of different sizes.



The top is made of a soft silicone rubber which protects your devices from bumps and scratches. Viewing angle can be customised if you want to watch a movie while it's on the Zentree.


   Where you come in GELID Solutions isn't a new company, we have experience in production. GELID Solutions is a Swiss company that is strategically based in Hong Kong to aid in our communications with factories in China.
The R&D phase is complete and we have working samples produced that we will send to relevant agencies for necessary certifications.
We need your help to fund the final plastic and silicone mold for production.









If all goes well, we'll be shipping Q1 of 2016!

    
Risks & Challenges Does our product work? Yes it does! We have multiple working prototypes already. The prototypes are 90% of what the final product is going to be.
The smart IC which auto-negotiates the best charging current for your device has also been tried and tested.



Specifications 

4 Ports
2.4A per Port
48W total Power Output
Smart IC for Safe and Efficient Charging
Smart IC Auto-negotiates Best Charging Current for Your Device
Smart IC Prevents Over-charging
Supports iPhones, iPads, Androids, Tablets, Phablets or Really any other USB Device
Individual Surge-protection
3-Dimensional Tree Array for Unlimited Flexibility
Non-scratching
Anti-slip
Seamless Cable Management
Eco-friendly Materials 




Featured On





Hispazone Review


Cool Smart Phone Review


E-Zone HK


Mega Tech News


Tom's Hardware DE Preview


Tom's Hardware DE Review


HKEPC


Hardware Slave

story:
Finally, a smart locking system for all your needs. 

NathLock is the first ever Bluetooth lock.  Nathlock uses 4.0 Bluetooth technology allowing you to connect via your smartphone and control the lock with an app. 

This makes a 'smart' locking system a reality.

This is our new and improved version of the NathLock that includes a patent-pending Quick Click technology where you can designate a custom pattern of clicks that grants you access.

Forgotten your combination? Not a problem!

Here at NathLock, we have finally solved the issue of lost keys, stolen keys, and forgotten lock combinations. 

When you use NathLock, all you will ever need is just your smartphone to release the lock. 

Never worry about keys, combinations or losing your wallet or purse ever again!

You can finally unlock your possessions easily for the first time ever; access to your most secure possessions is as easy as simply pressing a button.


Quick Access With Just a Click

Forgot to charge your phone or bring it with you? Not a problem at all. With our patent-pending Quick-Click technology, you can designate a custom pattern of clicks that grants you access. Now you have complete access, even with auto-unlock turned off, or for those times you left your phone at the office.

How It Works

NathLock is the simplest and easiest electronic device to own and operate. Set-up only takes two steps:

  • Download the iOS or Android app

  • Then just wait for it to connect automatically to the lock using Bluetooth 4.0

It’s just that easy.

Operating your NathLock is even easier:

  • Press the shackle to wake NathLock up

  • It searches for your phone, and if it’s within a few feet, it opens automatically

There’s no app to launch, no key to bring, and no need to take your phone out of your pocket.

For your convenience, we’ve fitted NathLock with a series of advanced features to make it by far the best lock on the market. 

  • Feel like limiting the range even further or turning off auto-unlock? Not a problem! 
  • Want to know if your NathLock was just opened? You can get notifications for that. 
  • Forgot your phone or have auto unlock turned off? Just click the lock in a sequence you designate and it will open for you!

NathLock is Featured in:


protect all of your belongings everywhere you go

NathLock is just a simple design and yet offers enhanced security, in a convenient 'smart' system. It's easy to see why people would want several Nathlocks for every situation, so much easier than carrying a huge bunch of keys around, and so you don't have to remeber a dozen combinations. 

Thankfully, we offer multi-unit discounts - check out our perks on the right! 

No Need to Loan A Key (Multi-users)

When you need to share NathLock and grant someone else access, the included app for iOS, Android, and Windows phone allows you to send either, one-time or multi-use keys. 

That way when you’re away, you can allow someone access, but on your terms.


See Who’s Using It, and When

When you need to monitor access to sensitive documents, especially in an office, NathLock can give you detailed information about who opened a lock, and when. It’s available via the ‘History’ section of the included app.

Quick Access With Just a Click

Forgot to charge your phone or bring it with you? Not a problem at all. With our patent-pending Quick-Click technology, you can designate a custom pattern of clicks that grants you access. Now you have complete access, even with auto-unlock turned off, or for those times you left your phone at the office.

An Advanced & Beautiful Design

Built from 30 interlocking components, NathLock was created to be:

  • Beautiful

  • Resilient

  • Water Resistant

  • Long-Lasting

  • Secure

Beautiful

With attention to detail for aesthetics, we built NathLock to be the same size as a standard padlock, but with soft curves and an in-line bevel to give it a streamlined look that fits in at any location.

Resilient

Forged from hardened steel and boron, we built NathLock to withstand even the most extreme conditions and cunning criminals. With included anti-shim technology, nothing gets past Nathlock.

Water Resistant

Since NathLock can be used anywhere, we took the time to make sure no water would ever get in. With four form-fitting grubber gaskets and a lack of exterior buttons, NathLock is safe to use, even in rainy conditions.

Long-Lasting

NathLock is built to last. With an included battery made to last for at least one-year, you won’t ever be stranded. Should your battery die, we make it easy to replace without the need for tools.

Secure

By using industry leading Bluetooth 4.0 that utilizes 128-bit encryption, and our very own PKI technology with cryptographic key exchange protocols, NathLock is safe from criminals, hackers, and thieves.

A Battery Built to Last

To remove worry about when your battery will die, NathLock is set up so that you receive notifications to your phone well before the battery is going to die. When you need to replace the battery, we made it simple so you don’t have to stress. Just unlock NathLock and unscrew the back. The battery will easily pop out and allow you to replace it with another.

What if the battery dies completely? It’s unlikely, but should it happen you can “jump start” NathLock by pressing a replacement battery against the contact points (see pictures for details) which will allow you to unlock NathLock and replace the battery. There are no wires to mess with, no exposed ports to ruin your lock, and best of all, no expensive batteries. It costs as much as a pair of AA’s.

How We Developed Nathlock

When we researched Nathlock, we looked at the best locks on the market, deconstructed them, and found out where they were vulnerable, and what parts weren’t. We used this information to craft the most secure and advanced padlock in the world. It was challenging, and at times seemingly impossible, but we did it all to give the world what it needed: a lock that’s simple enough for a child to use, but able to thwart even the best thieves and criminals.

The Timeline for Nathlock’s Development

Since we have already spent the time researching, developing, testing, and retesting the design, hardware, software, and even the firmware, we are finally gearing up for world stage release. We have chosen a leading manufacturer to build NathLock, but rest assured, we will keep improving Nathlock as necessary for its public release. Anyone luckily enough to receive one as a beta will subject NathLock to unimaginable conditions to ensure that our lock is second-to-none. Once it’s perfect to our exacting standards, mass-production will begin and Nathlock will be ready for delivery.

As part of the launch and on a limited time offer only, we’re offering a very limited gold edition of the NathLock Padlock. Join us on our journey.

Mix and Match: Choose from Three interface Ring Colors
Black, Blue, or White

Supported Devices

iOS: NathLock is compatible with iOS devices with Bluetooth 4.0 and running iOS 7.0 or newer.

Android: Compatible with devices that have Bluetooth 4.0, and are running Jelly Bean (4.3) or higher.

Windows Phone: Compatible with devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 and running Windows 8.1 or newer.

About Us

Founded by Reagan Orr and Marco Cia, NATHLOCK Designs was established on the principles of developing the most advanced products for today’s electronic devices. Incorporating designs that have gone through rigorous testing and using established development methods, NATHLOCK innovates products to create comprehensive solutions for today’s consumers.

Reagan Orr

Prior to his work with NATHLOCK Designs, Reagan Orr was the Director of Product Development at Creative Bulb where he invented in excess of twelve products spanning audio products, Lightings, power accessories, and gaming products. His products, both from his time at Creative Bulb and elsewhere, have received numerous awards and accolades, including four CES Design and Engineering awards.

Marco Cia

Prior to his work with NATHLOCK Designs, Marco Cia spent more than a decade working within the consumer electronics industry with leading corporations such as SZN TECH and Nath Tech. While employed at SZN TECH as a Product and Marketing Manager, he helped to establish them as one of the fastest growing companies in its field. As the Senior Product Manager at Nath Tech, he oversaw and personally led the development of several of Nath Tech’s most popular and award winning products in the security field, such as their first Bluetooth Pad Lock.

Team Introduction

NATHLOCK creator Nath Technology has a team of professionals which

combine the fields in both hardware and software. At the beginning stage, it

mainly helps a renowned listed company (STOCK, TOUCHLING, VIX

MERCHANET etc.) to develop and design products, the team is equipped with

rich hardware and software product development experience. After one year

of development, we are currently equipped with a mature structure in

product planning, product related technology development and quality control.

All the products in Nath Technology can produced by in professional factory

country, this further guarantee the product manufacturing quality.

Our Press Kit Can Be Found Here:

The Risks and Challenges

As former product developers for successful companies, we are intimately acquainted with what it takes to deliver a superior product on a firm delivery schedule. For the past several months, we have been working tirelessly to not only design, but also refine and test our product so that it is absolutely perfect for the consumer market. But rest assured, the photos and video you see are of the finished product.

So what are the risks? With every product comes the risk that manufacturing, packaging, or even shipping could delay the product launch. For a successful launch, all components must work perfectly and sadly, some of these aspects are out of our control.

However, because we have an established working relationship with the manufacturer, and given our intimate knowledge of the design process, we should be able to quickly resolve any issues as they arise. But regardless of delays or on time delivery schedules, we will keep you informed at each and every step.

Learn more about our accountability through our website.

FAQ What devices are supported?

NathLock is compatible with select iOS, Android, and Windows phones devices.

For iOS: NathLock is compatible with devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 and are running iOS 8.0 or later (which includes iPhone 4s or newer, iPod Touch 5G or newer, iPad 3G or newer, and iPad minis).

For Android: NathLock is compatible with devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 and are running Jelly Bean (4.3) or Kit Kat (4.4). Includes the Samsung Galaxy S4 or newer, HTC One or newer, and many more.

For Windows Phone: NathLock is compatible with devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 and are running Windows Mobile 8.1 or newer.

What happens if the battery dies while NathLock is locked?

While a rare occurrence since the NathLock app shows you the battery level every time you use it and we give you a warning several months before the battery dies, it is still theoretically possible. Should this happen, we have included the ability to "jump-start" your NathLock with an external battery. Simply place the battery to the contact leads (per the operating manual) to allow you to unlock the NathLock. You can then open the back and replace the battery.

How secure is Bluetooth?

Because NathLock uses the industry standard Bluetooth 4.0, it offers the highest level of security available from a Bluetooth device. Bluetooth 4.0 uses the 128-bit AES CCM encryption algorithm, which ensures that all transmissions are encrypted and secure. Bluetooth 4.0 devices are significantly more secure than older Bluetooth devices.

Does NathLock add any encryption to standard Bluetooth encryption?

Yes, in addition to the standard Bluetooth encryption, we gave NathLock the latest in PKI technology and a cryptographic key exchange protocol to help keep all communications with your NathLock device secure.

What type of battery does NathLock use?

While the final battery selection will occur over the next couple months, we do know that it will be a standard watch battery that is not only easy to find but is also inexpensive.

How secure is NathLock?

NathLock has several security features built in to help it become among the most secure products available on the market. In the pursuit of security, from both criminals and the elements, we have incorporated:

  • Bluetooth 4.0

  • Water Resistance

  • An Impervious Design

Bluetooth: Nathlock uses the industry standard Bluetooth 4.0 with a 128 bit AES CCM encryption algorithm so all transmissions are not only secure, but also encrypted.

Water Resistance: Because you can’t control the weather, we made NathLock water resistant so you can use it anywhere worry free.

Impervious Design: To make it virtually impossible for thieves to steal the NathLock, we built it out of hardened boron and even included anti-shim technology.

Can I disable the auto-unlock feature?

Absolutely. To disable this feature, simply log into the app and select it as the default setting. Disabling the auto unlock feature can be useful in certain situations where your phone will be in close proximity to the lock (such as in a locker). To unlock it when auto unlock is enabled, just click a button on the app or use the trademark Quick-Click feature.

What are the specifications (length, thickness, weight) of the bike cable and mount kit?

The cable itself is built out of braided steel rope and is approximately 6ft (2m) long, 10mm thick, and weights 450 grams (about one pound). The mount only adds a couple of ounces to your total bike weight, and won’t be noticeable when you go for a ride.

Is the App free?

Since the app is an integral and essential component to NathLock, it will be free.

What if I want to lock my phone in my locker?

To put your phone in close proximity of the lock, there are three possible options:

  • Disable the auto-unlock

  • Turn off your phone

  • Disable the Bluetooth on your phone and then use our trademark Quick-Click to open NathLock when you return.

Can I reduce the range for auto-unlock?

Yes, within our app there is a sliding bar that enables you to select the range that is most appropriate for your needs.

Can I use NathLock while using another Bluetooth device like headphones?

Because Bluetooth 4.0 enables multitasking, there are no complications when using NathLock along with another Bluetooth devices such as wireless headphones.
