child to use, but able to thwart even the best thieves and criminals. 

The Timeline for Nathlock’s Development
Since we have already spent the time researching, developing, testing, and
retesting the design, hardware, software, and even the firmware, we are finally
gearing up for world stage release. We have chosen a leading manufacturer to
build NathLock, but rest assured, we will keep improving Nathlock as necessary
for its public release. Anyone luckily enough to receive one as a beta will
subject NathLock to unimaginable conditions to ensure that our lock is
second-to-none. Once it’s perfect to our exacting standards, mass-production
will begin and Nathlock will be ready for delivery. As part of the launch and on a limited time offer only, we’re offering a very limited gold edition of the NathLock Padlock. Join us on our journey.Mix and Match: Choose from Three interface Ring ColorsBlack, Blue, or White
Supported Devices
iOS: NathLock is compatible with iOS devices with Bluetooth 4.0 and running
iOS 7.0 or newer. 
Android: Compatible with devices that have Bluetooth 4.0, and are running
Jelly Bean (4.3) or higher. 

Windows Phone: Compatible with devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 and running
Windows 8.1 or newer. 
About Us
Founded by Reagan Orr and Marco Cia, NATHLOCK Designs was established on the
principles of developing the most advanced products for today’s electronic
devices. Incorporating designs that have gone through rigorous testing and
using established development methods, NATHLOCK innovates products to create
comprehensive solutions for today’s consumers. 
Reagan Orr
Prior to his work with NATHLOCK Designs, Reagan Orr was the Director of
Product Development at Creative Bulb where he invented in excess of twelve
products spanning audio products, Lightings, power accessories, and gaming
products. His products, both from his time at Creative Bulb and elsewhere, have
received numerous awards and accolades, including four CES Design and
Engineering awards. 
Marco Cia 
Prior to his work with NATHLOCK Designs, Marco Cia spent more than a decade
working within the consumer electronics industry with leading corporations such
as SZN TECH and Nath Tech. While employed at SZN TECH as a Product and
Marketing Manager, he helped to establish them as one of the fastest growing
companies in its field. As the Senior Product Manager at Nath Tech, he oversaw
and personally led the development of several of Nath Tech’s most popular and
award winning products in the security field, such as their first Bluetooth Pad
Lock. 
Team Introduction
NATHLOCK creator Nath Technology has a team of professionals which 
combine the fields in both hardware and software. At the beginning stage, it

mainly helps a renowned listed company (STOCK, TOUCHLING, VIX 
MERCHANET etc.) to develop and design products, the team is equipped with 
rich hardware and software product development experience. After one year 
of development, we are currently equipped with a mature structure in 
product planning, product related technology development and quality
control. 
All the products in Nath Technology can produced by in professional factory 
country, this further guarantee the product manufacturing quality.
Our Press Kit Can Be Found Here:
The Risks and Challenges
As former product developers for successful companies, we are intimately
acquainted with what it takes to deliver a superior product on a firm delivery
schedule. For the past several months, we have been working tirelessly to not
only design, but also refine and test our product so that it is absolutely
perfect for the consumer market. But rest assured, the photos and video you see
are of the finished product. 
So what are the risks? With every product comes the risk that manufacturing,
packaging, or even shipping could delay the product launch. For a successful
launch, all components must work perfectly and sadly, some of these aspects are
out of our control. 
However, because we have an established working relationship with the
manufacturer, and given our intimate knowledge of the design process, we should
be able to quickly resolve any issues as they arise. But regardless of delays
or on time delivery schedules, we will keep you informed at each and every
step. 
Learn more about our accountability through our website. 
FAQ What devices are supported?
NathLock is compatible with select iOS, Android, and Windows phones devices.
For iOS: NathLock is compatible with devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 and are
running iOS 8.0 or later (which includes iPhone 4s or newer, iPod Touch 5G or
newer, iPad 3G or newer, and iPad minis).
For Android: NathLock is compatible with devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 and
are running Jelly Bean (4.3) or Kit Kat (4.4). Includes the Samsung Galaxy S4
or newer, HTC One or newer, and many more. 
For Windows Phone: NathLock is compatible with devices that have Bluetooth
4.0 and are running Windows Mobile 8.1 or newer.
What happens if the battery dies while NathLock is locked?
While a rare occurrence since the NathLock app shows you the battery level
every time you use it and we give you a warning several months before the
battery dies, it is still theoretically possible. Should this happen, we have
included the ability to "jump-start" your NathLock with an external
battery. Simply place the battery to the contact leads (per the operating
manual) to allow you to unlock the NathLock. You can then open the back and
replace the battery.
How secure is Bluetooth?
Because NathLock uses the industry standard Bluetooth 4.0, it offers the
highest level of security available from a Bluetooth device. Bluetooth 4.0 uses
the 128-bit AES CCM encryption algorithm, which ensures that all transmissions
are encrypted and secure. Bluetooth 4.0 devices are significantly more secure
than older Bluetooth devices.
Does NathLock add any encryption to standard Bluetooth encryption?
Yes, in addition to the standard Bluetooth encryption, we gave NathLock the
latest in PKI technology and a cryptographic key exchange protocol to help keep
all communications with your NathLock device secure.
What type of battery does NathLock use?
While the final battery selection will occur over the next couple months, we
do know that it will be a standard watch battery that is not only easy to find
but is also inexpensive. 
How secure is NathLock?
NathLock has several security features built in to help it become among the
most secure products available on the market. In the pursuit of security, from
both criminals and the elements, we have incorporated:

Bluetooth
4.0
Water
Resistance
An
Impervious Design

Bluetooth: Nathlock uses the industry standard Bluetooth 4.0 with a 128 bit
AES CCM encryption algorithm so all transmissions are not only secure, but also
encrypted. 
Water Resistance: Because you can’t control the weather, we made NathLock
water resistant so you can use it anywhere worry free. 
Impervious Design: To make it virtually impossible for thieves to steal the
NathLock, we built it out of hardened boron and even included anti-shim
technology. 
Can I disable the auto-unlock feature?
Absolutely. To disable this feature, simply log into the app and select it
as the default setting. Disabling the auto unlock feature can be useful in
certain situations where your phone will be in close proximity to the lock
(such as in a locker). To unlock it when auto unlock is enabled, just click a
button on the app or use the trademark Quick-Click feature.
What are the specifications (length, thickness, weight) of the bike cable
and mount kit? 
The cable itself is built out of braided steel rope and is approximately 6ft
(2m) long, 10mm thick, and weights 450 grams (about one pound). The mount only
adds a couple of ounces to your total bike weight, and won’t be noticeable when
you go for a ride. 
Is the App free?
Since the app is an integral and essential component to NathLock, it will be
free. 
What if I want to lock my phone in my locker?
To put your phone in close proximity of the lock, there are three possible
options:

Disable
the auto-unlock 
Turn
off your phone 
Disable
the Bluetooth on your phone and then use our trademark Quick-Click to open
NathLock when you return.

Can I reduce the range for auto-unlock?
Yes, within our app there is a sliding bar that enables you to select the
range that is most appropriate for your needs.
Can I use NathLock while using another Bluetooth device like headphones?
Because Bluetooth 4.0 enables multitasking, there are no complications when
using NathLock along with another Bluetooth devices such as wireless headphones.

story:
LT-Stand X 2.0 is an universal laptop stand. Its main purpose is to support a laptop and, at the same time, to provide full freedom of movement for the user and possibility to move the stand with the laptop on it around a room, appartment or house. LT-Stand X 2.0 fullfills both conditions and we can easily say that LT-Stand X 2.0 is the one trully complete laptop stand.


Its main characteristics are small weight and great solidity. It can be used for laptop computers with dimensions from 10'' to 17''.

Basic characteristics


The upper part of the stand can be quickly and easily adjusted for every laptop model. 

Adjustive battens have a recesses as well as PU pads and an adjustive nails. These elements make laptop sit firmly on a batten (almost as it is glued).

Adjustive nails are to insure laptop from gliding off the stand. They are designed so you almost could not feel them.

… at the same time, thanks to all this, you can put the laptop on and get it off the battens easily and fast, as it was with every other surface.

The wings open in width. They are ment for mouse, but you could as well put a small notebook or another light thing.

Teethed holder provides different positions of the upper part. We advice two ways of using it: “A” (the main one), “B” (the secondary one). To adjust the incline the key is needed (not included).

Adjusting the hight of the stand is very easy and could be done simply by turning of the wheel and pulling the main telescopic stand leg.
Under the wheel there is a handle that can be used to move the stand from one place to another.

Adjusting of the stand is to make it more stable, if you need it. And can be done by simple turning of the leg.

Three-point system of the legs give the stand stability and leave the complete freedom for your legs and feet. And it needs much less room.

ADVANTAGES (IN COMPARISON TO THE TABLE)

Ideal positioning

LT-Stand is designed to make your typing easier and faster. While working on your laptop you can comfortably sit wherever you like: on your bed, chair, armchair... your laptop will always be positioned ideally , and you will have total freedom to move your legs, feet and arms.
When you work you have a feeling of a laptop floating over your legs.

Maximum cooling


LT-Stand provides super effective cooling for your laptop because it does not clog its own cooling system and let the fresh air to circle and naturally cool your laptop. As a result the laptop works easier and faster, heats less and serves longer.
As it does not stay at the flat surface and is completely open from under, your laptop does not absorb the dust and dirt from the room. 

Movable

LT-Stand is thought so that it provides easy moving around a room, or from one place to another. Now you can move your laptop together with the stand wherever you like at the moment (in front of the armchair, near TV, in the kitchen...)

Spare the room

LT-Stand is designed to spare maximum of your room, it looks modern, that is why it will be easy to fit in almost every environment, it will become invisible but functional part of your daily life.

Adjustive hight

LT-Stand X 2.0 provides easy adjustment of stand's hight for your laptop to be in the best position to work on.

Sturdy support

LT-Stand X 2.0, despite its light weight, provides sturdy support for your laptop (as if it was standing on the table). And this is really reare when it comes to laptop stands.

Why do we need your help?

LT-Stand X 2.0 is the product we would like to be avaliable for everyone for reasonable price. It is made from 139 pieces, excluding packaging and accompanying elements. The most parts cannot be made individually, but only in series, that is why we are conditioned to make some quantities, not just one.
With your help many people will know about this amazing LT-Stand X 2.0. Because of this we will be able to buy quality materials for lower prices and advance production. As a result we will have more finances left to promote our product and enlarge production. 

PRODUCTION PLAN

… about production capacities

LT-Stand X 2.0 will be produced in a private firm “s.r. BARNAK” from Stara Pazova, Serbia.

s.r. BARNAK is working succesfully for more than 20 years now. Among its products are more than 250 different subjects from plastic and metal for metal and paper industry. The greater part of products is secured with patent. Besides this, one new part of production capacities is ment for development and production of laptop stands.
The products by s.r. BARNAK are known for their high quality, functionality and innovations. The firm is one of the leaders in the field.

… how it all started 

“Once, after many hours of working on my laptop, I have noticed pain in my legs and back aches, and that moment was the turning point for the idea of functional stand for laptop computer.”
Zlatko Barnak

“The first prototype of the laptop stand was very bulky and did not look good in the terms of aesthetics. But at the same time it revealed all the drawbacks, as well as possibilities. Unfortunatel, there is great ammount of such a stands from other manufacturers on the market.”
Zlatko Barnak

Risks and challenges

The model development

As you can see on the chart above, LT-Stand X 2.0 is the last in the series of official models and prototypes and was tested out in different ways, that allowed us to eliminate all found drawbacks. The last obstacle that could affect production, is the material we are to use, because suppliers insist on exact quantities, but we believe that we could overcome this obstacle with your help. That is why it is extremely important for us, that as many of you as possible participate.

By the Serbian law we are obliged to give you 2 years warranty for our product, so the quality of a product is guaranteed. But we propose more than that, because we know, that quality is what we want to be known for worldwide.

All the models of LT-Stand will be put together by hands at s.r.BARNAK workshop, which guarantees you a high quality of a product. We have sold more than a hundred of previous models of stands and have the same ammount of satisfied users. We can proudly say that for the time being we did not have one complaint for our products. We hope that with your help there will be much more satisfied users and proud owners of LT-Stand X 2.0.

It's time...

It's just the right time to use your laptop everywhere and in every place. It's time for you to keep it near with no fear of where to put it. Help this idea to live, be the part of the winning team that will provide the others such a comfort. We can do everything together. And do not miss the opportunity to get your LT-Stand X 2.0 in much lower price in comparison of what you would pay in a regular shop.

Join this project to be the person who can proudly say: “Yes, I am the one who helped this project to live.”

Development and delivery of
LT-Stand X 2.0



Technical characteristics:


Choose your privilegies


Every kind of help is welcomed. Share this project in social media, talk to other people about it, recommend it...


I thank my family and friends who have supported this project and everyone who in any way was the part of this project.

story:
Short Summary

 

We are IllumiNAUGHTY Games, a black-owned video game company that is always aiming to create thought-provoking experiences. We make software as well as hardware. Oso is our first hardware device.


Oso means "Wizard" in Yoruba, an Afrikan language. This idea largely came about when people began calling it "magic" after seeing a demonstration of the device. 

Oso is a glove that allows you to control games using natural hand motions while also receiving realistic physical feedback. The device goes well with our video game company slogan "Life is a Game." We want to make players feel as though they are physically inside a game.

Oso is in it's early prototype phase and we are working towards enhancing the design. Right now, it is just one glove, but the ultimate goal is to create a "suit" with pieces that work independently and together. We are currently focusing only on the glove to perfect the basic idea of natural motion control and realistic feedback.

Currently, for control, a flex sensor is placed on the middle finger of the glove that detects how much it bends. Acceleromter at the top of the hand tracks the angle and speed of hand. We have a demo application where tilting your hand a certain way will either make your character fly or hover/not fly.

Something that sets Oso apart from other physical feedback controllers is that it uses more than vibration to give sensations. For physical feedback, there is a device that jerks back and forth which is great for the feeling of recoil from shooting, but it can be used for other sensations as well like strong turbulence.


The games are played on a PC with a USB connection. The games are currently made using Processing. Oso is also meant to be simple for developers to create games for it.

We envision many genres of games that could be created for Oso, from 2D platformers to first-person shooters. We also ultimately envision a "suit," consisting of pieces that can work independently or together. However, right now, we are focusing on "perfecting" our current glove.

We want to advance the prototype we have now, and we need your help. For the next phase of Oso, we want to:

1. Add vibration,
2. Add ability to track bend of all 5 fingers.
3. Make it wireless.
4. Create an API for developers.

The money will also help us design it to be more durable as well as enhance its appearance.


What We Need & What You Get


$145 - Bare minimum for supplies to build one iteration of Oso Phase 2 ($60 are for batteries during testing).

$600 - at least 4 more iterations of Oso (based on $145 figure).

$1k - Extra supplies for experimentation with look and functionality (buying and cutting up different gloves, trying harder materials like rubber or plastic, using different sensors and motors, etc).

$6k - Hire some fashion/industrial design/engineering help.

$2255 - extra will go towards the previously mentioned areas and purchasing of perks.


If we double our goal ($20k), we will begin to prototype the concept of two gloves interacting with eachother. 


Perks!

We have some really great perks! IllumiNAUGHTY Games's slogan is "Life is a Game." We make apparel that is meant to be fun, engaging, and thought provoking. We have perks that including an IllumiNAUGHTY shirt and you can also obtain a Third Eye hat. 


You can also obtain the current version of Oso. Keep in mind, it is a very early prototype. This is mostly for developers.

Donate $5 and you will give us the warm fuzzies. 

If you donate $10 or above, your name will be put on our webpage dedicated to Oso as a thank you.

All donations $55 and above will also receive a custom character card with crazy traits and abilities on our website. We will update this campaign to show an example after we are done with the design.


The Impact

The future of the gaming industry is realistic motion control and realistic physical feedback. It goes perfectly with the current rise of virtual reality.

“Oso“ is a Yoruba word meaning “wizard“ or “sorcerer.” Yoruba is a Nigerian-Afrikan language. 

The logo is in the form of an Afrikan mask. In many traditional Afrikan cultures, masks represent a particular spirit that is embodied by the person wearing it. It epitomizes the idea of playing a “character.”

We chose to draw heavily on Afrika for Oso’s branding because of the lack of an Afrikan presence in the game (development) industry. 

There is currently a demand for Afrikan-American game developers in the US because game consumers and players are disproportionately Afrikan-American.

There has also been a movement involving people of Afrikan descent, specifically Afrikan-Americans, learning more about their heritage, including history and language. I wanted to create a brand that forced people to say Afrikan words and be aware of Afrikan culture. This is because, although there is a lack of developers of Afrikan descent, the gaming industry has a large Afrikan-American audience.

Not only do we aim to create a mystical gaming experience, we also want to encourage the rise of a more diverse group of developers, specifically those of Afrikan descent.

Risks & Challenges

As mentioned previously, Oso is in the early prototyping phase. In essence, we are still experimenting with how to accomplish our ultimate goal, so our methods may change although the core concept remains the same.

We are very dedicated, intelligent, and passionate people who have overcome many obstacles to get this far in our company. This project is a dream come true to work on. We are mostly just having fun, but we hope and believe we can create a gaming experience truly unique and magical.


Other Ways You Can Help

Share and like our campaign on social media.

Tell people about us!

    The Impact
The future of the gaming industry is realistic motion control and realistic physical feedback. It goes perfectly with the current rise of virtual reality.

“Oso“ is a Yoruba word meaning “wizard“ or “sorcerer.” Yoruba is a Nigerian-Afrikan language. 


The logo is in the form of an Afrikan mask. In many traditional Afrikan cultures, masks represent a particular spirit that is embodied by the person wearing it. It epitomizes the idea of playing a “character.”
We chose to draw heavily on Afrika for Oso’s branding because of the lack of an Afrikan presence in the game (development) industry. 
There is currently a demand for Afrikan-American game developers in the US because game consumers and players are disproportionately Afrikan-American.
There has also been a movement involving people of Afrikan descent, specifically Afrikan-Americans, learning more about their heritage, including history and language. I wanted to create a brand that forced people to say Afrikan words and be aware of Afrikan culture. This is because, although there is a lack of developers of Afrikan descent, the gaming industry has a large Afrikan-American audience.

Not only do we aim to create a mystical gaming experience, we also want to encourage the rise of a more diverse group of developers, specifically those of Afrikan descent.

    Risks & Challenges
As mentioned previously, Oso is in the early prototyping phase. In essence, we are still experimenting with how to accomplish our ultimate goal, so our methods may change although the core concept remains the same.

We are very dedicated, intelligent, and passionate people who have overcome many obstacles to get this far in our company. This project is a dream come true to work on. We are mostly just having fun, but we hope and believe we can create a gaming experience truly unique and magical. 
    Other Ways You Can Help Share and like our campaign on social media.
Tell people about us!

story:
Meet Ultimate BASE 4in1 Wireless Multicharger

 

 

CHARGE 4 DEVICES AT SAME TIME！

 You don't need annoying wires and power adapters any more!

 

NEED MORE？ USE 2 USB-ports

to charge your old Devices by wire as well

 

 

 

One Charger for all your Devices

In 2019 we all have to charge many devices every day. Smartphones, wireless headphones, smart watches, tablets etc. Some of them could be charged wirelessly, some not.  Imagine that you don't need to use annoying wires any more, but just use one Device to charge it all. We created this Device for you. BASE 4in1 Charger.

 

 

 

 

 

We have a solution for old smartphones which don't support wireless charging

 

Just use BASE Qi adapter to make your Device wireles !

 

 

3 coils in compact body = amazing usability

 

 

 

FAST WIRELESS CHARGING

BASE charges your Device 100% faster than other wireless chargers

 

 

 

This Set includes BASE wireless charger, 30W power adapter and Type-C wire

US, EU, UK, AU

This Set includes only BASE wireless charger, doesn't include power adapter and wire

SELECT A PERK NOW!

 

We ship worldwide

We start shipping in July 2019

Ordering now you will get a discount and receive BASE charger earlier than others. We also will send you a gift, 3 short USB wires for better BASE charger user experience. You will have chance to win Free BASE charger as well

 

For any questions please contact thebasecharger@thebasecharger.com

Check our Instagram www.instagram.com/thebasecharger

Thanks for your support!

story:
Aeolos Cher is charging station offering you two versions for all your needs, either in a wireless charger pad or 10,000mAh wireless power bank capacity to keep your devices fully charged. Made to be both a fast charging station as well as a Wireless and portable power bank, it is the solution to all of your battery needs. Up to 15W of quick charging, and 5W of standard charging, wirelessly charges your phone and powerbank - at the same time. Aeolos Cheris charging station which allows to multitask with your phone while its charging. 

Charging your phone and PowerBank at the same time, without any cables.

Aeolos Cheris charging station offers the latest 15W Qi fast-charging technology, but also looks amazing, and is built with the highest quality and precision.

Adopt QC3.0 fast charging technology to adapt to various wireless charging device protocols. 

 

 

4x Faster Android Wireless Charging / QC 3.0 | 2x Faster Wireless  Charging with Qi Fast 

Aeolos Cheris charging station offers wireless charges to compatible phones 5W, 7.5W, 10W and all the  way up to 15W, which is 30% faster than other standard ones.  

 

 

You can charge with Aeolos Cheris by placing your phone  directly on the pad, or  by stacking your phone and the Aeolos Cheris power bank to charge both. 

Stack the power bank on the charging pad and your phone on the power bank to charge both at the same time. Charge your Qi device and power bank 100% wirelessly.

With a full charge, you can take the power bank on the go, for power anywhere you are!

Perfect for being On-The-Go or at Home.

The Wireless PowerBank can be superimposed one by one, from top to last charging, intelligent identification. 

Say goodbye to cables,  Aeolos Cheris is your ultimate fast wireless charging solution.

 

 

The portable and thin design, allowing you to take the power bank anywhere. Keep your phone be fully charged on the go.

 

Aeolos Cheris also supports Pass-Through Charging, allowing you to safely charge other devices while Aeolos Cheris's own battery charges. You also don’t have to worry about Overcharging  as Aeolos Cheris is fitted with an internal control circuit to regulate the  flow of electric current to shut the power bank down when it’s fully  charged. 

 

 

While the Aeolos Cheris is charging a device, the Blue LED will turn on.  Red LED on while error or foreign object.

 

Aeolos Cher is the first product we independently developed. We use a 15W wireless solution to provide a faster wireless charging method and a more perfect appearance, hoping to provide a better charging experience.

story:
Basically Wiboard is a laptop without the screen. When connects to smart devices, your smartphone and tablet act as screen.

 

Increasing your productivity  

Using highly complex softwares for computers and specific apps for windows that tablets cannot handle Microsoft Word, Excel, Project or other office applications on your tablets only support viewing and basic editing. They don’t have as many functions as you have on your laptops. We all remember how hard it is to perform simple editing functions on your iPad such as aligning, font and color adjusting, inserting table of reference. With Wiboard, everything will become so simple.

 Wiboard will help you to perform design tasks by Photoshop, Corel, Illustrator or Rendering videos (Visual Studio X7, Adobe Premier…) as smooth and easy as possible. This is impossible on Ipad or other Android Tablets.

Are you a gamer? Then we all agree that Windows offer a better gaming experience than your Ipad or tablets. With Wiboard, you will be able to play games such as Counter Strike, FIFA, LoL and other Xbox Live games just like you play them on Windows.

 Do you have any Home Theater PC at home? It must be amazing watching movies on a big screen and listening to music on Surround sound speakers right? Wiboard can be your media center, connecting with TV screens through HDMI ports or Miracast and navigating through files with its own mouse and keyboard.

Have you ever gone mad because your mobile devices can’t connect to other devices? What happens when you want to print a document on your iPad and your office printer doesn’t support airprinter?

 Wiboard runs on Windows 10 OS, with 2 USB ports and 1 HDMI port, allowing easy connection with other devices: printer, projector, scanner, gaming joy sticks, portable hard drives, various display screens, etc.

 

 

Pledge €1 or more 

THANK YOU 

We are really grateful for your support! You will be informed of our updates and future projects (it may be real sooonnn!). 

 

Pledge €5 or more 

App license 

Thank you so much for your donation. Your contribution will be used towards improving our “Wi connect” app, which will be available on App Store and Google Store. This app will allow you to experiment with how our app works through other devices. Best of all, you will be given a code to active the app. Estimated delivery Feb 2017 

 

Pledge €89 or more 

SUPER Early Bird: WI BASE

[Future MSRP: €159] Get the basic model offers an Intel Atom Processor, 2 GB RAM, 32 GB storage, and a Remix OS turning your device into an Android PC that gives you access to the world of unlimited Android Apps. The device can be upgraded to Windows if you want, and has a plastic case. Includes: 

• Wi connect app license 

• wireless mouse 

 Estimated delivery Feb 2017 

Ships to anywhere in the world 

 

Pledge €109 or more 

Early Bird: WI BASE 

[Future MSRP: €159] Get the basic model offers an Intel Atom Processor, 2 GB RAM, 32 GB storage, and a Remix OS turning your device into an Android PC that gives you access to the world of unlimited Android Apps. The device can be upgraded to Windows if you want, and has a plastic case. 

Includes: 

• Wi connect app license 

• wireless mouse 

 Estimated delivery Feb 2017 

Ships to anywhere in the world 

 

 Pledge €219 or more 

SUPER Early Bird: Wi Standard 

[Future MSRP: €279] With extra RAM and storage capacity, this Model gives more power to perform more complex task such as Photoshop, Illustrator, AutoCAD. The standard version is equipped with 4 GB RAM, trackpoint, 64 GB storage, Windows 10 OS, and aluminum case. Includes: • wireless mouse • Wi connect app license 

 Estimated delivery Feb 2017 

Ships to anywhere in the world 

 

 Pledge €249 or more 

Early Bird: Wi Standard 

[Future MSRP: €279] With extra RAM and storage capacity, this Model gives more power to perform more complex task such as Photoshop, Illustrator, AutoCAD. The standard version is equipped with 4 GB RAM, trackpoint, 64 GB storage, Windows 10 OS, and aluminum case. Includes: • wireless mouse • Wi connect app license 

 Estimated delivery Feb 2017 

Ships to anywhere in the world 

 

 Pledge €349 or more 

SUPER Early Bird: Wi Plus [for ipad PRO 12.9"]

[Future MSRP: €419] With a more powerful processor and storage capacity, you can perform almost any tasks that using the Wi Plus. With an improved Intel Core M3 processor, trackpoint, Touchpad, backlit LED, RAM 4 GB, 128 GB memory Includes: • wireless mouse • leather skin for ipad • Wi connect app license 

Estimated delivery Feb 2017 

Ship To  anywhere in the world

 

Pledge €389 or more 

Early Bird: Wi Plus [for ipad PRO 12.9"]

[Future MSRP: €419] With a more powerful processor and storage capacity, you can perform almost any tasks that using the Wi Plus. With an improved Intel Core M3 processor, trackpoint, Touchpad, backlit LED, RAM 4 GB, 128 GB memory Includes: • wireless mouse • leather skin for ipad • Wi connect app license 

Estimated delivery Feb 2017 

Ships anywhere in the world

story:
What exactly is Toka!Flash

Toka!Flash is the first of its kind. It’s a complete data storage/transfer solution for those who are always on the Go! It will allow you to wear your information anywhere!

The flash drive conveniently integrates in your Toka! Belt with the help of a unique and well designed belt buckle! That makes your data available to you anytime at a hand’s reach.

From transferring documents, photos, music or video between iOS devices like iPhone, iPad & iPod touch and PC's, Toka! makes the entire process a breeze.

How it works

It’s one of the best concepts to have your data always with you, bar none! Carrying your flash drive won't be much of a difficulty anymore if you use the Toka!Flash. This is one of the coolest memory flash drives which can be easily worn on your belt. It comes as a complete package so you're all set to go from the moment you unpack the box! That way, your flash drive will always be with you without adding to your pocket bulk at all.

  • View, manage, download or upload your photos, movies, TV series, documents and all other files straight from Toka!Flash.

  • Get the ever needed storage upgrade for your device to up to 256 GB (64GB/128GB/256GB capacities).

  • Apple Lightning / USB 3.0 dual-interface – instant and secure sharing of files between iOS, Mac and PC. (iOS 6.1 or above / Windows XP/7/8 / Mac OSX)

  • Wireless upload/download of data between iOS devices and other platforms.

  • One of the fastest speeds for read/write - USB 3.0 read/write speed: 140/20 MB/s. Apple Lightning read/write speed: 14/8 MB/s;

  • Top quality MLC flash memory for longer product life span and read/write speed.

  • Safe & Secure because of no Internet access,. Your data is never sent through 3rd party servers.

  • Free iOS app for iPhone/iPad/iPod touch.

  • 1080p HD movie streaming, direct playback from Toka!Flash.

  • Elegant and futuristic looks with Cool factor on a whole new level! 

  • Built-in USB rechargeable battery – independence of your Toka!Flash is its main unique feature!

  • Device compatability – Toka!Flash will work with: iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6, iPhone 5s, iPhone 5, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad Air, iPad mini 2, iPad (4th generation), iPod Touch (5th generation).

  • File formats you can store and stream on Toka!Flash - media files (.mp3,.wav,.mp4,.mov file formats support) and documents(.pdf, .txt, .doc, .docx, .xls, .xlsx, .ppt, .pptx, .jpg, .png, .tiff, .gif, .bmp).

The main purpose behind the development of Toka!Flash is to make data storage and transfer super easy on the go. So, even if you want to send some data from your iOS device to your PC, Toka!Flash will make sure you get to do so in the easiest way possible. That includes wireless connectivity too!

The feature we think you will love the most – the eight super strong Neodymium magnets! Neodymium magnets are the strongest available magnets on Earth and ours will provide joint pulling force of 6kg that has been perfectly calculated to prevent accidental drop/separation of the Toka!Flash from the frame. Dedicated cut-out at the bottom of the frame allow for easy removal of the Toka!Flash whenever you need it.

Build to last

Toka!Flash main body prototype – Solid billet of Aircraft Grade aluminum CNC machined on Mazak Horizontal Center Nexus 4000 ii for the ultimate fit and precision.  

 

Buckle frame – 3.0 mm Stainless steel, CNC cut on Mazak Super Turbo-X laser machine for the perfect shape. Sand-blasted for discreet matte looks.

 

Our Story

You must be wondering what made us think of launching something like this product. Well, if you are an avid computing expert, you must have been through that experience of heading for a trip when you happen to realize of leaving behind your flash stick on the PC back at home! Even when not on a trip, you must be facing the problem of digging through your bag or pockets for your flash drive every now and then. To top it up is the strenuous situation of dealing with USB cables whenever you wish to transfer data between devices.

We have been facing this for a long while now and it’s time we came up with a proper solution - Toka!Flash, the worlds first of it's kind Wearable Flash Drive !

We are a group of friends who enjoy photography, traveling, hanging out and everything else that life can offer to those who enjoy challenges and a dynamic lifestyle. Since we are always on the go, it’s quite understandable that none of us were satisfied with the data storage and transfer solution already available in the market today. We wanted something more portable and less bulky. That made us get together and decide on designing a flash drive system that will stand out from the crowd and offer superior convenience and functionality at the same time. The idea to develop the Toka! Flash was born out of a creative instant by founder Pavel, who then set off to develop it into the product we bring you here. With further help from his friends and family, Pavel has been able to create a working prototype, which will certainly get into the first production run with your backing.

The main and unique feature of the Toka!Flash is it's design which makes it a highly portable device. Just make sure you have your pants on, Toka!Flash will be there too! We're sure that you understand the excitement that comes with starting a crowd funding project and see it growing before your eyes. We ran some tests on the prototype and to us this is a design we just fell in love with. We are confident people around the globe will enjoy it too. Backing us will make you invaluable part of this project and also the first pioneers that got their waist on it!  

 

Other ways you can help

 If you stumble upon our campaign but don’t find Toka!Flash a product for you but for your friends or certain family members, then please share it with them as we ll as on your personal Facebook, Twitter or other social profiles. We will appreciate your gesture forever.

 

          Thank you for backing our project!

story:
COMPLETA LA TUA TECNOLOGIA DI STILE HIGHT IN TRE COLORI

edizione esclusiva


 

CoverChute è realizzato al 100% in materiale antiurto proveniente dalle migliori ricerche italiane in nanotecnologie. È un innovativo termo plastica / gomma composto che differisce notevolmente da tutti gli elastomeri convenzionali.

 

Come un assorbitore, CaseChute assorbe gli urti temporaneamente deformandosi e convertendo il 97% dell'energia generata dall'impatto in calore. Il calore viene quindi dissipato immediatamente nell'aria e di conseguenza meno del 3% dell'energia shock viene trasferito allo smartphone.

 

 

In una gamma di temperature da -20 ° C a + 35 ° C, CaseChute è il materiale più performante esistente sul mercato.

As an incredibly thin, protective case, Limitless only adds ~2mm to the thickness of your iPhone. It weighs just 40 grams.

A unconventional iPhone case to match your instinct with an esclusive Italian design.

 

 

 

PROTOTIPE WORKING PROGRESS

the 3D design

the mold 3D design

 

TIME LINE

LIKE THE SEAGULL...

Just like the seagull "Jonathan Livingston" abandoned his nest to find the continuous perfection of flight and glide, CaseChute reached a high level of case never reached before, even higher than perfection.

The Charm in the back of Coverchute

 

PATENT PENDING

STORY

Hi, I’m Eleonora Medugno, a University Marketing student from Turin, Italy.
I’ve always loved both technology and smartphones, but unfortunately, if they fall, they often break and the problem is the price of the reparation and the time its requires, too.

Through my life I’ve bought a lot of cases which should have been shockproof, but they always were pretty unsatisfying and not really appealing for the eyes.

That’s where the idea of realizing an innovative, elegant, stylish and actually shockproof case came from.
With the help of my father Rodolfo, an engineer who has worked with nanotechnologies for years, and after more than an year of research and laboratory tests, we have been able to use a unique material to realise CoverChute.

Questo materiale è lo stesso usato per le prove pilota del MotoGP per difendere il corpo dalle cadute possibili durante una gara.

La sfida è stata trasferire la sua nanotecnologia ad un caso di smartphone e il nostro obiettivo è stato quello di assorbire e dissipare l'energia della caduta.


Alla fine lo abbiamo fatto e ora siamo pronti a far sì che il mio sogno diventi realtà. Dopo più di 100 test di cadute da ogni angolo da un'altezza di 2 m, gli iPhone 6 e 7 utilizzati non erano affatto danneggiati e continuavano a lavorare.

Ciò che abbiamo raggiunto con prototipi e modelli è ora pronto per essere realizzato industrialmente per essere utilizzato da tutti.



Io e la mia squadra saranno in grado di realizzarla con il tuo contributo. Sarai ricompensato con un'anteprima dei nostri casi con un prezzo speciale prima di chiunque altro, quando non saranno nemmeno venduti nei negozi.

 

SOCIALE

 

SQUADRA

story:
Hi, Professor Dr. Paul Brennan of Oxford University is our chairman

Barry Fryer, Architect, property developer is CEO

Stepan Tesar Masters graduate IT (Prague University) is CTO

Our campaign is to raise enough money to fund the writing of our existing Android App into iOs as the US largely uses Apple phones and devices.

With our smartphone App in iOS and Android we will be placed to take over the entire inter marine communications worldwide.

We need £60,000  - £25K for a iOS engineer - £15K salary for CTO - £10K (expenses only )for CEO.  Any overfunding will go towards our planned Google Adwords and Placement ads in order to get the message out.
 

 

We are happy to issue shares in the company to investors.  If investors want 'Perks" then for each £1000 investment we offer a week sailing around the Greek Islands on our 45' two masted wooden ketch!  How's that for a perk?

Overfunding goes to advertising.

The Impact

Our Internet project is free to users for the first two years.   There is no such thing at present as Captain to Crew to marine businesses worldwide.  You will help launch a world first which will benefit millions of mariners for years to come.

We have written our App already in Android but we do not have the in house skills to write it in iOS so we need to fund this development.

Risks & Challenges

All startup businesses face problems and challenges but we feel we are more than qualified to deal with anything that comes sour way.  Our combined skills and experience make us a formidable management team.

 

If you like the idea, if you like the concept and the practicality of our project, please tell all your friends and contacts on social media.  Be part of the begining of Crewber.  Thankyou.

Don't forget that Indiegogo have a full tool kit to help you with the dissemination.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Resume

THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR YOUR SUPPORT AT CAMPAING INTO CONCEPT STAGE, WE ARE MOVING THIS PROJECT TO PROTOTYPE STAGE WITH SAME NAME PART TWO AND NEW LINK.

"Thermal Receipts Printer Mod: 2in tickets Part Two"

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/thermal-rece...

 

My name is Miguel Palma from Guadalajara México, I made 17 years of experience working for Intel, HP as outsourcing and Sanmina-SCI companies. Actually, I´m working my own business with the brand MiWebExpreso; providing several services to develop web sites with e-commerce and SEO capabilities, POS, CRM and ERP solutions. Also, as Android developer we had the opportunity to collaborate with local and high technology research center (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z7TpGxHCfQk&amp...) to develop Smart Guide prototype on second phase. 

I discovered the Z play family platform last year and I love it, our digital life will be changed again and technology help us to get more power use of our smartphone for daily life.  

Therefore, our team is working with a MDK platform to generate develop process with several projects like this.

 

What we´re needing from you is your trust and your money to develop present project, valued in $350,000.00 USD

 

We have divided the solution to get a receipt thermal printer mod prototype in two phases:

PHASE 1 - INTEGRATION PROTOTYPE  

  • We will build first prototype with generic electronic subsystems from common portable thermal printer devices and MDK platform.

 

  • The budged for this phase is estimate in $100,000.00  USD.
  • To get all electronic subsystems for thermal printers available to compare functionality and power consumption.
  • To get first mechanic chasis design as prototype integration solution.   

PHASE 2 - SMALLEST RECEIPT THERMAL PRINTER MOD PROTOTYPE

  • The budged for this phase is estimate in $250,000.00  USD. 
  • To develop electronic subsystems for thermal printers head controller into MDK platform to reduce electronic subsystem and power consumption.
  • To design and develop new mechanic chasis as prototype of MOD solution. 
  • Specialized Hardware and Software tools for design and develop.

 

Impact

 

Provide an elegant and functionality receipt thermal printer moto mod :

 
  • Increase Portable Point of Sale ecosystem.  
  • It is a good base for to develop more capabilities for new mods to get information in printed receipt.
  • Millions of units for sale in worldwide massive production.
 

Principal risks are into phase 2.

 Phase No. 2 is the most technology challenge:
 
  • Develop hardware software and firmware with specialized tools  
  • To mitigation high technology risk we are opening collaboration with several professors and technology scientific researchers from several Universities and Research Centers locally. 
  • ITESO (http://www.iteso.mx)
  • CINVESTAV-GDL (http://www.cinvestav.mx/Difusion/Anuarios/Anuar...)
 

Collaborate

 

You can collaborate with us:

 
  • Share this compagnie into indiegogo.
  • Comments are very welcome!

story:
People carry their electronic devices everywhere they go. Our idea is to design something so simple that is suitable for all devices and that can be also convenient to carry in the pocket. 

TP All In One Laptop Charging Station is designed to be the only charger you need for all your devices.

 As a person on the go, our number one priority is to take all of our electronic devices everywhere we go whether it's for our daily studies or work. But it's always a hassle trying to find an outlet to plug in all of our cords all at once. That struggle is a thing in the past.

 

 

The charging station comes with our new revolutionary Double USB cable, 6 different types of adapters suitable for all your electrical needs. You can charge your smartphones, kindle, notebook, iPad, camera, PSP, and even your Laptop.

Charge all types of your devices at once

 Comes with a 5.5mm x 2.1mm, 7.4mm x 5mm, 7.9mm x 5.55mm, 5.5mm x 1.7mm, 4.5mm x 3mm, and a Standard A adapters. Our Double USB cable is compatible with all major laptop brands except Apple macbook.

 

 

 

TP-All In One Charging Station supports 60 watts which is the average power consumption for most types of 11-15 inch PC/laptop on the mainstream market.

With its compact size 4.3" x 3.1" x 0.3", allows you to carry it in your pocket.

Lightweight of 8 oz that works perfectly and yet so conveniently for travel

Each USB port provides fast charging QC 2.0. The devices connected to our charger (2000 mA) can charge its battery up to 4 times faster than with a normal 500 mA USB port.

 

 

Safety is our first priority

It not only protects you and your devices. It also contains environmental protection and sustainability - with RoHS certification (Restriction of Hazardous Substances, originated in the European Union and restricts the use of specific hazardous materials found in electrical and electronic products)

Our Auto Detect Technology can recognize the device it is plugged into and will provide the fastest possible charging speed.

Study for that big exam with your study group or enjoy some great company with no worries of a low battery

Because you never know when someone is in need of an extra charge, you may not want to leave them unplugged.

Revolutionary Double USB cable with 6 different types of connectors suitable for all your electrical needs

Don't wait and be the first to get your hands on the TP-All In One Laptop Charging Station!

 

 

 

 

A normal USB charges 500 mA, with TP Color Cord will charge your device with full current of 1A (1.000 mA) instead of 0.5A (500 mA), charging acceleration up to 200%.
 
 

Charge at highest possible speed from a computer USB port or other USB chargers

 

 

Q: How Does the Charger’s USB Port Change Output from 5V to 20V?  What Is Single Mode and Dual Mode?

A: The Smart Charger will automatically optimize it’s USB voltage by recognizing the connected charging device.

The Smart Charger can produce four (4) charging voltages (5, 9, 12, 20V).

One of the four voltages is reserved for laptop use.

Three (3) voltages (5, 9, 12V) are available by simply plugging a standard USB cable into any of the five (5) Smart Charger ports.

The fourth voltage (20V) can be obtained by plugging the dual cable (provided) into any two (2) adjacent USB Smart Charger ports.

Single Mode  (Auto-Ranging Mode)

Single Mode voltages (5, 9, 12 Volts) can be obtained by simply plugging a standard USB cable into one of the four USB charger ports. 

The Smart Charger has an Auto-Ranging feature which recognizes your devices needs and automatically switches to the correct charging voltage, whether it is 5, 9 or 12 Volts.

This occurs automatically and there is no manual switching necessary on the user’s part. 

Each port can be used simultaneously at any of the three single mode voltages,

There are no special cables required in the Single Mode, so your standard USB cable will work.

Dual Mode  (Laptop Mode)

The Smart Charger’s Dual Mode is reserved for your laptop device. The required 20 Volt laptop charging voltage can be obtained by plugging the Dual Mode cable (provided) into any two of the Smart Charger’s adjacent USB ports.

There is no manual switching necessary on the user’s part. Simply plug in the dual mode cable.

The remaining two unoccupied Smart Charger ports can also be used simultaneously for single mode devices.

 

Q: Why Can’t I Charge A Laptop Computer with A Standard USB Cable Or from A Single USB Port?

A: A laptop computer requires 3 Amps for charging purposes.  This exceeds the maximum 2 amp rating of the standard USB cable.  So it is necessary to use our special 3 Amp Double USB cable that occupies 2 USB ports.

 

Q: Which 2 USB Ports Can Use Double USB/20V ?

A: Any 2 unoccupied adjacent ports can be used.

 

Q: Does the Charger Support 240 Vac and/or 50Hz Power for (Worldwide) European Operation?

A: The charger will accept 120V-240V at either 50 or 60 Hz, therefore the charger would support all worldwide power standards, but the plug is US standard so you will need an adapter.

 

Q: Does This Charger Really Do Charge Faster?

A:Yes, a traditional USB charger is limited to 5 volts and less than 2 Amps with a 7.5 watt maximum capacity.

The Smart Charger provides auto-ranging multi-voltages (5, 9, 23 & 20V) that are scalable across many classes of electronic devices. Therefore, higher power is available to more quickly and effectively charge your device.

 

Q: Will It Work with My Go Pro 5?

A: Yes, our TP-All In One Laptop Charging Station can charge all digital devices, USB or micro USB  - as long as you can plug it in.

 

Q: Does It Have Short Circuit Protection?

A: Yes, the charger has short circuit protection for the safe operation of your equipment. It also has overcurrent protection to protect the charger itself from excessive current.

 

Q: How Long Is the Power Cord?

A: The AC power cord length is 82cm/32.3inch

 

Q: If I Use 2 USB Ports At the Same Time, Will the Charger Create 20V That Might Harm My Other Device?

A: No, after the charger is plugged in, it asserts certain voltages on the USB data lines. The charger measures the voltage on the data pins and sets the output voltage accordingly. For example, when you plug in a smartphone, the USB output will automatically adjusts to 5 Volts and provides the best charging speed; only the Double USB Cable will trigger the charger to switch to Dual mode (20 Volts). This technology will prevent overload current and protect your device.

story:
Stay charged everywhere you  go

Portable chargers are bulky, messy, and require additional cables

Running out of battery is frustrating. Especially when you're out and there is nowhere to get charge.  

Power banks are bulky and require additional cords to keep your device and power bank charged.

Stay charged on the go without having to juggle all the other accessories

The most simplistic solution to power on the go

Allows pass through charge & sync when connected to your computer. Your device recharges first, then the Portal Cord recharges itself.   

No Outlet? No Problem

The Portal Cord provides 1,800 mAh of fast charging power for when you are out and about.


It charges itself without extra cords

Additional velcro strap included

Portal Power Founder, Aidan, started working on the Portal Cord in the Fall of 2016, after having the idea while hitchhiking across the country.

Sleek and durable

Over 20 prototypes have been built and tested

We have carefully selected, and visited the best manufacturer for the job

THE TEAM

Additional certifications will apply

story:
Powmini is the smallest, lightest, fastest 3-in-1 charger you’re ever likely to pack for a day at work, a week away or a semester at college. It will charge your laptop, tablet, and smartphone, so there’s no need to carry three separate chargers for each of your devices. And no need for your backpack, bag or carry case to become a tangle of charger wires.

All you need is Powmini.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

GaN  (Gallium Nitride) is known as the third-generation semiconductor material after the first-generation Ge and Si semiconductor materials and the second-generation GaAs and InP compound semiconductor materials. It has broad prospects in the application of optoelectronics, high-temperature, high-power devices, and high-frequency microwave devices.

 

 

 

 

 

Powmini's self-developed IPS charging technology: When multiple ports are  charged at the same time, each output port will intelligently adjust the out put voltage, current and power through IPS technology; it can be a product with higher charging conversion efficiency, lower temperature, safer use and smaller product size.

 

 

 

 

With GaN advance technology, concentrating 65w powerful power in the compact size that can be held in the palm, which is 30% smaller than the ordinary charger.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The inherent ability of GaN speedy technology can increase the switching speed by 100 times, reduce components and increase power output to achieve fast charging. The GAN  era has arrived.

 

 

Fast charge every device you have no matter which fast-charging protocols you need -- PD3.0 (with Programmable Power Supply), Apple 2.4A, Samsung Adaptive Fast Charge, Huawei SuperCharge/ FCP/ MediaTek Pump Express, Qualcomm Quick Charge 2.0 / 3.0 ...

 

 

 

 Here’s a by no means definitive list of the devices that Powmini will power-up:

 

 

Macbook, Dell, Samsung, Razor, Huawei, HP, Lenovo,  ASUS, Acer, TOSHIBA, Microsoft surface book.

 

 

*Compatibility is subjected to the model and software version of laptops. Upgrade of software upgrade may affect the compatibility. However, it doesn't mean that the laptops not listed above is not supported.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

You can use up all 3 ports when all your devices’ batteries are running low.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

There’s no taking chances with electricity, wherever you are in the world. Powmini has a smart chip that ensures the stability of power flow to each device.

 

 

 

 

No screen jump, no splash screen, no battery damage ,smart chip, support Android system, support iP system

 

 

90 degree Foldable prongs.

 

 

 

 

 

*Traveling to other countries and wondering if you can take this charger along? No worries, we got you covered. Our charger is usable worldwide!

Global voltage (100-240V)

Worldwide adapter available

Support all USB-C

 

 

 

 

Powmini has been years in the making.  The result of hours and hours of dedication to create the slimmest, sleekest charged out there. Now you can buy a charger that matches your devices in terms of how technologically advanced it is.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Powmini has been developed and tested by a team who share a common goal – wanting to bring more ease and more convenience to more people’s lives. Like you, we’ve all had to put up with carrying around many bulky chargers for our devices for too long, simply because there’s been no alternative. Well, now we’ve developed the alternative, and our bags are lighter, our charging more efficient and our lives that little bit easier. Yours could be too.

 

 

 

 

 

GaN Electrical Performance Test

 

 

 

 

We include a free converter  for every charger backed according to the shipping country, currently our charges is using US plug by default. If your shipping address is outside the United States, we will give you one FREE converter according to your region.

It will charge your laptop, tablet, and smartphone, so there’s no need to carry three separate chargers for each of your devices. And no need for your backpack, bag or carry case to become a tangle of charger wires.
All you need is Powmini.

story:
Timeline

The ZUS Connected Car System includes both products that are currently available and products that are still in mass production. In order to let everyone enjoy our products as soon as possible, your order may arrive in two different batches depending on the perks purchased. At the end of October, we will ship the first batch of products. In November, we will ship the second batch of products. 
 

Shipping

Enjoy free global shipping for any multi-product pack. For single-product packs, take advantage of the free US shipping and the $10 flat international rate. Please note that if you're located overseas, you may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees (i.e. VAT/GST).

 

About Us

nonda is a smart hardware startup based in Silicon Valley. We're on a mission to provide app-enabled devices to improve the lives of people everywhere, including those of car drivers around the world.

We've previously delivered the ZUS Smart Car Charger, ZUS Super Duty Cable and ZUS Smart Tire Safety Monitor on time right here on Indiegogo and we plan to do the same with the ZUS Connected Car System!

User Ratings for Our Connected Car Products

Our Design Awards and Media Awards

 

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the ZUS Connected Car System?

The ZUS Connected Car System is a family of products to retrofit your car with the newest technology. Instantly upgrade any car with the ZUS Connected Car System by increasing safety, making it more efficient and enhancing entertainment options - and all for a fraction of the price of purchasing a new car.

Do I have to order the entire system together?

We've designed products in the ZUS Connected Car System to work by itself or together. Unlock more features with the full system.

Do I have to pay VAT/GST?

Yes, customers are responsible for assuring that the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient.

What devices is the app compatible with?

The app is compatible with iPhone/iPad/iPod touch with iOS 8 or later and Android 4.3 or later with Bluetooth 4.0 or newer.

What payment options do I have?

You can pay via credit card. Select a perk and you'll see the available payment methods at checkout.

What security measures are in place to keep someone from stealing the tire pressure monitors or license plate camera?

The Smart Tire Safety Monitor comes with an anti-locking kit - a set of special locking nuts and wrench that prevents strangers from easily unscrewing the sensors from your tires . For the backup camera, there's also a locking kit of special screws.

What are the risks & challenges of getting the device today?

There are risks with production at every step of the way, but luckily for you, we've done all the hard work of getting a product through the tooling process and getting ready for scale. We are using Indiegogo as a way to validate our product. All of the numbers are real, and the backers are real. We want your help to keep us and our team accountable at every step of the way. Now, we just want your help to scale the production process and get all units ready to ship. If there is anything you need to change or update, just reach out to us!

story:
Are you ‪#‎motivatedbymotivation‬? Indie artist Stanford Reid invented a way to convert human motivation into free electricity to ‪#‎PowerOurPlanet‬! 

Why #PowerOurPlanet?

Why do people go to the gym? It's because they're motivated. Whether it's to impress a girl/guy, get in shape, or to look great on the beach this summer, motivated people do incredible things. I am #MotivatedByMotivation, it inspires me. From this inspiration, we developed a new way to power our planet. A way that utilizes the most infinite resource known to man: Human Motivation!  

The #PowerOurPlanet fitness system will change the world as we know it. No other piece of equipment on the market offers you the opportunity to independently produce enough electricity to power your whole home while receiving the benefits of a quality workout.

The workout equipment we are engineering is infused with our turbine integrated resistance technology, unique when compared to its competitors. In order to connect the equipment to the grid you would need a grid-tie-inverter (carried by most hardware chains, but will be included in the retail package. We are also developing portable storage pods to take your electricity with you on the go. For in house use the #PowerOurPlanet fitness system will not be very costly and with consistent use, will pay for itself in just a few months of free electricity. You wouldn’t have to pay health club memberships and you would potentially earn money from a negative meter read. 

Donate to fund the cost of developing a patent and prototype of a new product!

Our system is more efficient, effective, and environmentally sound than any other method of producing electricity. Energy produced by our system is 100% renewable, and is produced in the safest most efficient method. It can also provide low cost electricity for impoverished families, and a safe method to bring power to the remote regions of the world. 

Using our fitness system is also key to the user’s well being --  it can lower the rate of obesity and complications caused from obesity, such as diabetes, high blood pressure, and heart disease. It also gives the user motivation to exercise regularly without having to purchase a costly membership at a gym! 

What We Need & What You Get:

Our goal is to create and popularize technology that will revolutionize the health/ fitness industry as well as the way we think about our energy bills. We are currently working with a patent attorney to get this done. This can cost us anywhere between $8,000-$16,000. Failure to file the correct claims could lead to copyright/patent infringement, so this step must be completed by a registered patent attorney.

Your funding can help us secure the correct patents so we can begin to manufacture our machines. After all that is accomplished, we can begin to deliver machines to our high level backers so they can get first dibs on producing their own electricity as they stay in shape. We will also open a #PowerOurPlanet gym facility with free membership and perks.  

Other Ways You Can Help:

If you aren’t able to donate at this time, you can still help support our cause! Please share our campaign with everyone you know, via social media, email, and word of mouth.  Join our cause. Let's make this a part of our reality. Together, we have the power the change the world!


The #PowerOurPlanet fitness system will be available for home use, but we will create a free gym where members can come to get motivated and #PowerOurPlanet with the power of human motivation. During workouts we produce kinetic energy. Turbines will convert that kinetic energy into electrical energy. The turbine integrated resistance technology we created uses the force created by your motion during exercise to power the turbine. Each turbine will add resistance to your workout that will be consistent with the resistance added by free weights or pulley resistance systems commonly used in today's work out equipment.

The workout equipment we are engineering is infused with our turbine integrated resistance technology, unique when compared to its competitors that waste kinetic energy.  In order to connect the equipment to the grid you would need a grid-tie-inverter (carried by most hardware chains), but will be included in the retail package. We are also developing portable storage pods that will be charged by our equipment, so you can take your electricity with you on the go. For in house use the #PowerOurPlanet fitness system will not be very costly and with consistent use, will pay for itself in just a few months of free electricity. You wouldn’t have to pay health club memberships and you would potentially earn money from a negative meter read.  Similar technology is being used by resort tour bus companies for cycling tours in which a hybrid tour bus is powered by the cycling passengers. Whether in your home or at our gyms, now is our time to #PowerOurPlanet with this technology.

The Reason For Our Campaign

Our goal is to popularize technology that will revolutionize the health/ fitness industry as well as the way we think about solving environmental problems around our planet. We would love to, but at this time are unable to provide any prototypes that will display our design/functionality specifics due to the lack of a patent or the funds to obtain one. Be on the lookout for updates as we near the end of our campaign. Take a stand with us and help us to make this thing HAPPEN NOW!


  • More efficient, effective, and environmentally sound than any other alternative method of producing electricity.
    - Solar panels are currently the best, but the take up space and flat surface area.
    - Hydro- electricity only works if you have a steady current and is not as efficient.
    - Wind electricity only works in regions with consistent heavy winds.                       - Fossil fuels, when extracted, create huge underground cavities (long term effects are  theoretically negative), when burned they damage the ozone layer, and the are not a renewable energy source.                                                                       - Nuclear power is dangerous and environmentally devastating.
  • Energy produced by our system is 100% renewable, and is produced in the safest and most efficient method.
  • Can provide the electricity and funding for worldwide water purification and irrigation.
  • Reduces our dependency on fossil fuels and nuclear power.
  • Can provide the electricity to desalinate ocean water and fend against California's water problem and the many other drought problems around the world.
  • Provides an incentive to stay in shape.
  • Lower the rate of obesity and complications caused by being obese (diabetes, high blood pressure, and heart disease).
  • Provides low cost electricity for impoverished families, and a safe method to bring power to the remote regions of the world.
  • Provides a better economy to open small businesses, and creates jobs and ways to generate income.
  • Provides an incentive to drive hybrid and electric vehicles.
  • Longterm and short-term socio-economical benefits.

How will we go from a successfully backed campaign to a finished product and delivered perks?

  1. We've been working with Celeste Stevenson of Patent Services USA. They really love our concept and are doing everything in their power to help us obtain our patents by connecting us to their affiliate patent attorneys and getting us the best price possible for their services. The patent attorney has experience in engineering as well as patent laws and will ensure that our designs do not infringe upon any existing patents by searching through 30 years of patent history. This is the most costly part of the process. The attorney can and will charge anywhere between $8,000-$16,000 to complete this process. Failure to file the correct claims could lead to copyright/patent infringement, so this step must be completed by a registered patent attorney.
  2. Once we secure the correct patents or at least have them pending. we can legally begin to manufacture our machines. We can also license other manufacturers to use our patents. 
  3. We can begin to deliver machines to our high level backers so they can get first dibs on producing their own electricity as they stay in shape. 

Goals

  1. Have our patent pending or approved by January 2016
  2. Manufacture our first line our #PowerOurPlanet fitness systems by February 2016.
  3. Donate several of the first models to community centers and YMCA's in impoverished areas.
  4. Open a free health club with all free services for members to produce electricity for everyone. Health club would have a free Spa, yoga classes, and fitness instructors and it could all be funded by the revenue generated from the energy the members produce.

Longterm Goals

  1. We could solve the drought problems around the world by using the electricity produced by the #PowerOurPlanet fitness system to meet the energy requirements to desalinate ocean water using electrolysis. Electrolysis is a process in which electricity is used to separate hydrogen and oxygen molecules in water(H20). Electrolysis can effectively desalinate ocean water,but requires a lot of electricity to do so. We couldn't afford to desalinate ocean water  because electricity was too expensive to produce. #PowerOurPlanet can solve the world's water problem.
  2. Donate several hundred #PowerOurPlanet fitness systems to impoverished countries in South America, Africa, and Asia. They could use the electricity to power schools and hospitals. They could also use the electricity to power irrigation pumps.
  3. Produce #POPP: Portable On-demand Power Pods so you can take electricity on the go. You would charge them using your #PowerOurPlanet fitness system and some models will have a crank you can use to recharge it on the go.
  4. #PowerOurPlanet benefit concert with special guests artists. The entire concert will be powered by our #PowerOurPlanet fitness system.

Refer as many friends as you can and when their contributions total the amounts shown below, you'll be rewarded! You will also receive all lower level perks as well. With enough referrals you can even earn a FREE  #PowerOurPlanet fitness system! 

Refer your friends!

They contribute a combined $100, you earn a #PowerOurPlanet t-shirt.
They contribute a combined $350, you earn #PowerOurPlanet Gear. 
They contribute a combined $3500, you earn your own #PowerOurPlanet fitness system.

How Does it Work?
1. Log into your Indiegogo account or click here to signup for an Indiegogo account if you have not yet already created an account. 
2. Navigate to the We Can #PowerOurPlanet campaign page and click the "link" icon on the left side of the campaign and then paste this link into an email to send to all your friends. Or click the Facebook, Twitter, or Google Plus icons to share your unique link on your social media account
Refer as many friends as you can and when their contributions total the amounts shown below, you'll be rewarded! You will also receive all lower level perks as well. With enough referrals you can even earn a FREE  #PowerOurPlanet fitness system! 



Imagine a world where your whole home is powered by your daily workout. Stanford Reid is working to make that a reality. Stanford Reid, a Brooklyn-Based indie music artist, has created what he calls turbine integrated resistance technology. Reid claims that with this technology he will develop workout equipment that will generate electricity by converting genetic energy produced during exercise into electricity with the use of turbines. Reid is very passionate about the project as he feels it will really change the world. He was inspired by the vehicle of choice from his favorite childhood cartoon, The Flintstones, when he came up with the idea for #PowerOurPlanet. Stanford Reid and the #PowerOurPlanet team is calling to action techies and environmentalist from every corner of the globe. Join Stanford's efforts and contribute by selecting a perk and referring #PowerOurPlanet a friend!


Dear Friends,

The "We Can #PowerOurPlanet By Exercising" campaign was launched on 4/10/15, and we would love to have you on board! This project aims to raise awareness and fund the creation of home gym or workout equipment that will use turbine integrated resistance technology to generate electricity as you work out.

We want to come together as humans and utilize the most renewable resource we have to change our world and build a "brighter" tomorrow. With this technology we can delivery cost efficient electricity to even the most remote corners of the world, end our planet's energy crisis, bring about dramatic social and economic changes as a result.
This is only the beginning. We will be successful in making this technology accessible to everyone, even if it means we must launch multiple crowdfunding campaigns and/or invest all of our own money. It is that important to us to make this dream a reality and spark a wave of positive change for our planet. 

We would love to work with you to deliver our campaign to the masses and show them that when we unite as humans, there is no crisis we can't overcome.

Thank you for your consideration and have a wonderful day.

Sincerely,

Stanford Reid, Organizer, #PowerOurPlanet

email: stanup06@yahoo.com

website: www.StanfordReid.com

campaign link: http://igg.me/at/powerourplanet

#ItsYourGeneration  #PowerOurPlane #SME

P.S. Please leave comments. We would love to know your thoughts!
