They really love our concept and are doing everything in their power to help us obtain our patents by connecting us to their affiliate patent attorneys and getting us the best price possible for their services. The patent attorney has experience in engineering as well as patent laws and will ensure that our designs do not infringe upon any existing patents by searching through 30 years of patent history. This is the most costly part of the process. The attorney can and will charge anywhere between $8,000-$16,000 to complete this process. Failure to file the correct claims could lead to copyright/patent infringement, so this step must be completed by a registered patent attorney.
Once we secure the correct patents or at least have them pending. we can legally begin to manufacture our machines. We can also license other manufacturers to use our patents. 
We can begin to deliver machines to our high level backers so they can get first dibs on producing their own electricity as they stay in shape. 
Goals
Have our patent pending or approved by January 2016
Manufacture our first line our #PowerOurPlanet fitness systems by February 2016.
Donate several of the first models to community centers and YMCA's in impoverished areas.
Open a free health club with all free services for members to produce electricity for everyone. Health club would have a free Spa, yoga classes, and fitness instructors and it could all be funded by the revenue generated from the energy the members produce.
Longterm Goals
We could solve the drought problems around the world by using the electricity produced by the #PowerOurPlanet fitness system to meet the energy requirements to desalinate ocean water using electrolysis. Electrolysis is a process in which electricity is used to separate hydrogen and oxygen molecules in water(H20). Electrolysis can effectively desalinate ocean water,but requires a lot of electricity to do so. We couldn't afford to desalinate ocean water  because electricity was too expensive to produce. #PowerOurPlanet can solve the world's water problem.
Donate several hundred #PowerOurPlanet fitness systems to impoverished countries in South America, Africa, and Asia. They could use the electricity to power schools and hospitals. They could also use the electricity to power irrigation pumps.
Produce #POPP: Portable On-demand Power Pods so you can take electricity on the go. You would charge them using your #PowerOurPlanet fitness system and some models will have a crank you can use to recharge it on the go.
#PowerOurPlanet benefit concert with special guests artists. The entire concert will be powered by our #PowerOurPlanet fitness system.
Refer as many friends as you can and when their contributions total the amounts shown below, you'll be rewarded! You will also receive all lower level perks as well. With enough referrals you can even earn a FREE  #PowerOurPlanet fitness system! 
Refer your friends!
They contribute a combined $100, you earn a #PowerOurPlanet t-shirt.
They contribute a combined $350, you earn #PowerOurPlanet Gear. 
They contribute a combined $3500, you earn your own #PowerOurPlanet fitness system.


How Does it Work?1. Log into your Indiegogo account or click here to signup for an Indiegogo account if you have not yet already created an account. 2. Navigate to the We Can #PowerOurPlanet campaign page and click the "link" icon on the left side of the campaign and then paste this link into an email to send to all your friends. Or click the Facebook, Twitter, or Google Plus icons to share your unique link on your social media accountRefer as many friends as you can and when their contributions total the amounts shown below, you'll be rewarded! You will also receive all lower level perks as well. With enough referrals you can even earn a FREE  #PowerOurPlanet fitness system! 

Imagine a world where your whole home is powered by your daily workout. Stanford Reid is working to make that a reality. Stanford Reid, a Brooklyn-Based indie music artist, has created what he calls turbine integrated resistance technology. Reid claims that with this technology he will develop workout equipment that will generate electricity by converting genetic energy produced during exercise into electricity with the use of turbines. Reid is very passionate about the project as he feels it will really change the world. He was inspired by the vehicle of choice from his favorite childhood cartoon, The Flintstones, when he came up with the idea for #PowerOurPlanet. Stanford Reid and the #PowerOurPlanet team is calling to action techies and environmentalist from every corner of the globe. Join Stanford's efforts and contribute by selecting a perk and referring #PowerOurPlanet a friend!


Dear Friends,The "We Can #PowerOurPlanet By Exercising" campaign was launched on 4/10/15, and we would love to have you on board! This project aims to raise awareness and fund the creation of home gym or workout equipment that will use turbine integrated resistance technology to generate electricity as you work out.We want to come together as humans and utilize the most renewable resource we have to change our world and build a "brighter" tomorrow. With this technology we can delivery cost efficient electricity to even the most remote corners of the world, end our planet's energy crisis, bring about dramatic social and economic changes as a result.This is only the beginning. We will be successful in making this technology accessible to everyone, even if it means we must launch multiple crowdfunding campaigns and/or invest all of our own money. It is that important to us to make this dream a reality and spark a wave of positive change for our planet. We would love to work with you to deliver our campaign to the masses and show them that when we unite as humans, there is no crisis we can't overcome.Thank you for your consideration and have a wonderful day.Sincerely,Stanford Reid, Organizer, #PowerOurPlanet
email: stanup06@yahoo.com
website: www.StanfordReid.com
campaign link: http://igg.me/at/powerourplanet
#ItsYourGeneration  #PowerOurPlane #SME
P.S. Please leave comments. We would love to know your thoughts!

story:
The concept for the dtc was started by my idea of an individually made suitacase just for consoles. An idea of a great, unique and comfortable way to transport gaming equipment, which hasn't been pioneered before. Or at least not in that way. 

Supported consoles: Xbox One, Xbox 360, Playstation 3 and Playstation 4. Each console will get a specific Logo on the Suitcase.

So just for that I came up with dtc. Some glowing, seriously badass looking suitcases, that will allow you to express yourself and grab attention from your sourroundings.

This is for showing purpose, how a Ps4 travel suitcase would be look.

Fully customizable

-lighting 
-color
-skin
-logo



Say goodbye to this !



Perks



Who I'am

Destiny  was created by  me Philipp Scigulla, i have a passion for art and creative technology. 

I was inspired to design this suitcase for the Playstation 4 while i was walking outside and saw a guy with his brand new Ps4 in used original boxing visting a friend.  In this very moment, i tought, what he will do when the boxing went old and fall apart. With that in mind, and walking with my Ps4 to a good friend, i got the idea of the Destiny Travel Case . 

I have worked tirelessly over the past 6 Monts to bring these Suitcase from mere drawings to a real life lowbudget prototype. Thanks to my family and friends for support and feedback, i will be able to fine tune the prototype and make the adjustments that everyone wanted. While I'am new in this, i will do my very best to bring everyone the coolest Travel Suitcase for gaming systems!


What We Need & What You Get

I need at least $250,000 to pay for the cost of everything that's needed to produce these Suitcase and for the licensing costs. The donations you give will be used to fund the molding, casting, production, packaging, licensing and shipping of the product. Every penny will be used to pay for making these suitcase into a reality.

In return, you will get some cool Travel Cases. Each Suitcase will come with fully functional, awesome LED lights,  comfortable design, rechargeable batteries, and much more! With your generous help, i will be able to make these Suitcase as high quality as possible. 

Which console will be supported?

For the beginning, you can choose between a Xbox 360, Xbox one, Ps3 and Ps4 Case. For each console you will be able to choose a specific logo.

I live outside of Germany/Europe, can I pre-order a Destiny Travel Case?

Yes. The Destiny Travel Case will ship worldwide.


Is it waterproof?

The Destiny Travel Case is highly weather resistant. The Suitcase and the Electronics are sealed and protected with special coatings and injection molded casings which keep the elements out.


How long does the battery last?

The battery life target is 24 hours of continuous use. Recharging the battery is easy and can be done using any standard micro-USB cable or by using the dockingstation. This makes it easy for you to recharge no matter where you are.


Risks & Challenges

I'am committed to bringing you a great product, and won't settle for anything less. Thus, during the manufacturing stage, I will actively work with the factory to make sure that everything is up to our standards. I recognize that this might result in a delay in my manufacturing process if complications arise, and I find it very important to make sure that these are shipped in a timely matter, but i will prioritize quality. Rest assured i will notify everyone of what's going on so there will be no surprises. 

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways to contribute! Even if you don't have the money right now, you can help us turn this SUitcase into a reality by sharing this Indiegogo campaign with your friends. Just click on any of the Facebook, Twitter, and other sharing buttons let the world know about the awesome Suitcase!

story:
Meet the xWallDock

What People Are Saying 

What is the xWallDock?

The xWallDock is the latest in the device charging world. Just replace your outlet face plate and you will have a nonremovable charging dock that no one can take or misplace.

  • Charge any Apple device using the Lightning connector.
  • Charge any device using Mico USB connector.
  • Remove all long unappealing wires from your counter top.

The xWallDock was invented from frustration that we all share. Charging our phones should not be a task!

Few Facts:

The xWallDock is a Utility Design Patent featuring:

USB Power Charging
Worldwide device charging standard.

Will Charge Almost Anything
Charge almost anything USB. Smartphone, Tablet, Reader... Samsung, Apple, HTC, Motorola, LG, Nokia, Sony, Kindle, Fire Phone...

Two of the Most Used Charging Connectors
Each unit will have both lightning cable and micro USB cable. Always ready to charge any device from almost any brand.

Integrated Design
The xWallDock will simply blend with your outlet and look as if it was meant to be there from the start. The xWallDock is the natural next step in outlet evolution.

Cable Independent Dock
A unique cable design mechanism allows us to manufacture future cables with future new connectors that may become the new standard in future devices.

There When Needed
No one will be able to remove it and misplace it for you. The main reason for the xWallDock design was to prevent anyone from misplacing your charger. It will be there always when needed.

Counter Space Free Again
No long wires to tangle, no more tripping off, no mess.


Feel like changing your outlet while at it? Check out our Perks and get yourself a The xWallDock Bundle which includes a USB outlet.

What's in the Box?

Each unit will come with the xWallDock charging dock face plate to replace your current outlet face plate, and with two short cables. 
One for Apple product using the lightning cable, and one for devices that use a micro USB connector.

This unique cable design mechanism will allow us to manufacture future cables with future new connectors which may become the new standard in future devices.

Risks & Challenges

To be frank, not too many. This is not the first product that we designed and saw all the way to production. As product design and engineering team we have quite the experience with planning products for production. All manufacturing details are in place, manufacturing vendors are in order and waiting for our "Go Ahead".

Our Perks:

Do not need one but willing to help?

Spreading the word can go a long way with the success of a campaign such as this.

  • Share with your social network.
  • Tweet about us.
  • Get one for someone who will appreciate it.

story:
A PC inside a Super Nintendo!

I'm a passonate system builder, and I'm a huge nintendo fan, as well as retro things , so I want to do something different.  Hardly anyone has ever built a PC inside a SNES before but I know I can do it!

I have the skills and know-how already but I need your help to get the parts to make it happen!

What We Need & What You Get

here is what I need

  • A 130w Dell laptop AC adaptor
  • An Intel CPU and thin ITX motherboard
  • Sodimm DDR3 RAM
  • 2U or under Heatsink
  • Msata SSD
  • wifi/blutooth modules
  • various cable addaptors

  • Backers will get access to a detailed build log including pictures and video!
  • instructions on how to build your own SNES PC including Parts list and tools needed
  • and a very big thank you
  • If I however do not meet my goal, I will try to make a down spec'd version of the SNES PC

The Impact

I can only go so far with imagination and skills alone, I need YOUR help!

With your help I can expose the world to PC/console modding and with detailed explanations and tutorials more and more people can make their own SNES PC or even get started on console/PC modding

Risks & Challenges

I am confident in my abilities, I have measured out all parts and double checked physical and technical limitations and compatibility including temperature.  the only thing stopping me is not having the parts at my disposal

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are like me financial wise then you can still help!

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise, share on facebook/twitter/google+ or even a forum you visit.

story:
INTRODUCING THE NEXT GENERATION OF INVESTING

Chimara. Smart & Easy Investing. For everyone.




Many of us are aware that sophisticated investment strategies and outstanding performance profits are in general only available to people with higher net values and professional investors.

This is about to change!


We are Chimara

We are a multiprofessional team of financial experts, highly motivated and all in passion for financial markets. 

We think different. We act different. We make the difference!


And we are on a mission!


Introducing:

THE NEXT GENERATION OF INVESTING 
Chimara. Smart & Easy Investing. For Everyone.



We believe that everyone deserves access to sophisticated investment strategies and outstanding performance potentials. No matter what level of wealth.

Chimara is making this a reality!



Our vision is to democratise investments

We want to expand worldwide and make Smart & Easy Investing available and accessible for everyone!


                                                          

A revolutionary investment program

Chimara will set up a multifunctional investment platform and a convenient smart phone application on which active members, even with small amounts of money, will have the ability to invest and to participate in sophisticated investment strategies and outstanding performance profits.


   

                              

   


                                             



                                                          

Performance Engine

Chimara has developed a smart performance engine. The performance engine is based on a mathematical algorithm that operates exclusively within the high liquid major markets, mainly focusing on commodity and currency markets.

One of the key characteristics of the engine is that it continuously searches the entire market space for relevant information and activities. The engine then evaluates the prevailing technical environment and market behavior using a mathematical algorithm that calculates the corresponding profit potentials factoring all information. 

This methodology enables the performance engine to identify and capture moving markets at a very early stage and to  create superior performance profits.

 



The Investment Objective & Strategy

The investment objective of Chimara is to achieve high absolute returns (independent of any market directions) by exploiting short and medium term market developments in rising (long buying) as well as in declining (short selling) market situations. 

Chimara’s investment strategy is operated by Chimara's smart performance engine. Chimara operates risk averse. Chimara has established strict risk control parameters which allow the performance engine to take advantage of extensive profit potentials. Performance is made by chaining up precalculated positions. 
This creates stability and consistency.
Performance Development


Net Performance 01/01/2012 through 12/31/2015
(net after 30 % Performance Fee)*

34.9 %      in 2012
29.7 %      in 2013
42.5 %      in 2014
51.3 %      in 2015

277.3 % Total accumulated Net Performance

* Supporters of Chimara will enhance their returns by the 
   performance fee reduction based on the level of commitments.

Demonstration of Investment Development

Investment £ 1.000 over the period 01/01/2012 through 12/31/2015




Disclaimer : Please note that the historical performance evolution displayed in the graph represents a back tested performance development based on Chimara’s Management Strategy and generated by Chimara’s smart performance engine. Graphs and charts are for demonstration purposes only.  Past performance developments are not an indicator for future results.                    

                                                             

Chimara´s three core values

       

Performance

Chimara will grant you access to sophisticated and well performing investment strategies which are in general only available to professional investors and high net worth individuals.

    

Liquidity

Chimara’s revolutionary investment program exclusively generates outstanding performance profits out of the major and most liquid markets. Chimara will make it quick and easy to withdraw your funds at any time, no limitations and no restrictions!

    

Simplicity

With Chimara, you will be able to invest as much as you like starting as low
as GBP 500 (or the equivalent amount in other currencies) in an easy and convenient way. Our systems will make it simple to watch your investment grow
on a platform easy to understand and operate.

                                                           

Chimara's Community

Chimara will be for registered members joining Chimara's community.

Operating on an annual membership fee, Chimara will grant you full access 
to our multifunctional investment platform.

 As a member of Chimara's community you will be privy to 

  • set up your personal account 
  • track performance developments
  • obtain relevant information on markets and investment strategies
  • and you will have the option to set up a demo account for your personal performance testing.

Once you have turned into an active member by personal identification,
you will be entitled to

  • connect to the performance engine by means of 
    Chimara's principles of Smart & Easy Investing and 
  • to directly invest into Chimara's sophisticated investment strategies
  • and finally you will participate directly on outstanding performance profits.

You will be able to enter and exit the running investment program in an easy and convenient way via Chimara's web platform or mobile via Chimara's smart phone application.



                                                           

We highly welcome you to join Chimara and to support our vision!


What will your commitments be used for?

The money we generate through our funding campaign will be used to

  • set up a multifunctional shared investment platform
    that can be accessed anywhere in the world and
  • set up a convenient smart phone application
    that will make investing on the go even easier.

Further, the generated money will be used to

  • set up the legal requirements
  • set up the appropriate investment structure
  • establish and expand Chimara globally.


We want to give everyone the chance to support Chimara and its vision!


What will you get in return?

 

Chimara Special Membership

A basic commitment of £ 190 will grant you the ability to become a special member  of Chimara and will entitle you to free annual membership fees.



Chimara Preferred Membership

Higher level commitments as set out below will allow you to become a preferred member of Chimara and additionally to free annual membership fees you will receive a huge performance fee reduction in the event of an investment once Chimara is set up and ready to invest:


£      270   Free membership  + 15 % Performance fee reduction

£      500  Free membership  + 20 % Performance fee reduction

£   1.000  Free membership  + 25 % Performance fee reduction

£   5.000 Free membership  + 30 % Performance fee reduction

£ 10.000 Free membership  + 35 % Performance fee reduction



Together we can build THE NEXT GENERATION OF INVESTING and turn it into reality!



"People are no longer satisfied with old fashioned      and often disappointing investment concepts.  Chimara will feed a new generation of investors  looking for well performing investment  opportunities  in a rapid changing world." 
 

"We believe that the environment of investing is about     to change dramatically and we are convinced that          Chimara is going to become the first choice for    everyone seeking excellent conditions and outstanding  investment returns."

 Statements Team Chimara


We are running this campaign in order to give everyone the chance to join and support Chimara and its vision! Meaning, you will get much more back from supporting us! 

Think different. Act different. Get the difference!

Let's democratise the Investment Industry!
Together!


We highly welcome you to get involved and to become part of our vision!


Thank you!

Team Chimara





For more information about Chimara and its vision, 
please visit us at www.chimara.cc.

Our systems will make it simple to watch your investment grow on a platform easy to understand and operate.                                                           Chimara's Community

track performance developments
obtain relevant information on markets and investment strategies

connect to the performance engine by means of Chimara's principles of Smart & Easy Investing and 
to directly invest into Chimara's sophisticated investment strategies
and finally you will participate directly on outstanding performance profits.

You will be able to enter and exit the running investment program in an easy and convenient way via Chimara's web platform or mobile via Chimara's smart phone application.

set up a multifunctional shared investment platform that can be accessed anywhere in the world and

set up the legal requirements


set up the appropriate investment structure


establish and expand Chimara globally.

story:
The Project - Agent X line of cases

Stop buying so many phone cases! This case is all about you. What you do each day changes and so should your phone case. This case is a unique platform that allows you to customize and accesorize it however you want, as many times as you want. Using a special locking stem system, you securely attach and remove any item to the case as many times as you want. Make your own attachments with our tape we provide or get some from our online store. Try and you will be amazed! No more need to have dozen of cases anymore...this case can do it all!

The Product

What is our unique phone case you may ask? In short: it is a customizable phone case that the user can attach and change various items to fit their daily situation or needs. Make your own attachments using our locking stem tape or use some of the ones we offer. There is no other phone case on the market like ours. It's functional, durable, and will save you money.

The cases are made of a rubberized plastic called TPU and makes for great feel, grip, and impact absorption (I've dropped mine at least a dozen times in this case with no damage). 

The case encompasses all sides completely with covers over buttons and holes for access to the ports, speaker, and switch. The case is very easy to put on and off yet holds very securly.

Attachments easily lock onto this case using the special locking stem system. You can create your own attachments with the piece of locking stem tape we send you...or buy some attachments from our store. You can take many common mobile phone items on the market and use them with this case by applying the tape.


Adding attachments is a snap with a simple press and removing attachments just require a gentle tug. The holding power is directly related to the size of the contact area of the locking stems, so a larger patch of locking stem will hold much stronger than a small section will.


The case will last a long time and easy to care for (the black case shown in this campaign is a final prototype that has been used everyday for 6 months). If dirt accumulates on the face then simply taking the case off the phone and giving it a wash and scrub with a hard bristle brush will return it to new.

                                                   

Note: The locking stem technology is not our intellectual property. It is purchased from a commercial source and added at time of manufacture of the case.

Our Current Line

Currently on our online store at www.mytudecases.com we offer a creative line of Mytude cases. These cases have become real popular and they have been shipped to a dozen countries so far. 

The users love the look and versatility of the design for use with the decorative attachments. The Mytude Cases have been a big hit with the younger generation and has received numerous positive reviews by fans on social media.



Note: The locking stem technology is not our intellectual property. It is purchased from a commercial source and added at time of manufacture of the case.

The Situation

After prototyping the case we found a manufacturer that can supply the cases to us that was close enough to my concept. We ordered initial patches of cases for iPhone 5, 6, and 6+. We opened a Shopify store at www.mytudecases.com and opened social media accounts. The initial batches are focused towards the creative users with bright colors, and attachments more appealing to artistic interests. We placed the first batches on the market and they have received large amount of attention from users around the world. 

We spent a large amount of money to get the first batch designed and manufactured. As we started marketing these cases we realized that there was an even larger demand for functional use by working adults.  It is time to manufacture a large batch of our unique one-of-a -kind locking stem cases for iPhone 5, 6, and 6+ in the color black and white from our manufacturer to appeal to the functional working adult. Our funds are still tied up in the last production so that is why we are conducting a funding campaign. 

What We Need

To reach the market we need your help. We need:

Minimum $10,000 Goal:

With these funds we will accomplish the following:

  • $6000 - purchase a batch of black Agent X iPhone 5, 6, and 6+ cases from our manufacturer for use with functional attachments
  • $3000 - design and manufacture functional attachments for the cases
  • $1000 - legal, administrative, and marketing costs

Stretch Goals-

Over $10,000 Goal:

If we receive additional funds we will just go bigger! Purchase more colors and develop more attachments. But even better we can get some cases made for Samsung and iPads! YAY! 

Over $100,000 Goal:

If we receive additional funds over $100,000 we can start to get real! Our cases are not exactly how we need them. With this money we can have new molds made, which is really expensive. We can address the edge height and add our logo to the cases. This will get us in the big leagues. We will also set up a drop-shipment service in Europe to reduce shipping fees to this area. This will increase our sales.

Over $200,000 Goal:

If we receive additional funds over $200,000 not only can we get real, but do it in different areas. Not only can we get new molds for iPhone, but now we can get new molds for Samsung phone cases.

What You Get

It starts with a giant THANK YOU! But from there you can get either the new black cases or the current colored cases. You can advance even further with a case and some discounts. Or level up and receive several cases with a extended supply of attachments. Big climb to the top and get all our new cases and attachments for 1 year before we release them on our store! If we get enough funding we can even add functional attachments for you. That's cool! 

The Impact

Your support and contribution will allow us to do what we can't do...go all the way. 

Risks & Challenges

Risk: No one buys our cases :-(

That is really the only risk for us. 

For those that donate there is no risk. 

We have a proven product, a reliable and fast manufacture, and we can receive products at a reasonable price. Regardless of what happens over time, we will have the product to get to you. Some of the long term perks may have risk, but we would reimburse on a case-by-case situation.

Challenge: Getting user interested

Our supporters here partially solve that challenge. By supporting us you have shown interest and help validate our product. From there on we got it! 

The Team

We are a husband & wife ran business. My name is Kevin A. Brown. I am currently a soldier in the U.S. Army and currently stationed in South Korea for the next 6 months. I run the business part time when I am not serving my country. My wife, Pearly Brown lives and works in the Washington D. C. area. I have a Masters of Science in Information Systems Technology and she is almost done with her Doctor in Nursing Practice.

                                           

We need your help! I cannot approach investors to get large seed funding until I get out and devote full time to my business, but the time for my phone case is now and I need to seize this opportunity. I spent a large amount of my money developing and producing the first batch of cases and don't have enough to produce the second batch.

                                   

Our business is called Lavish-IT, LLC and we originally focused on mobile apps. About 6 months ago I had a vision of a new type of phone case and currently I am working hard to penetrate the massive market of phone accessories. I recently married Pearly, an amazing woman right before I got shipped to Korea and I am lucky that she is now my partner in the business. Please help us to reach our goals. We can get there, we just need a little monetary push. Thanks :-) 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word, tell others.

Give us your feedback. We want to know what you like about our product, what you don't like, and what you would like to see that appeals to you. After all...this case is all about the user. :-) 

Commonly Asked Questions

Q: Does this use Velcro? Does this use a magnet?

A: NO! It uses something way better! We use a industrial grade locking stem tape that is 100 times better than Velcro and 300 times better than a magnet. It holds tight and is not furry or sticky.

Q: Is the locking stem system your design?

A: NO! The locking stem tape is not our intellectual property. It is made by an adhesive company and is available to anyone. We just happened to be the first to use it on a phone case.

Q: How durable is it?

A: The cases are very durable. The black iPhone 6+ case in the project is one of the final prototypes and the very case I use everyday personally. I have been using it for over 6 months and it is still in great shape.

Q: How strong does it hold?

A: It depends. It can hold very weak to super strong. It depends on the contact area. When the contact size area is that of a quarter coin, it holds very good yet is easy to pull off. If the contact area is that of a dollar bill, then it would hold extremely strong, but would require a very large amount of pulling force to get off.

Q: Is production guaranteed?
A: YES! We have already ordered 600 cases from the manufacturer in the past so production will happen once enough funds are received. 
Q: What model cases do you carry?
A: Right now we carry cases that fit iPhone 5/5c/5s, iPhone 6/6s, & iPhone 6+/6+s. If we get enough funds we will start carrying some Samsung cases as well as cases for iPad.

story:
Hi Everyone  My name is Martin Crawford I am a Safety Technology  dealer located in Eutaw ,Alabama currently we are facing great concerns in our many communities across the USA and the world, with crimes and assaults on young and old women that are unable to protect themselves from being molested and harmed. However now here we have a solution with cell phone stun guns.

Stun guns use high voltage and low amperage to temporarily disable an attacker for several minutes. The stun gun does not rely on pain for results. The energy stored in the gun is dumped into the attacker’s muscles causing them to do a great deal of work rapidly.

This rapid work cycle instantly depletes the attacker’s blood sugar by converting it to lactic acid. In short, he is unable to produce energy for his muscles, and his body is unable to function properly. The stun gun also interrupts the tiny neurological impulses that control and direct voluntary muscle movement. When the attacker’s Neurological and Muscular system is overwhelmed and controlled by the stun gun, he loses his balance. Should the attacker be touching you, the current will not pass to your body!

Breakdown of what the funds will be used for:

  • To make Cell Phone Stun Guns  a successful I need $ 10.000 funding ,the money will be used for inventory and distribution . Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

The Cell Phone Stun Guns campaign with your help will help protect  female students, on university campus and senior citizens.  This is the difference your contribution will make:

  • Cell Phone Stun Guns project is valuable to the contributor and safety to the world.
  •  I have  a successful track record with projects like this  as a safety technology  and surveillance marketer for more than five years .
  • Should the attacker be touching you, the current will not pass to your body!.

Risks & Challenges

Currently I have identified any and all  obstacle's that previously  existed and have all manufacturer  distribution in place . 

  • With my experience and community service  in the industry  no risk exist.
  • By  getting the funding needed I will  eliminate  any challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help Cell Phone Stun Guns

If you are not able to contribute with money, you can also help:

  • Please help me get the word out and make some noise about  my Cell Phone Stun Guns campaign.
  • Please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
THE CUBE

One of our revolutionary product is called THE CUBE. With this particular product we aim to create a world where no one will miss out any of their notifications through a visual-based 3-Dimensional Square. 
Most of the time, we miss out important phone calls , messages, and e-mails because we did not hear the ringing from our cellphone, or because it is annoying to get vibration from your smart band when you are sleeping. THE CUBE will not make any sound, and will not vibrate, but it will catch your attention visually via a brightly lit up panel from THE CUBE.
Any small amount of contribution that you give can make THE CUBE visible to all the people! Who knows few months from now, you will be the trendsetter in the technological industry?


Why THE CUBE?

Unlike any other notifications enhancer, THE CUBE is made to visually grab your attention. THE CUBE is also:
  • Have a simple user interface - easy-to-use device with one-click motion to simply turn off your notification
  • Precision - precise timing between the notifications in your phone and THE CUBE
  • Portable - its 10 X 10 X 10 cm dimension made it easier to carry around
  • Visual - visually grabs your attention without having to disappear after few seconds
  • User Friendly - without any small parts and exposed electrical appliances, THE CUBE is friendly for anyone in any group of age
  • No Delay - fast Bluetooth connection via your phone made THE CUBE have a fast response to your notifications

What's in THE CUBE?

Grabbing 1 piece of THE CUBE will grant you the following:
  • 1 x THE CUBE (Bluetooth 4.0)
  • 1 x Guide to THE CUBE
  • 1 x Micro USB charging cable

The Team behind THE CUBE 

White Liaison is an engineering start-up initiated by 2 passionate students in Singapore. We aim to create revolutionary and innovative products that will cater to everyone's daily needs. 

Fleming Paiputra (CEO) - Currently studying Bachelor's Degree in Engineering Product Development (specialized in Mechanical Engineering) from Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD). My goal is to help create innovative products and share it to the world.

Gabriella Sugiarto (COO) - With a Communications (Public Relations and Journalism) degree from University of Newcastle and currently pursuing Masters of Science in Management in University of College Dublin, I aim to make a difference in people's daily life. I personally love to make THE CUBE more widely acceptable and presentable to people around the world.

FAQ 
Is THE CUBE the only product from White Liaison?
It is for now, but we can assure you that more innovative and revolutionary products will come in the future!
Why do you guys decided on creating THE CUBE?
We feel that we miss out important notifications, more than we would like to admit. Sound from our phone is sometimes too distracting, especially during exam week, and vibration from smart band or smart watch annoyed us during working time and night time. At the end of the day, we wanted to create something that will catch our attention but will not annoy us so easily, therefore, behold, it is THE CUBE!
What is the benefit of having THE CUBE?
It is portable, easy to use and you won't miss on any notifications any more! THE CUBE will not be as annoying as the sound of your phone calls, and your vibrating smart band, especially during exam week or working days, because it will visually catch your attention!
I think 10 X 10 X 10 cm is still too big to be considered as portable. Smart band and smart watch are way more portable.
Yes, it is true that smart band or smart watch are way more portable, since they are wearable. However, THE CUBE offers you something that these devices do not offer, visually grabbing your attention when you receive any notifications via your phone! Smart band or smart watch will only vibrate or make a sound, and will stop few seconds after. THE CUBE will stay lit up even after you receive the notification 30 minutes ago, and it will turn off after you acknowledge that you receive that particular notification. 
Isn't it too expensive for something so small?
It is actually relatively cheaper than smart bands/smart watches out in the world! Can you imagine days without having to constantly check your phone for an important e-mail, leaving it on your desk, and completely forgot about it until few days later?! Paying $99 just to keep in touch with your social media and notifications is an agreeable price to avoid any disaster.
So, I backed THE CUBE, what's next?
If you are THE CUBE backer, do keep yourself informed by checking out our Updates tab and FAQ section for more information regarding THE CUBE.
Also, check out White Liaison's Website and Facebook Page for more upcoming products.
Facebook Page : www.facebook.com/whiteliaison
Website : www.whiteliaison.com
I backed Color THE CUBE, how do I choose the colors?
If you chose Color THE CUBE, we will send you an email after your purchase to confirm your color choosing of the frame. Note that THE CUBE comes only in 4 different color frames, Black (Default), Red, Blue, and White.
I would like to know more about THE CUBE, how to do so?
Need more info about the campaign? Do send us an email regarding your queries to white.liaison@gmail.com

OR you can send in your queries via our website’s query form. We'll get back to you within 1 working day.

Please also read through the FAQ first to find your answer. As we are receiving a lot of special requests, we will try to respond to your queries as fast as possible!
story_txt:
THE CUBEOne of our revolutionary product is called THE CUBE. With this particular product we aim to create a world where no one will miss out any of their notifications through a visual-based 3-Dimensional Square. 
Most of the time, we miss out important phone calls , messages, and e-mails because we did not hear the ringing from our cellphone, or because it is annoying to get vibration from your smart band when you are sleeping. THE CUBE will not make any sound, and will not vibrate, but it will catch your attention visually via a brightly lit up panel from THE CUBE.
Any small amount of contribution that you give can make THE CUBE visible to all the people! Who knows few months from now, you will be the trendsetter in the technological industry?
Why THE CUBE?
Unlike any other notifications enhancer, THE CUBE is made to visually grab your attention. THE CUBE is also:


Have a simple user interface - easy-to-use device with one-click motion to simply turn off your notification

Precision - precise timing between the notifications in your phone and THE CUBE

Portable - its 10 X 10 X 10 cm dimension made it easier to carry around

Visual - visually grabs your attention without having to disappear after few seconds

User Friendly - without any small parts and exposed electrical appliances, THE CUBE is friendly for anyone in any group of age

No Delay - fast Bluetooth connection via your phone made THE CUBE have a fast response to your notifications



What's in THE CUBE?Grabbing 1 piece of THE CUBE will grant you the following:

1 x THE CUBE (Bluetooth 4.0)
1 x Guide to THE CUBE
1 x Micro USB charging cable




The Team behind THE CUBE 



White Liaison is an engineering start-up initiated by 2 passionate students in Singapore. We aim to create revolutionary and innovative products that will cater to everyone's daily needs. 



Fleming Paiputra (CEO) - Currently studying Bachelor's Degree in Engineering Product Development (specialized in Mechanical Engineering) from Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD). My goal is to help create innovative products and share it to the world.




Gabriella Sugiarto (COO) - With a Communications (Public Relations and Journalism) degree from University of Newcastle and currently pursuing Masters of Science in Management in University of College Dublin, I aim to make a difference in people's daily life. I personally love to make THE CUBE more widely acceptable and presentable to people around the world.

FAQ 

Is THE CUBE the only product from White Liaison?
It is for now, but we can assure you that more innovative and revolutionary products will come in the future!
Why do you guys decided on creating THE CUBE?
We feel that we miss out important notifications, more than we would like to admit. Sound from our phone is sometimes too distracting, especially during exam week, and vibration from smart band or smart watch annoyed us during working time and night time. At the end of the day, we wanted to create something that will catch our attention but will not annoy us so easily, therefore, behold, it is THE CUBE!
What is the benefit of having THE CUBE?
It is portable, easy to use and you won't miss on any notifications any more! THE CUBE will not be as annoying as the sound of your phone calls, and your vibrating smart band, especially during exam week or working days, because it will visually catch your attention!
I think 10 X 10 X 10 cm is still too big to be considered as portable. Smart band and smart watch are way more portable.
Yes, it is true that smart band or smart watch are way more portable, since they are wearable. However, THE CUBE offers you something that these devices do not offer, visually grabbing your attention when you receive any notifications via your phone! Smart band or smart watch will only vibrate or make a sound, and will stop few seconds after. THE CUBE will stay lit up even after you receive the notification 30 minutes ago, and it will turn off after you acknowledge that you receive that particular notification. 
Isn't it too expensive for something so small?
It is actually relatively cheaper than smart bands/smart watches out in the world! Can you imagine days without having to constantly check your phone for an important e-mail, leaving it on your desk, and completely forgot about it until few days later?! Paying $99 just to keep in touch with your social media and notifications is an agreeable price to avoid any disaster.
So, I backed THE CUBE, what's next?
If you are THE CUBE backer, do keep yourself informed by checking out our Updates tab and FAQ section for more information regarding THE CUBE.
Also, check out White Liaison's Website and Facebook Page for more upcoming products.
Facebook Page : www.facebook.com/whiteliaison

Website : www.whiteliaison.com

I backed Color THE CUBE, how do I choose the colors?
If you chose Color THE CUBE, we will send you an email after your purchase to confirm your color choosing of the frame. Note that THE CUBE comes only in 4 different color frames, Black (Default), Red, Blue, and White.
I would like to know more about THE CUBE, how to do so?
Need more info about the campaign? Do send us an email regarding your queries to white.liaison@gmail.com

OR you can send in your queries via our website’s query form. We'll get back to you within 1 working day.
Please also read through the FAQ first to find your answer. As we are receiving a lot of special requests, we will try to respond to your queries as fast as possible!

story:
Jalaka Dual is available from our online store!

www.jalaka.com


Nordic design combo is available from Lastu.




New PERK (will be shipped for holiday season):

Perk details: Nordic Design Combo offers Jalaka Dual integrated to Lastu case. Limited 50 pcs for amazing 39$! Check Lastu's homepage for more information about their quality products! www.lastucase.com

Check out the video:



- Jalaka Dual -

Changing the way we use our mobile devices


Take full control of your phone

Smart phones are an inseparable part of our lives nowadays - and for most us it’s been like that for close to a decade now. Whereas operating systems and tens of thousands of apps have evolved in leaps and bounds, the physical interface itself has remained the same.

Jalaka Dual will expand the user experience. Being small, durable, timeless, and most of all super versatile, it is a the best accessory for your phone or tablet!


Expand your mobile experience

Jalaka will follow you wherever you go, whether you’re carrying a mobile phone, a mini tablet or an e-book reader. With Jalaka attached to your phone it will slip into your pocket just as easily as ever. Convenience in a small package!

Jalaka telescopic legs extend and tilt freely, allowing you to stand and position your device in either portrait or landscape mode.  Single handed operation in the palm of your hand, made easy with Jalaka.

Typing, taking pictures, googling, reading, watching movies, or just relaxing - there are countless of different uses. We’re also sure that Jalaka will turn out to be your best travelling companion, wherever you go!





Easy mounting

Jalaka Dual attaches to your device or its case with smart pressure sensitive tape. Position Jalaka to the cleaned rear surface of your device, press it down for 10 seconds and you’re good to go! If you ever want to use it on another device, you can detach and reattach it several times. 

NOTE: we found out that adhesive was quite sticky on this IGG batch so it might not be detachable from rigid surfaces without harming the adhesive. We sell spare tapes for new customers in our online store and people who have bought our product from here can claim free spare adhesive tape if needed. Visit our webpage to take contact.



Best quality for demanding people

Jalaka Dual is made using the best quality materials. The frame is manufactured from aircraft quality aluminum, ensuring a rugged foundation structure. The telescopic legs and ball joints are highly durable and made from stainless steel. Everything is machined with high precision and built to last. 



We are almost there - now we need your help

Jalaka is a Finnish startup: a small team of superb experts in their own areas. Experienced in industrial design and production engineering, our passion is to create useful products with a focus on high quality. We’d like to make Jalaka accessible to everyone, a great product at a fair price. For that we need to scale volumes, in order to keep costs low.

Of course getting production up and running is a challenge for any small company.  To establish more volume, we need to go global, as quickly as is possible. This is why we are here at Indiegogo. We believe we can find the right audience and supporters to get things running nice and smooth. However, we have managed to arrange a small batch of Jalakas so that Indiegogo backers will get one for this Holiday season! NOTE: We have sold the most of the perks that will be delivered  for holiday season. There are some of these perks left so place your order soon if you want yours before holidays! We have also perks that will be shipped on January.

We trust our product, and we are getting up and running. But we need your support and interest in the way that best suits you. You’ll find us on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter. Follow us, like us and share our story, and if there is something on your mind don’t hesitate to ask.


Story of Jalaka



Team Jalaka

Good things start from simple ideas. However, even the best idea would remain nothing without a team that can implement it.

Jalaka team includes experienced industrial design resources. Leaders of innovation and focused upon usability and functional design outcomes, they combine their wide knowledge of materials and production engineering, with a passion for aesthetics and simply great product solutions.

Jalaka’s production manager is an expert in the field of mechanical design and engineering at a global level. Bringing years of experience in the field of research & development, he leads Jalaka competence center of mechanical design, ensuring processes roll effectively, whether in-house or outsourced.

Jalaka’s managing Director has worked in operative assignments for a well-known Finnish company in Australia and Asia. He has been developing a tool production company and has also developed businesses in China. To the executive positions, he has grown through success, in both business and engineering roles.


FAQ


Will I get my Jalaka Dual if you don't reach your goal?

We are using flexible funding and it is guaranteed that you will have your very own Jalaka Dual.

Where does the name 'Jalaka' come from?

Jalaka name is a Finnish dialect meaning the 'leg'.


Can I stick Jalaka Dual on any surface?

We have tested mounting Jalaka on many surfaces and it is on its best when attached to flat, clean surface. Silicone, nanocoated or very bumpy surfaces are not the best for Jalaka.


How to clean my device before mounting Jalaka Dual?

Just clean the rear surface of the device by wiping it carefully with clean cloth, no need to use any detergents.


Is it possible to get this product somewhere when this campaign ends?

Definitely. Jalaka Dual will be sold here on-demand after the campaign ends. If everything goes well, we will open our own webstore at some point.

UPDATE: Jalaka Dual is available from our online store.


Ahoy, where do you ship?

We ship our product worldwide for only 6 bucks.


Metal sounds heavy?

Nope. Jalaka Dual weight less than an empty soda can, approximately 10 grams.


Does Jalaka Dual also work as car mount in my car?

We are using it always as a car stand, hanging it from one leg, but we can’t guarantee that it works with every car. But you should be able to find a secure place somewhere in your car. That’s the beauty of Jalaka Dual, it’s very versatile.



Risk and challenges

At Jalaka, we have finalized the design and ordered manufacturing prior to the Indiegogo launch, ensuring that stock will be delivered to us before the holiday season. If however the factory delivery would be delayed, this might have an impact on the availability of the product within the given schedule.

The development work has taken three years, and of that time, we have spent the last year for the final productization. During this time, we have fine-tuned the product, eliminating potential quality problems. However, we will check every single Jalaka Dual with our own hands and eyes before we send them to our customers.

In order to continue the innovative development of mobile device accessories, the launch of Jalaka Dual must be successful with a high volume. The high volume ensures we can provide the product with a competitive price. Now it depends on you. Order your Jalaka Dual and spread the message to support us. Jalaka’s future depends on the number of people who are delighted about the usefulness of Jalaka.



Thank you for your interest!

www.jalaka.com

story:
ABOUT US

Hello!


We are Teofilo “Chico” Organista and Sonia Romero. We have been partners for nearly 21 years in life and business. We have ran a variety of businesses including laundromats, taxi services, and cell phone repair services.


When running the cell phone repair service, we always ran into the issue of needing to charge phones but having a mess of cables everywhere. That is where the idea of IA Charger came about.



IA Charger is a dual, retractable cable charging station for both Apple and Android phones. Our goal was to create a charging station that works for everyone and could be placed in convenient places, without leaving cables everywhere, so people could leave their phones charging while they socialize.


IA Charger is targeted for business. Our goal is to have IA Chargers at bars, restaurants, cafes, airports, salons, taxi cars, hotels, waiting rooms, and any other public place where you may be waiting for a while. Unfortunately, everyone has to wait at times, but with IA charger you won't feel the inconvenience of a dead battery while you do.



We started off with prototypes made from 3D printed shells but we have now acquired a mold for a smooth more appealing look. However, we need your help. In order to accomplish our goal, we need funding in order to send out the chargers but also create the 2nd generation of chargers that will be an overall better charging experience. 
FUNDING GOAL
We are asking for $35,000. We will use $15,000 for parts, which will include packaging. $10,000 for the mold. And $10,000 for Research, Development, and Indiegogo fees (indiegogo will be about $3,100) 
Rewards
If you donate $12, you will receive 50% off discount for IA Charger.
If you donate $25, you will receive 1 IA Charger.
If you donate $45, you will receive 2 IA Charger.
If you donate $65, you will receive 3 IA Charger.
If you donate $85 you will receive 4 IA Charger.
If you donate $100, you will receive 5 IA Chargers

story:
They say, "Necessity is the mother of invention."

This is so very true. I personally needed this program and searched for something simple, and complete. I could not find it, so, by accident, I came upon the solution and have benefited from it since January 22 of this year(2016).

FAMLi is a blend between a Spreadsheet, word processor and Database. It was shown to some friends and clients, after which it developed it into something much larger than anticipated.

You see, everyone has the same digital issue... lost data, hard to find data, too many programs to have to keep open, and the list goes on. We need to get to documents, files, folders, programs, websites, images, PDFs, videos, emails and more. We need to access clouds, networks and all manner of places on the world wide web! All done from ONE PAGE in 2 Clicks!


Imagine being able to get to everything you need very fast, any time, with EVERYTHING on one page! Anything you need is only 2 clicks away.

I can do that now, as can many of my clients and beta testers. No more open windows for "convenience" taking up processor speed and screen space.

Features

  1. No programming
  2. Inexpensive
  3. Customizable
  4. UNLIMITED LICENSING! No License renewal
  5. EVERYTHING is on one page. Click!
  6. Keeps your computer running faster
  7. No NAG ware
  8. No upgrade Hounding
  9. Backwards/Forwards Compatible
  10. Easy to transfer (Cut and Paste)
  11. Nothing Fancy to break
  12. Easy to learn

What has FAMLi done for me?

  • I have instant access to a time-line for my projects. I know what happened, when it happened and what was done about it.
  • I have NO searching to do. Literally.
  • I can update everything very fast and link to other programs that keep data related to the projects.
  • FAMLi has freed up so much time, that I had to buy new instruments to learn to play. (That is what I told my wife, so I need your support on this, folks!)


  • It is entertaining to open FAMLi and look at accounting and banking. Everything is on one page.
  • My computer runs faster since I do not need to keep all those windows open for "convenience".
  • I have no fear when someone asks when this or that happened. I no longer have to search, I simply "find".

Time-Line Example (included in FAMLi)

FAMLi offers any level of detail you wish to keep track of.

You can use any picture or title that you want, like wallpaper. I happen to be a Star Trek Fan, so let's start with my personal cover page:

Here you have all your projects, clients, patients, school or college classes, etc.

Keep track of your thoughts, your work, your business, your life.

Everyone has great ideas...and my clients did... they "one-upped" me.

While it is great to have the software working the way it does on your home desktop... WHAT IF, you could make FAMLi portable! Take the familiarity, and that convenience, with you anywhere!

Use it on any computer...anywhere, anytime, any operating system. That is what they have tasked me with!

You don’t need the laptop, but you can take it if you like. I do. The laptop has the standard stuff on it, but the real data is on all the devices you see above. Below is what you see when FAMLi is plugged in. Click on Run...

How many of you really clicked on the run? Be honest!

Ok, its portable, were my clients happy? Sort of...they wanted everything including the FAMLi Sync! So, ok... we now Sync the data so everything stays aligned. What ever you plug into the FAMLi members Sync with each other.

Ok, it is Syncing now, were my clients happy? Sort of...they wanted to make sure there was encryption on the devices. The portable devices are so small, perhaps they might misplace them, then what?

Ok, it is now encrypted, were my clients happy? Well, sort of. You see, encryption can be broken... just like all those requests did to me:

The next request will mean a partnership with some additional companies. They want to make FAMLi "mission impossible" proof. If the wrong PW is put in more than twice, the data goes up in a puff of smoke (without the smoke, of course.)

Never use an open WiFi...we all know that (or at least heard it), so now my clients want a safe way to browse and check their banking and emails with no concerns of sniffers being around the corner, or in another room above or below. We can do that! I do! We may team up with Keezo, another Indiegogo member.

So the result is, you have your FAMLi wherever you go, all your data, familiar programs, tools, email programs and personal browsers. Feel right at home no matter where you need to be, and know that FAMLi will never leave any digital dust on the host computer at a friend's house, hotel or even a competitor’s office. Maybe the Pentagon needs our FAMLi rather than those "always-getting-lost-laptops"!

It all stays in the FAMLi. (Yes, that was intentional). (Grin) Just watch out for that printer though!! They have lots of memories, so take care of what you print. That "cool" selfie you took in the shower might make it onto Facebook!

Can We Do IT?

Yes. It just takes time and money. The time we have, the money...well...we are hoping so... with your help. All contributors will get the FAMLi Desktop. We just want the program to be slick and meet as many needs as possible. I would not mind the encryption, and there are many out there that do not like the cloud...I am one of those.

The Cloud

The cloud is not a "safe place". That should be obvious now. Here are just a few articles that support the notion that these companies are all forced to offer a key to any authority when asked. Here are some articles on the matter:

  • https://reviews.gethuman.com/Indiegogo/No-response-to-multiple-emails-buggy-website-ove/_~r213536
  • http://computer.howstuffworks.com/cloud-computing/files-safe-in-the-cloud.htm
  • http://www.blackstratus.com/how-safe-cloud-security/
  • https://www.google.com/?gws_rd=ssl#q=The+cloud+is+not+safe

FAMLi allows you to keep your data safer, and away from prying keyboards by making data management easy and fast with incremental backups, to keep your data local and private.

Thanks to my clients insistence, everyone can now keep it all in the FAMLi with as many backups as they need. Remember, no licensing restrictions.

At least, you have a practical choice concerning your level of security now.

Perks

This is where things get interesting. The goal of FAMLi is to build a great customer base, make improvements (when practical!) and get FAMLi ready for a larger entity to take it over and grow it.

There is a good business plan in place. If we all participate, and polish the program as much as we can, someone will look to buy it up...happens all the time. To keep contributors loyal, we will be sharing profits with all contributors. 18% of the sales will be allocated to share in a rebate. Spend it on another product, support another inventor, or take your better half out to dinner.



The way this works is to have your friends buy one copy. And their friends buy one copy. The resulting sales will arouse the interest of those larger entities. You can do the math on the earnings, it is simple. Point is, you all get the program, get organised... like me... and receive something more. Help to participate in the FAMLi sales, improvements and, possibly, its buyout. That is the goal. After all, you saw how my clients broke me on the encryption request! We are building to share and ultimately to sell. To me, it's only fair.

FAMLi PERK REBATES

Indiegogo people are loyal, and we want to reward that loyalty. 18% of profits will be allocated for re-distribution to our backers. It seems fair, more fair than banks! Supporters deserve more than just the product when possible.

Some time ago, I walked into a local computer parts store where I saw a small laptop I liked, an MSI. The owner gave it to me! Just handed it over. WHAT??? Turns out, I was his best customer. I bought more parts and stuff than anyone else. I liked the feeling, and want to offer it back to FAMLi supporters.

Read the perks section and choose only what you can afford.

All FAMLi programs come with Income Analysis and Travel Expense programs built in.


SUMMARY

  • FAMLi allows you to do more work in less time because you waste no time hunting for anything.
  • Multi-tasking is made simple. Have a thought on a project, an epiphany maybe? Click on that project, click on the notes (if need be) and jot it down fast! Then you are right back where you were, and you are free to cruise along with that epiphany safely documented. It is a good feeling.
  • FAMLi replaces no programs...rather it compliments ALL programs. FAMLi is intended to help you navigate all your data from one simple page.

Here is one of my project pages, this one for Indie, in fact:

From here I can get to any file or folder related to this project, or link to other computers, the server, or the web. No hunting. Click , click and I am there.

  • Pages are animated to keep your attention where it is needed. The calendar flashes for appointments (see video below) that are upcoming, or events that are critical...anniversaries! A real game-changer if one is missed!
  • I have a complete verbose time line of everything. It can be shared with 2 clicks as needed. I know all the costs... I know everything about the project.
  • Even this program was managed by FAMLi.
  • FAMLi keeps things private, portable and up to date. Choose your level of Paranoia Security.
  • Backup, work and share offline or off-grid.

    • Your digital world is now under YOUR control!!


    Was designed to keep us from drowning in Digital Data.
    The "TEAM"

    Of course, I have my many collaborators that help, comment and buy beer on special occasions. They have been invaluable reviewers and supporters. Oddly, I don't see them sitting next to me at 2AM when I am coding...Weird, eh?

    FAQs

    1. Does FAMLi come with links that work?
      / No and Yes... We link to the folders we made for you in the portable version, but really have no way to link your data for you. It is simple though.
    2. How do I create links?
      / good grief, really? Well, in our FAMLi we do it the same as most email programs, word processors and spreadsheets...highlight the word(s), click an icon, navigate to the file or folder. Done. 3 seconds.
    3. Can't I make this program for myself?
      /Absolutely!!!... it took me only five years to figure it all out. Let me know how it goes for you! Let's talk again in July 2021.
    4. Do I need to have FAMLi up all the time?
      / No. And I would not recommend it because of potential file corruption during possible electrical issues. I use a keyboard shortcut to open it when needed. CTL+ALT+F for me. Can you guess what the F is for? No! Wrong F!
    5. Do I need to link everything?
      / I don't. I link to what I use and need the most. My rule is 2 clicks and I am where I need to be at any time.
    6. How big can FAMLi get? Outlook Express has a 2G limit.
      / You will not hit that limit since FAMLi is mostly Text. I am at only 900Kb at the moment! That is smaller than a camera picture!
    7. How many versions of FAMLi are there?
      / Two: The FAMLi Desktop and The FAMLi Suite.
    8. Do I need to be smart to use FAMLi?
      / You will be smarter if you do! Truthfully, though, FAMLi has only been tested with autonomous bipedal life forms... I have no idea how well your FAMLi pet will do.
    9. Can I PW Protect FAMLi?
      / AH, shucks, we missed that one! Nah, JK... of course you can.
    10. How many copies of FAMLi can I make?
      / How many computers do you want to put it on? That is how many copies you are allowed to make.
    11. What if I get stuck on something?
      / FAMLi is a hybrid open source program that you will be familiar with. There will also be video tutorials that take you through everything you need to know in just 3 minutes (or so). If that fails you, drop us an email. If that fails you, the assumption on our end will be that you are a quadruped, and we do not support them at this time. Sorry Pooch.
    12. If I don't put anything into FAMLi, will it work?
      / Please buy a copy of Quick Books, install it on your computer and call their tech support. Ask that same question, please. They need some cheering up.
    13. Do I need dual monitors like you have?
      / Nope. They work on laptops also, but I have another portable monitor for that as well. Personally, I am not a single Screen Guy! Here is an example of what I mean...keep in mind this was back in the day!

      Yeah...I know, right?
    14. Does FAMLi pester users to upgrade, update and renew?
      / No, No and NO! No pestering, no nag-ware, no upgrading, no threats, no pop-ups. It is yours.
    15. CAN I upgrade if I want to?
      / Yes. There will be improvements on the FAMLiSoftware.com site when they become available. There will be a description of what is new. You may not need it. More than likely, it will be Tips and Tricks sort of stuff.


    Risks & Challenges

    FAMLi has minimal risks since it is currently functional. At the very least, the program that is now in use could be released. The idea and effort here is to make our FAMLi better and: Language Independent: PC, Mac iOS.


    Goals:

    • Make FAMLi operational on all platforms: iOS is the only one left that needs some attention.
    • Work on the logos and graphics to make them more attractive and robust.
    • Customize the interface for FAMLi's specific application while keeping it familiar and fun.
    • Bring this to the cloud and local networks.
    • Partner with other security savvy hardware vendors.
    • Make the program attractive enough for a larger company (or individual) to buy and bring to a larger market such as Twitter or Facebook. That is where all contributors benefit. We all use the program, improve the program and we all benefit from the sales. A true team effort.

    Funding will be used to meet the Programming and Partnership needs outlined, while keeping the program simple and more functional.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Contributions are, of course, the main way to help in any campaign, but there are other ways to help as well.

    • Spread the word to students, doctors, small and large businesses everywhere. Nearly everyone likes to work with familiar tools and their own data. Use your social networks to help make others aware of this helpful and self-contained program.
    • We have not thought of everything. In fact, this idea was born out of one sole purpose, but others offered ideas that have made it grow. You can do the same. Offer suggestions as to what we might add. Be a part of the FAMLi and let's share in the rewards.

    This is a novel program that is community based and community driven.

    FAMLi Lunch and Launch
story_txt:
They say, "Necessity is the mother of invention." 

This is so very true. I personally needed this program and searched for something simple, and complete. I could not find it, so, by accident, I came upon the solution and have benefited from it since January 22 of this year(2016).
FAMLi is a blend between a Spreadsheet, word processor and Database. It was shown to some friends and clients, after which it developed it into something much larger than anticipated.
You see, everyone has the same digital issue... lost data, hard to find data, too many programs to have to keep open, and the list goes on.  We need to get to documents, files, folders, programs, websites, images, PDFs, videos, emails and more. We need to access clouds, networks and all manner of places on the world wide web! All done from ONE PAGE in 2 Clicks!



Imagine being able to get to everything you need very fast, any time, with EVERYTHING on one page! Anything you need is only 2 clicks away. 


I can do that now, as can many of my clients and beta testers. No more open windows for "convenience" taking up processor speed and screen space. Features


No programming
Inexpensive
Customizable
UNLIMITED LICENSING! No License renewal

EVERYTHING is on one page. Click!

Keeps your computer running faster
No NAG ware
No upgrade Hounding
Backwards/Forwards Compatible
Easy to transfer (Cut and Paste)
Nothing Fancy to break
Easy to learn


What has FAMLi done for me?

I have instant access to a time-line for my projects. I know what happened, when it happened and what was done about it.
I have NO searching to do. Literally.
I can update everything very fast and link to other programs that keep data related to the projects. 


FAMLi has freed up so much time, that I had to buy new instruments to learn to play. (That is what I told my wife, so I need your support on this, folks!)


It is entertaining to open FAMLi and look at accounting and banking. Everything is on one page.
My computer runs faster since I do not need to keep all those windows open for "convenience".
I have no fear when someone asks when this or that happened. I no longer have to search, I simply "find".

Time-Line Example (included in FAMLi)



FAMLi offers any level of detail you wish to keep track of. 
You can use any picture or title that you want, like wallpaper. I happen to be a Star Trek Fan, so let's start with my personal cover page:



Here you have all your projects, clients, patients, school or college classes, etc. 
  Keep track of your thoughts, your work, your business, your life. Everyone has great ideas...and my clients did... they "one-upped" me. 
While it is great to have the software working the way it does on your home desktop... WHAT IF, you could make FAMLi portable! Take the familiarity, and that convenience, with you anywhere! 
Use it on any computer...anywhere, anytime, any operating system. That is what they have tasked me with! 


You don’t need the laptop, but you can take it if you like. I do. The laptop has the standard stuff on it, but the real data is on all the devices you see above. Below is what you see when FAMLi is plugged in. Click on Run...                   
How many of you really clicked on the run? Be honest! 
Ok, its portable, were my clients happy? Sort of...they wanted everything including the FAMLi Sync! So, ok... we now Sync the  data  so everything stays aligned. What ever you plug into the FAMLi members Sync with each other. 
Ok, it is Syncing now, were my clients happy? Sort of...they wanted to make sure there was encryption on the devices. The portable devices are so small, perhaps they might misplace them, then what? 
Ok, it is now encrypted, were my clients happy? Well, sort of. You see, encryption can be broken... just like all those requests did to me:


The next request will mean a partnership with some additional companies. They want to make FAMLi "mission impossible" proof. If the wrong PW is put in more than twice, the data goes up in a puff of smoke (without the smoke, of course.)  Never use an open WiFi...we all know that (or at least heard it), so now my clients want a safe way to browse and check their banking and emails with no concerns of sniffers being around the corner, or in another room above or below. We can do that! I do! We may team up with Keezo, another Indiegogo member.     So the result is, you have your FAMLi wherever you go, all your data, familiar programs, tools, email programs and personal browsers. Feel right at home no matter where you need to be, and know that FAMLi will never leave any digital dust on the host computer at a friend's house, hotel or even a competitor’s office. Maybe the Pentagon needs our FAMLi rather than those "always-getting-lost-laptops"! 
It all stays in the FAMLi. (Yes, that was intentional). (Grin) Just  watch out for that printer though!! They have lots of memories, so take care of what you print. That "cool" selfie you took in the shower might make it onto Facebook! 
Can We Do IT?
Yes. It just takes time and money. The time we have, the money...well...we are hoping so... with your help. All contributors will get  the FAMLi Desktop. We just want the program to be slick and meet as many needs as possible. I would not mind the encryption, and there are many out there that do not like the cloud...I am one of those. 

The Cloud

The cloud is not a "safe place". That should be obvious now. Here are just a few articles that support the notion that these companies are all forced to offer a key to any authority when asked. Here are some articles on the matter: 
https://reviews.gethuman.com/Indiegogo/No-response-to-multiple-emails-buggy-website-ove/_~r213536
http://computer.howstuffworks.com/cloud-computing/files-safe-in-the-cloud.htm
http://www.blackstratus.com/how-safe-cloud-security/
https://www.google.com/?gws_rd=ssl#q=The+cloud+is+not+safe
