story:
One day a member of our design team came into work, put on her glasses, and asked “why is this case just a case, why can it not do something as it sits on my desk all day taking up space?” The great news for you is that not only have we designed such a glasses case, but we have also engineered, sourced and started tooling. Last month we launched on Kickstarter to get funding to create the tooling for BOB. Thanks to the amazing support of our backers, we smashed through our goal and ended up with more than 3 times what we originally asked for. This money allowed us to start tooling halfway through the campaign so that BOB could reach our backers sooner.

We came to Indiegogo to offer BOB to a whole new crowd who may not have had the chance to see him yet. Our tooling will be finished the day this campaign ends and we want you to contribute towards the very first order of BOBs. If you order now, BOB will be with you by November, just in time for Christmas. 



BOB allows you to set up a mini workstation or entertainment center on the go where your devices can be set at different angles to suit writing, typing or watching TV and both phone and tablet can be held at the same time. BOB has taken that habit of getting in and dumping everything from your pockets onto your desk, bedside table or kitchen counter and created a portable home for all of that desk mess. 




BOB is moulded for strength and protection, designed to be both comfortable and stylish. It will fit the largest of wayfarer glasses, and will stand tablets in portrait or landscape in two viewing angles (Tablets more than 12" in landscape only).

Made from strong but light ABS plastic with rounded corners and satin finish, BOB is as stylish as the devices he displays. The protective fabric inlay cushions your lenses whilst the subtle magnetic clasps hold the case securely closed.

BOB is Currently available in 3 different colours, White, Black and Orange, each with a slick slate grey inlay.




Who are Bang Creations? We are an award winning UK design studio that have been designing, developing and delivering products to market for large internationals through to start ups for the last 15 years. What makes Bang unique is that we invent new products that can be manufactured for the right price, for the right market through the right distribution channel. 

We have just been awarded the 2016 German Design Award for our latest product Colandish which has just come to market globally. 

BOB is the first product we have developed that we are taking direct to the end customer without selling through distribution first. Bang recognizes that crowd funding ideas is the future for product innovation and we can't wait to get BOB to our backers.  





This is our first crowd funded product, so we are still learning but we're learning quickly and have spoken to lots of funding veterans to give us some tips. 

This is a flexibly funded project meaning that even if we do not reach our full goal of £2500, you will still get your BOB. The risk is all on us.

Taking a product to market is all something we're very familiar with. Bang Creations have been designing, developing and delivering product to market for businesses and start-ups for over 10 years so we know all of the challenges you can face. 

Common stumbling blocks include:

Not being 100% developed when handing over to production - 
BOB has been developed with the manufacturer and the final CAD has been done by their tooling engineers.

Not getting the product made for the right price to be commercial - 
BOB has been designed and costed to allow for a distributor margin as well as the trade margins should BOB make it to retail.

Not accounting for fulfillment costs - 
We have contracted a fulfillment house to take the product from production line to your home address and costed their service into the product.

Not protecting your ideas or making sure you do not infringe other parties IP - 
We checked that we are not infringing IP and have protected our design with patent, trade mark and design right.

The best way to help bring BOB to market is to pre-order one yourself!

Don’t wear glasses? - Why not get one as a gift? It’s never too early to start Christmas shopping.

Don’t have the money to invest right now? - That’s ok, it would mean the world to us if you would share BOB with your friends, family, colleagues, postmen and anyone else you think may be interested! We only succeed due to people like you spreading the word.

Have a blog or website? – Great! We’d love you to write about BOB. We may even be able to send you one of our prototypes for review. Email us at hello.bobcase@gmail.com and check out the press pack available on our website.

Are you a distributer or shop owner? – We’d love to hear from you. Email us at hello.bobcase@gmail.com and we can talk business.  

Have any suggestions or questions? – Brilliant, we never stop working to improve our designs and take them further. Any feedback you can give us will greatly help with our next project and who knows, maybe even BOB II. Ask us a question or comment via Indiegogo or email us at hello.bobcase@gmail.com. 

Bang Creations Website

BOB Website

The risk is all on us.Taking a product to market is all something we're very familiar with. Bang Creations have been designing, developing and delivering product to market for businesses and start-ups for over 10 years so we know all of the challenges you can face. Common stumbling blocks include:Not being 100% developed when handing over to production - BOB has been developed with the manufacturer and the final CAD has been done by their tooling engineers.Not getting the product made for the right price to be commercial - BOB has been designed and costed to allow for a distributor margin as well as the trade margins should BOB make it to retail.Not accounting for fulfillment costs - We have contracted a fulfillment house to take the product from production line to your home address and costed their service into the product.Not protecting your ideas or making sure you do not infringe other parties IP - We checked that we are not infringing IP and have protected our design with patent, trade mark and design right.The best way to help bring BOB to market is to pre-order one yourself!Don’t wear glasses? - Why not get one as a gift? It’s never too early to start Christmas shopping.Don’t have the money to invest right now? - That’s ok, it would mean the world to us if you would share BOB with your friends, family, colleagues, postmen and anyone else you think may be interested! We only succeed due to people like you spreading the word.Have a blog or website? – Great! We’d love you to write about BOB. We may even be able to send you one of our prototypes for review. Email us at hello.bobcase@gmail.com and check out the press pack available on our website.Are you a distributer or shop owner? – We’d love to hear from you. Email us at hello.bobcase@gmail.com and we can talk business.  Have any suggestions or questions? – Brilliant, we never stop working to improve our designs and take them further. Any feedback you can give us will greatly help with our next project and who knows, maybe even BOB II. Ask us a question or comment via Indiegogo or email us at hello.bobcase@gmail.com. Bang Creations WebsiteBOB Website

story: We want to install TVs in local gas-stations, stores and restaurants. Our goal is to activate 100 locations over a 3 - 6 month time-period to show a proof of concept. Our solution runs on a modified Android dongle and installs in 5 min over any WiFi network. Each installation will cost about US$300.- using a basic TV, our special dongle and WiFi. We then can offer our solution to real-estate agents and other retail suppliers. It look us 1 1/2 years of software development with 4 engineers. Our system has the most advanced POS relational database system ever build by people with 20+ years of programming experience.

story:
Introducing beamust™

    Today security and privacy on your online information and communication is requested by most of us (to evaluate your needs you can use simple check list). However many security and privacy tools are hard to setup, difficult to use and require several changes that may impact your usage. Imagine being able to access all your favorite applications from a safe and secure platform that offers a secure and private zone that will enable you to protect any of the data (not only files)? Now you can, with beamust.

beamust™ is:

• Flexible to use, with beamust, you don’t have to change your email address or open new accounts on social media to use this system.

• An all-in-one solution – beamust offers an integrated solution that combines email, contacts, calendar, personal organizer and task manager.

• A transparent solution, your data are encrypted on our server and you are the only one who can access it, moreover your privacy and confidentiality is guaranteed by a simple and clear to understand contract.

• A solution for sensitive information, beamust is ideal for those whom handle client or patient information.

• Give context/meaning of your data to generate intelligent responses, improves productivity and facilitates team collaboration and communication.

With access from any device you become the absolute owner of your data, taking full control of your privacy.

We designed each service with maximum attention to details that will evolve over time to reflect your use of the web-based applications. We made an incredible innovation to integrate in simple views the ability to read and respond to emails, access calendars and communicate with all your contacts, even through all your social networks, in an instant.

What is beamust™

The personal/professional information and data you own, share and use on internet is one of your most valuable assets. It’s also one of the most threatened.

Keeping in touch with your family, friends or colleagues has never been easier with the introduction of "free" networking services. But they have their price. Every time you send information across the internet, whether it’s an e-mail, an entry in your social network calendar or any one of countless other online activities, you become a player in a very big game of chance. At any time, that data is at risk of being analysed, stolen or sold for profit.


Our mission is to restore confidence and reliance about sharing information and personal/professional data on the internet. Providing protection and empowering usage of your valuable data and online information will be intuitive and seamless with beamust™.

Main features





 

Universal mail


The Universal mail service offers the full functionality you would expect in handling your e-mail communication such as folders for drafts, sent mail, spam, trash, tagged mail and the inbox which can be segregated into private mail, social notifications and promotional mail. It also provides the capability to export into beamust™ Briefcase and back-up emails in an independent format such as HTML.

Users have  cross functionality over all email accounts they hold, regardless whether they are provided by beamust™, conventional email providers, the company you work for, or your own personal website/blog.

Universal mail is seamlessly integrated with other services such as beamust™ Messaging, Calendar and Contact. For example, you will be able to establish new connections between these services via the keywords and search tags. This underlying intelligence of your individual beamust™ environment and Universal mail service will adapt and grow with its usage.

 

 

Innovative calendar

The innovative calendar and social events management interface features an innovative and stylish user interface. It displays notifications that are timed and dated  throughout your beamust™ Mail communication and social network. Appointments, meetings, events and tasks can be categorized giving the user full insight based on the usage context.

For example the users calendar can also be linked to other calendars within the system to present information on shared interests and appointments. This access can be configured in such a way that only the information that is shared via common interests, such as a contract of work or wedding.

All of the appointments and information relating to the calendar can be grouped and  presented in a separate window within the Innovative calendar interface. This gives the user the ability to recognize the relations between appointments and dates. In this environment, important events are grouped and given their relevant tags which are also color coded making the system easy to use for both visual and kinesthetic learners. Through each tab, all information related to the group from throughout the beamust™ environment is only one click away.


 

Ubiquitous contact

The ubiquitous Contact interface is the place where you can create your contact profiles. This includes obviously all of your beamust™ Mail addresses. Further, you can add any fields you need, categorize items using tags and create groups of contacts. Innovative contact is fully integrated with your beamust™ environment.

Besides this, easy links are provided to all of your social accounts that are accessible via one click on the relevant, user-friendly icon. From here you have the capability to communicate/collaborate with anyone from within your contact list, which appears as part of the beautiful contacts user interface.

Upon the standard functionality, it is also intended that we will consolidate contact profiles and groups with information from your wider contact and social network sources. You also will be able to tag and categorize your contacts enabling you to build and work with dynamic groups. Further more, there will be an activity timeline on the contacts view to relay live information on messaging from other parts of your social and communication network.

beamust™ is the first application providing such an easy way to have a contact/group centric dashboard for your personal/professional data and online information (even from social networks).

 

 

Multi-function Briefcase


beamust™ private servers will host all of your files and assets in a fully universal, independent and consistent format. This information could not only be securely access online but also synchronized to your devices.

With Briefcase interface, you have simple, and easy access to the identification of the entire range of your data, which is completely backed-up, archived and encrypted. Further it is fully integrated with other services such as beamust™ Mail.

Everything within the briefcase is indexed and there is a fully capable text search box that enables you to find and filter different aspects of your data. It can also be ordered in a number of different ways according to whichever aspect of the information you want to look at.

 

 

Smart activity center


Smart Activity Center is our amazingly simple yet informative interface. It offers insights into your data and instant interoperability enabling linking and travel throughout the beamust™ environment.

As a central hub, Smart Activity Center represents an overview of all information in one place. Fully customizable interface layout allows users to aggregate information from any part of beamust™ environment such as individual contact activity timeline, calendar, mail inbox or briefcase and display it on the Smart Activity Center.

Data mining process can also present any information relative to an upcoming activity which in result saves time, effort and speeds up communication.

The difference of beamust™

Click here to open image for full view in PDF format

Rollout plan

We foresee that the full development of complete beamust™ environment beginning with beamust™ Personal, continuing with evolution into beamust™ Community and beamust™ Business, will take three years and will require total budget of $800’000. During each phase we will enhance and provide new features to services/applications provided during previous phases. Our project timeline is split in three stages.

How we will use your funds

Where the money goes? We need your contribution to finalize our software development and make this outstanding project reality. The amount of funding we require to achieve the final milestone is $200,000. Our development plan for our full solution is planned for three years with a budget of $800'000.


Express yourself and join us!

There are several ways how to support us, so everyone can chose. We are in close contact with our supporters every day. You can expect transparency and direct communication from us all the way. We have big plans with this product. This is just the beginning!

beamust™ team

story:
Ad by save keep | Close

Whether it be soccer, football, or basketball the PRO-HANDS® Sports Bottle has the realistic look and feel of what the pros play with. These miniature sports balls have a soft spongy filled cavity that retains an 8oz baby bottle or toddler sippy cup.



While friends and family delight in how adorable your little darling looks holding the sports bottle, PRO-HANDS® is preparing their mind and body for a fulfilling future. As they become familiar with and fond of the ball, your child's potential increases. It's never too early to help your little one cultivate a healthy and strong body and mind.

Give your little champ a head start and an early edge. Allowing a young potential player to become familiar with the look and feel of the ball will foster their interests as they grow.



PRO-HANDS® will make an awesome gift for any gender for any occasion.




Its cuter than cute. As your baby/toddler feeds from a PRO-HANDS® Sports Bottle He or she is also developing an infatuation for that particular sports ball.
What a head start!

Encouraging your baby or toddler to form positive associations from an early age- the realistic miniature sports ball provides tactile stimulation while introducing the sporting lifestyle in a comforting way. These early memories will guide young hands to reach for healthier pursuits as they grow.


We've spent a lot time looking for the safest materials for the sports bottles. Safe and natural products do exist. Finding those alternatives, however, isn't always straight forward. From speaking to manufacturers, to studying chemical compounds, choosing a safe product soon became a series of projects. Nonetheless, with the right resources, PRO-HANDS® is better equipped to make the necessary decisions for our products. 





PRO-HANDS® Sports Bottles come in 3 variations which heightens our tooling and manufacturing costs. We couldn’t present just 1 of the 3 most popular sport balls on our planet. We need your support to overcome the initial costs for tooling and the various materials.We are looking to crowdsource demand upfront through Indiegogo to bring PRO-HANDS® to your little ones.




$5 Thank you

$10 Thank you. Get two promotional bracelets

$25 Thank you. Get one PRO-HANDS® logo youth sized T shirt.

$32 Thank you. Get one PRO-HANDS® logo adult sized T shirt 

$30 HELP US GET STARTED! Limited to the first 300

$40 SWISH! Get your little one into the game!                                                                               Get one PRO-HANDS® Sports Bottle (basketball). 

$40 TOUCH DOWN! Get your little one into the game!
   Get one PRO-HANDS® Sports Bottle (football). 

 $40 GOOOOAL! Get your little one into the game!                                                                       Get one PRO-HANDS® Sports Bottle (soccer ball). 


$55 Choose ONE PRO-HANDS® Sports Bottle for your little one and get 2 promo          bracelets and a Born Legend PRO-HANDS® logo youth T shirt. 


$100 Get all 3 PRO-HANDS® Sports Bottles with this awesome deal.

$1000 or more! Distribution packs. Please contact us   info@pro-hands.com                  (subject) distribution




Risks & Challenges

We understand that any project comes with unique risks and challenges and we've gone to great lengths to minimize foreseeable delays and other issues.

The most common risks are potential delays in tooling, obtaining raw materials, packaging, and shipping. While we feel like we have reduced these variables as much as possible, they can never be completely eliminated.



We are working to obtain the licensing to include your favorite college or pro team logos on the PRO-HANDS®Sports Bottles.



From Toddler to Pro with PRO-HANDS®

We believe PRO-HANDS® will inspire the next generation to take an early liking to sports and active lifestyles. 
Early exposure to sports has a lasting positive influence on children,
teaching values like teamwork and helping to build focus. 
These benefits extend into academic and social functioning while providing a physical outlet for their abundant energy.

The PRO-HANDS® Sports Bottles are one of many phases of PRO-HANDS®. As we continue to gain support from your appreciated efforts, PRO-HANDS® looks to sponsor more leagues (any sport) and provide quality athletic apparel to kids world wide.

PRO-HANDS®.. The brand of the new generation. FOR KIDS inspired BY KIDS.


The benefits of sports are NOT simply limited to physical health.



THE TEAM


Inquiries? Ideas? Advice? Partnership?  
Feel free to contact us at any time!   info@pro-hands.com
We will update our campaign as often as necessary to keep you informed. 


Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways to contribute! You can help PRO-HANDS® by simply sharing this Indiegogo campaign with your friends, family, and anyone who has a little one in their lives or on the way. 

We'd be grateful if you would follow and share our social media outlets.


@prohandssports   

  FACEBOOK                                TWITTER                            INSTAGRAM


Thank you Indiegogo. Together. . DO ANYTHING!

story:
Help us by sharing AVA with your friends!

Know someone who would be just as excited as you are about AVA? Share our campaign with them through the "Share this project" button at the bottom. Sharing is caring! Thank you in advance for all the support!

And remember you receive your FREE GIFT when you Facebook share or Tweet about AVA!




She'll keep your battery charged so you can smile and go!  

Keep her in your make-up bag...

In your pocket...


Or in your purse! 

AVA is the perfect accessory for everyone:

...The business professional 

...Trendy grandma! 

...Busy mom

...mini-fashionista

and tiny beauty queen!


 Say hello to your new best friend, AVA. 

The trendy and convenient compact mirror and USB charger. 


Compact Mirror $20

Portable Phone Charger $40

Powering your phone, powdering your face & preventing clutter at the same time.... PRICELESS


 For everything else there's AVA

   

So when you're having one of these days...

    Grab your AVA and turn it into a much better one!

At first, it's normal to be possessive of your AVA...

On second thought...why not share it with everyone!

AVA...Elegantly Powerful






TWEET NOW!


FACEBOOK SHARE!

·  $54 – Regular Bird x 2: Receive two (2) AVA Chargers in Silver and Gold! We will send you two (2) free charging cables as a gift when you Facebook share or tweet about AVA!

·  $67 – Early Bird Special x 3: Receive three (3) AVA Chargers, one in each color! We will send you three (3) free charging cables as a gift when you Facebook share or tweet about AVA!

·  $79 – Regular Bird x 3: Receive three (3) AVA Chargers, one in each color! We will send you three (3) free charging cables as a gift when you Facebook share or tweet about AVA!

·  $900 – Reseller: Receive sixty (60) AVA chargers (Purple x 20, Gold x 20, Silver x 20). We will send you sixty (60) free charging cables as a gift when you Facebook share, or tweet about AVA!

·  $4500 – Distributor: Receive three hundred (300) AVA chargers (Purple x 100, Gold x 100, Silver x 100). We will send you three hundred (300) free charging cables as a gift when you Facebook share, or tweet about AVA!

The full retail price for AVA will be $39, so you're getting a deal by supporting us on Indiegogo. We will not be selling AVA in retail stores until all Indiegogo rewards have been shipped. 

Want to change your reward? No problem!

We know it can be hard to choose which tier to back, but don’t worry, you can change your reward level at anytime until funding closes on April 10.

International Backers

We will ship AVA worldwide, with the exception of Cuba, Myanmar/Burma, Iran, Sudan, Syria, and Russia. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region. 

Estimated Delivery

We estimate to deliver all AVA Charger's to you by June. While we do not expect these to change, it is possible that the estimated shipment month may shift.

Risks and challenges

No venture or project comes without risk and challenges and we work hard to ensure a seamless campaign. We are so pleased to report that AVA is nearly complete. All AVA’s shown on this page and in the video were built on our production line. We are currently ramping up at the factory and are ready to see this campaign take off! If anyone is ready to campaign on Indiegogo, it’s us! Bring it on.

Forecasting Risk

We’ve done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid and feasible production plan. We’ve learned a lot from past experiences, and we realize forecasts are less accurate, and may not always hit the mark. Should we miss projections, we will be sure to let you know why and take proactive steps to resolve any possible production issues as quickly as possible.

Supply Chain Risk

We’ve built a very capable team who have worked for the past 3 years on all our products. However, component delays and unexpected shortages can occur. We pride ourselves in logistics and since it is a vital component for our operation, we have ensured a smooth supply chain from factory directly to you! Nonetheless, barring any unforeseen circumstances, and due to the unpredictable nature of transportation, we will let you know immediately if we encounter any hiccups on along the way! It’s important to us to keep everyone updated.

Need help? We're here for you.

If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at support@avacharger.com


FAQ

How can you confirm that I shared AVA on Facebook/Instagram/Twitter to receive the FREE gift?

- Make sure to tag #avacharger or @avacharger in your Facebook/Instagram/Twitter post for our Marketing Rockstar to authenticate

*Please add $10 for International shipping under "additional perks." 
Free shipping within the USA.
story_txt:
Help us by sharing AVA with your friends!
Know someone who would be just as excited as you are about AVA? Share our campaign with them through the "Share this project" button at the bottom. Sharing is caring! Thank you in advance for all the support!
And remember you receive your FREE GIFT when you Facebook share or Tweet about AVA!




She'll keep your battery charged so you can smile and go!  

Keep her in your make-up bag...


In your pocket...

Or in your purse! 

AVA is the perfect accessory for everyone:

...The business professional 

...Trendy grandma! 

...Busy mom


...mini-fashionista 

and tiny beauty queen!
 Say hello to your new best friend, AVA. 
The trendy and convenient compact mirror and USB charger. 


Compact Mirror $20
Portable Phone Charger $40
Powering your phone, powdering your face & preventing clutter at the same time.... PRICELESS

 For everything else there's AVA
   
So when you're having one of these days...



    Grab your AVA and turn it into a much better one!


At first, it's normal to be possessive of your AVA...



On second thought...why not share it with everyone!

AVA...Elegantly Powerful






TWEET NOW!


FACEBOOK SHARE!

story:
It is perfect for charging a phone when traveling or away from home. XON PowerCase increases charge of your phone up to 400% with built-in 8200mAh battery, which is three times more than most of similar cases offer.

You can activate the charge of the cover by simply pressing the button. Easy and fast. You can see the level of charge on the case immediately.

It is made of strong, shockproof material that provides reliable protection of the phone from any damage.

It is also an additional usb output for charging another devices from the case, such as phone, tablet, action camera etc.  

You can use built-in stand for installation the case in a vertical position for watching movies.

The soft inner bottom made of artificial fabric will provide reliable protection against scratches for your phone.

XON PowerCase is available for iPhone 5, SE, 6, 6+, 6S, 6S+, 7, 7+.

Style is important in every device. So we have prepared five assorted colors for your choice. Choose your best.

 

 

Have a friend who can be interested in this? Every your share could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!

Help us by spreading the word via email and social media. You can save up to $15 toward our campaign every time one of your referrals back us.

There is no limit to how much you can earn!

Once the campaign is over, we will apply this credit to your account, giving you a refund on your purchase or credit on the purchase of a new XON PowerCase. We are able to track how many people visit our campaign from your link and whether they contribute. For the 1x XON PowerCase, 2x XON PowerCase or 3x XON PowerCase, we will give you reward worth the equivalent number of purchases ($5, 10$ and $15, respectively). Please note that contributors cannot receive referral credit for referring themselves. Of two contributors, only one can be the 'referrer' and receive campaign credit for the other's contribution.

How to participate in the referral program: It’s simple. Log in to your Indiegogo account . Be sure to use the same account you used when you claimed your XON. Then, look below our main video at the top of this page for buttons to share and copy your unique URL. Start sharing!

Here's How It Works:

Everytime someone purchases a XON PowerCase using your unique URL, we will give you $5, 10$ or 15$. You must use your unique URL for this to work. There are two ways to find your URL:

First Method: Logging into your Indiegogo account

1. Log into your Indiegogo account. If you don't have an account, you can sign up for one here.

2. Visit our campaign page page.

3. See the video at the top of the page? Look underneath it and you will see the share icons. 

4. Click on the link icon to generate your unique URL.

5. Share it via social media and email.

Second method: Using the links provided in your purchase confirmation email.

1. Log into your Indiegogo account. If you don't have an account, you can sign up for one. Make sure to remember your username and password - you will need it later to log in and track your referrals.

2. Visit our campaign page and contribute at any perk level.

3. A confirmation email will appear in your inbox. Scroll down to the bottom of the email.

4. You will see these icons.

These links will share your unique URL via Facebook, Twitter or Email.

5. Simply click on any of the links and follow the instructions.

Tracking Your Referrals

1. Log into your Indiegogo account.

2. On the top right corner of the page, you will see your profile name. Click on it.

3. In the dropdown menu, click ‘My Contributions’

4. In the menu bar, click on the ‘Referrals’ tab.

5. You will see the number of people you referred, the number who have purchased and the total dollar amount of their contributions.

6. Once the campaign is over, Indiegogo provides us with detailed information on how many XON PowerCases were purchased through your referrals and at what perk level.

*Please note that contributors cannot receive referral credit for referring themselves.

How will you fulfill my referral rewards?

Once the campaign is over, Indiegogo will provide us with detailed information on how many XON PowerCases were purchased through your referrals and at what perk level.

We will then either issue you a refund on XON PowerCase you have purchased, or issue you campaign credit toward the purchase of a new XON PowerCase.

We ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to your country.

 

Pre-orders for all iPhone cases now will be delivered for Mid July. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.

 

By backing now you'll get to own one of the limitless cases off the line plus exclusive access to prices only available during the Indiegogo campaign.

1. How do I choose my color and model option?

You will be emailed a survey to your inbox via Backerkit at the end of the campaign within 10 days of the campaign ending.

 

2. Can I choose a different XON PowerCase phone option and color for each case I order, even if I order them together as 1 perk?

Yes, you can choose a different phone model and color for every case purchased. For example if you purchase 2x XON PowerCase, you can choose 1 iPhone SE and 1 iPhone 6Plus case in 2 different colors.

 

3. How will my order be shipped?

All orders will be shipping with tracking, out of our fulfillment centre in Hong Kong and will be delivered in most cases by your local national postal service.

 

4. Which countries do you ship to?

We ship to all countries over the world.

 

5. Is there likely to be any manufacturing delays like all the other crowdfunded magnetic cables and adaptors which have all failed to deliver?

We have already paid up front from our own pockets for the tooling cost and produced samples for testing. With the positive response of the final samples we will be able to begin production right after the campaign closes with no manufacturing complications. We've accounted for potential delays with our expected delivery date and are confident we will deliver on time.

 

6. What makes XON PowerCase better than other battery phone cases on the market?

XON PowerCase capacity is 8200 mAh for iPhone plus versions, which is three times more than most of other similar cases offer. For example your phone can get up to 4 full battery charges from this case. Also it has also complex of useful functions, such as shock protection design, kickstand for watching movies, additional USB port and battery charge indicator.

 

7. How long does it take to charge XON PowerCase and the Phone?

It takes about 2h 40min to fully charge the XON PowerCase for iPhone 5 / SE, and 4 hours to fully charge the XON PowerCase and the iPhone together; about 4h 10min to fully charge the XON PowerCase for iPhone 6 / 7, and 5h 40min to fully charge the XON PowerCase and the iPhone together; about 5h 20min to fully charge the XON PowerCase for iPhone 6+ / 7+, and 6h 40min to fully charge the XON PowerCase and the iPhone together.

 

8. Can XON PowerCase protect my phone?

Yes, although XON PowerCase is very robust. The outer shell bumper and the case protects your phone from all-around, making it shock-proof. We have tested the shock resistance of the phone with case when you drop your phone from a height of 1 meter.

 

9. Do all model options have same features?

All options have different size, battery power capacity and other features. For example additional USB port is available in all XON PowerCase options except iPhone 5/5S/SE because of the smaller size of this case. Please, see full comparison between all phone options in Model options paragraph.

 

10. What colors do the XON PowerCase come in?

At the moment the XON PowerCase is available in jet black, matte black, white, gold and pink.

 

11. How do you charge XON PowerCase?

There is a single point of charge for both your XON PowerCase and your iPhone, so you can charge both simultaneously using your normal Lightning cord.

 

12. How thin is XON PowerCase?

XON PowerCase is only 18 mm thick including build-in the most power battery ever.

 

13. Which phones are compatible with XON PowerCase?

XON PowerCase is compatible with iPhone 5, SE, 7, 7Plus, 6, 6Plus, 6S and 6SPlus.

 

14. Will XON PowerCase affect the charging speed?

XON PowerCase will not alter any device's charging speed and can handle the maximum charging speed for mobile phones.

 

15. Is there a warranty?

Yes, all of our iPhone cases come with a 1 Year Lifetime Warranty. This warranty covers manufacturing defects in the case. It does not cover gradual wear and tear throughout it's lifetime that is to be expected from normal use. We do not 100% guarantee the protection of your iPhone, no case is unbreakable!

 

16. How do I order an extra case?

Check out our x2 or x3 case perks or just pre-order again for another case or ask us a question via link on the top of this page .

 

17. How can I check the status of my pre-order?

By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.

 

18. Have a question?

If you have any customer support related inquiries, please email us at: ask@xonel.co.uk.

story:
Home Smart Water Detector (HSWD) 

A device to protect your home from water damage; warning you through a beeping alarm, companion smartphone app, and social media including email, Twitter, and Facebook. You'll also get an low battery alert when the battery drop below 20% of capacity.  

With Home Smart Water Detector (HSWD), you will know when and where you have a leaking issue in your home before it becomes a costly problem through the alarm, companion smartphone app, and social media including email, Twitter, and Facebook. Once your HSWD devices have been configured by using the App, you may not need to open the App. You will get the water alerts on your social media.  

You can also check all the data history of your HSWD devices on your smartphone. There is analytics data including alerts, battery capacity, temperature reading, and humidity reading. The user can place Home Smart Water Detector (HSWD) devices in any potential flood spots; such as next to your hot water tank, bathrooms, basements, kitchens, washing machine, water heater, sink cabinet, sump pump, garages and so on. 

When the HSWD device detects any water leaking, even if it's only a small amount of water, it will sound a very loud alarm. This alert is also sent to your smartphone, and social media (email, Twitter, and Facebook), so you know that you have a water leaking issue that needs your immediate attention. 

Even if you are not at home or your smartphone runs out of battery, your friends or family are still able to see the alert over social media. They can inform you about the water alert. Your home has full protection with HSWD. 

We have this awesome idea. With your help, we can make it a reality. Please help this project and you will get awesome rewards in return. 

HSWD Design Concept and Idea

HSWD Hardware Design:

HSWD PCB Schematic Design

HSWD PCB Layout Design

PCB bare board for HSWD 

 

HSWD Production Prototype:

 

Smartphone APP for HSWD:

Smartphone APP for HSWD (APP first page)

 

Smartphone APP HSSD for HSWD devices (HSSD APP Side Manual)

Smartphone APP for HSWD (HSWD device configuration with WiFi SSID)

 

Smartphone APP for HSWD (devices list)

 

Smartphone APP for HSWD (the device detail data)

 

Smartphone APP for HSWD (the device history data)

 

Water Alert to Social Media:

HSWD water leaking alert is sent to user's Twitter immediately

 

HSWD water leaking alert is sent to user's Facebook immediately

 

HSWD water leaking alert is sent to user's Email immediately

 

 

Specifications:   

1. Low-Cost device: as low as US$ 30 per unit when HSWD is production in volume.  

2. No monthly fee, subscriptions or any extra fee.

3. Buzzing Alarm: 80dB.  

4. WiFi: IEEE 802.11 b/g/n (2.4 GHz).  

5. Smartphone App: free download on both Google Play store and Apple app store for iOS and Android devices  

6. Device Configuration: HSWD device is able to be automatically configured through your mobile device.  

7. Social Media: Water alert can be shared to your social media including email, Twitter, and Facebook.  

8. Battery Capacity: 0~ 100% to indicate the battery capacity of your HSWD device.  

9. Temperature Reading: Temperature Reading (Celsius or Fahrenheit). 

10. Humidity Reading: Humidity Reading (0~100%). 

11. HSWD Data History: All your HSWD data history will be stored and retrieved on your smartphone app. The data includes alerts, battery capacity, temperature reading, and humidity reading.  

12. Power: 9V Alkaline Battery. Normally a new alkaline battery can last for 1 year.  

13. External Antenna: External Antenna is used for improving radio range even HSWD in basement.

14. Material: Waterproof ABS plastic case.  

15. Color: White.  

16. Package Size: 132*55*35 cm.  

17. Product Weight: 120 g.

Risks & Challenges

Based on the following reasons, we think the risks of this project is very low:
(1) We have very good hardware development, the prototype products are working well.
(2) We have been testing this prototype for months. They are working as we expected.
(3) We also tested its power current consumption on the device. It can run up to one year with a 9 volts battery.
(4) We have all the resources for all the parts (BOM) and we have their second source as well. We will order all the parts right after this project is funded.
(5) We have contacted some Electronics Manufacturing/assembly factories to get quotes. Once this project is funded, the HSWD can go for production ASAP.
(5) We have built the APP (called HSSD) for the HSWD project. It has been tested. It is working very well. Android version has been done. We are testing the APP for iOS version.
(6) Christmas and 2017 Lunar new year will be around the corner after this campaign funded, just in case, so we set the rewards shipping date before March 31, 2017.
story_txt:
Home Smart Water Detector (HSWD) 
A device to protect your home from water damage; warning you through a beeping alarm, companion smartphone app, and social media including email, Twitter, and Facebook. You'll also get an low battery alert when the battery drop below 20% of capacity.  
With Home Smart Water Detector (HSWD), you will know when and where you have a leaking issue in your home before it becomes a costly problem through the alarm, companion smartphone app, and social media including email, Twitter, and Facebook. Once your HSWD devices have been configured by using the App, you may not need to open the App. You will get the water alerts on your social media.  
You can also check all the data history of your HSWD devices on your smartphone. There is analytics data including alerts, battery capacity, temperature reading, and humidity reading. The user can place Home Smart Water Detector (HSWD) devices in any potential flood spots; such as next to your hot water tank, bathrooms, basements, kitchens, washing machine, water heater, sink cabinet, sump pump, garages and so on. 
When the HSWD device detects any water leaking, even if it's only a small amount of water, it will sound a very loud alarm. This alert is also sent to your smartphone, and social media (email, Twitter, and Facebook), so you know that you have a water leaking issue that needs your immediate attention. 
Even if you are not at home or your smartphone runs out of battery, your friends or family are still able to see the alert over social media. They can inform you about the water alert. Your home has full protection with HSWD. 
We have this awesome idea. With your help, we can make it a reality. Please help this project and you will get awesome rewards in return. 

HSWD Design Concept and Idea

HSWD Hardware Design:

HSWD PCB Schematic Design

HSWD PCB Layout Design

HSWD water leaking alert is sent to user's Twitter immediately
 

HSWD water leaking alert is sent to user's Facebook immediately
 

HSWD water leaking alert is sent to user's Email immediately
 
 
Specifications:   
1. Low-Cost device: as low as US$ 30 per unit when HSWD is production in volume.  
2. No monthly fee, subscriptions or any extra fee.
3. Buzzing Alarm: 80dB.  
4. WiFi: IEEE 802.11 b/g/n (2.4 GHz).  
5. Smartphone App: free download on both Google Play store and Apple app store for iOS and Android devices  
6. Device Configuration: HSWD device is able to be automatically configured through your mobile device.  
7. Social Media: Water alert can be shared to your social media including email, Twitter, and Facebook.  
8. Battery Capacity: 0~ 100% to indicate the battery capacity of your HSWD device.  
9. Temperature Reading: Temperature Reading (Celsius or Fahrenheit). 
10. Humidity Reading: Humidity Reading (0~100%). 
11. HSWD Data History: All your HSWD data history will be stored and retrieved on your smartphone app. The data includes alerts, battery capacity, temperature reading, and humidity reading.  
12. Power: 9V Alkaline Battery. Normally a new alkaline battery can last for 1 year.  
13. External Antenna: External Antenna is used for improving radio range even HSWD in basement.
14. Material: Waterproof ABS plastic case.  
15. Color: White.  
16. Package Size: 132*55*35 cm.  
17. Product Weight: 120 g.
Risks & Challenges
Based on the following reasons, we think the risks of this project is very low:(1) We have very good hardware development, the prototype products are working well.(2) We have been testing this prototype for months. They are working as we expected.(3) We also tested its power current consumption on the device. It can run up to one year with a 9 volts battery.(4) We have all the resources for all the parts (BOM) and we have their second source as well. We will order all the parts right after this project is funded.(5) We have contacted some Electronics Manufacturing/assembly factories to get quotes. Once this project is funded, the HSWD can go for production ASAP.(5) We have built the APP (called HSSD) for the HSWD project. It has been tested. It is working very well. Android version has been done. We are testing the APP for iOS version.(6) Christmas and 2017 Lunar new year will be around the corner after this campaign funded, just in case, so we set the rewards shipping date before March 31, 2017.

story:
Touch screens are easily and safely operated with PixyRing that's accessible on your finger.
Visit www.pixyring.com

 

 

 

,
 

 

PixyRings inventors full time job was to teach operators of interactive boards from SmartBoard and eInstrucion how to use them. The customers often complained that their pens / styluses disappeard. This initiated at process that lead to PixyRing. 

In 2012 the project received an establishment award. A patent application was delivered in 2013 and South Korea was the first country to grant patent rights in 2015. The Research Council of Norway gave their support to the project in 2016. Summer 2017 the first working prototype was released. Now we need to raise funds to make PixyRing happen.

story:
Why u-Flash?

 

Our u-Flash is APPLE MF-i certified!

The internet is often spotty or non-existent when you need it - camping, traveling, sports events, music festivals - the exact same time that you just took some great photos or a video that you would like to share with your friends that are with you. Moving your files from iPhone and iPad becomes with u-Flash as easy as Drag & Drop.

Instead of having to send it to them, you just hand it to them and they can add it to their device.

You also can instantly back up your files when you don't have the internet access to your cloud back-up systems or iTunes. Also allows you to quickly copy files when your devices memory storage is getting full.

 

Description

 

u-Flash Features

  • View photos, documents, playback music, TV series and movies, backup and manage files directly from u-Flash
  • System required: iOS 7+
  • Storage: 32/64/128GB optional SD Card Class 10
  • Size: 22x59.3x15mm (main body) 22x15x208.3mm (unfolded)
  • Interface: USB3.0&Lightning
  • Compatibility: iPhone 7, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6, iPhone 5S/5c/5, iPad mini 3, iPad mini, iPad Air, iPad(4th Gen), iPod touch(5th Gen)
  • Apple MFi-certified Made for iPhone/iPad/iPod)
  • File compatibility:Video(MP4, MOV, RM, RMVB, 3GP, M4V,etc), Audio(MP3,ACC,AIF,M4A,WAV,CAF,MIDI), Images(JPG,JPEG,PNG,TIF,GIF,PDF,BMP), Documents(Word, Excel, RTF,PPT,HTM,TXT,CWR,PAGES)
  • Foldable cable, use as charging or sync cable by adjust the function button
  • Free App available on App Store

 

Dimensions

 

Apple Lightning & USB 3.0 flash drive

u-Flash allows users to conveniently share and transfer files between an iPhone, iPad, PC, and Mac. Through a free iOS APP, you can instantly store valuable photos and videos from your iPhone and iPad onto the u-Flash and transfer them to your home computer.

 

Colors

APP

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our project but you can't contribute, please consider sharing it  with your friends and family. This will help us a lot to spread the word!

Thank you, cheers!

story:
Wireless charging has never been this phenomenal. Fast, easy, clutter-free, invisible and eye-catchy. Imagine you simply set phone on top of a clean desk and it starts charging automatically. That would just make people go WOW!

 

 

 

MEET iMAG W1

 

iMAG W1 spot for invisible/hidden installation that brings convenient, fast and cable-free charging into all sorts of environments(public, office, home, restaurant, etc.). Universally-compatible, Qi-certified charging pads are easily installed at any location to provide an enhanced user experience in any environment. 

 

  • ⚡Fine-tuned for iPhone X, iPhone XS, iPhone 11 Series to safely provide up to 7.5W 
  • ⚡Designed to provide Samsung wireless-charging phones up to 9W 
  • ⚡Qi-certified for full functionality with all Qi-enabled devices up to 10W 

In fact, It’s the most compatible invisible wireless charger in the world that charges through 45mm thick surface!

 

 CHARGE THROUGH ANY SURFACE

 

W1’s patented transmitter tech enables a wider transmission range of electrons through a thicker barrier(45mm) and juice up your device wirelessly. It’s the most penetrating invisible wireless charger in the world! That means W1 suits most of the table/desk/counter on the market. So you don’t have to worry about compatibility, it has no hassle charging through a very thick surface. 

 

*Please note that the iMAG W1 30mm and iMAG W1 45mm are of the same size but of different weights. Also, the iMAG W1 45mm needs to have a pre-installed receiver/ sticker on the table surface for optimum results.

 

 

ULTRA CONVENIENT

 

The iMAG W1 Fast Wireless Charger is very convenient to use. It removes wire from wireless charger and transforms any surface into a fast-charging dock. And the best thing is you won’t have to deal with wires or cluttered surfaces; it is a convenient and neat way to keep your phone powered up and the surroundings clutter-free.

 

 

CLEAN & NO DISTRACTION

 

Easily keep your desk tidy with the iMAG W1. The feeling a clean desk gives you is energizing and sometimes inspiring. The desk is clean, you are focused and work is going to get done! 

 

 

EASY INSTALLATION

 

Apply iMAG W1 is very easy, no construction experience required. Steps are as follows:

  • Use the two magnets(comes within the kit) to identify the ideal placement position.
  • Slide the charger’s sleeve out, peel the top sticker from it and then mount it below the surface at the identified spot using the reusable adhesive holder.
  • You can now slide out the magnets while fixing the wireless charger into the affixed sleeve below.
  •  Plug in the power line, place your phone on the surface and then charge away.

 

 

Compare to the regular hidden wireless charger on the market, iMAG W1 is much easier to install.No construction needed, and no damage to the furniture. Just as easy to set up as 1-2-3-4! A true Plug-and-Play experience.

 

 

 

MERGE INTO THE ENVIRONMENT

 

iMAG W1 is equally as strong charging through most table materials including wood, plastic, glass, quartz, granite, marble among others. It can also charge through phone cases!

Just out of sight but not out of mind, the iMAG W1 charges your phone in an invisible form in a range of environments thereby keeping each surface neat and clutter-free. This allows you to go about your activities without worrying about messy surfaces or the risk of tripping over wires.

 

   

 

We have adopted a special coil manufacturing process to ensure the accuracy of the coil parameters and realize ample fixed frequency fast charging based on inductive magnetic resonance. 

The double-layer Alpha winding method is used to solve the influence of ordinary winding mode, adding efficiency and contributing towards the symmetry, thickness and performance of the charger while eliminating leakages.

 

 

 

PLEASE NOTE We only offer four standard plugs: 

  • European standard plug
  • American plug
  • British Specification Plug
  • Australian gauge plug. 
 

Media Review

As you can see, the installation process does not involve damaging furniture, nor does it require any special knowledge --- Gadgets-reviews

...delivers a slim and compact appearance design --- Gadgetsin

...charge your devices wirelessly while remaining virtually invisible and this is something that could revolutionise the way that we charge our devices --- Techmash

 

 

 

 

The iMAG W1 is the culmination of extensive research conducted in the wireless power supply field especially in long-range, low frequency magnetic resonance, seeking to find wireless charging solutions across different charging distances and various QI standards. 

In the face of similar products on the market, we strive to resolve any arising issues in both function and appearance, coming up with breakthrough products of improved performance ratios and strengths.

story:
Since Apple released its new MacBook Air/Pro model from 2016, the Thunderbolt 3 has replaced thunderbolt 2 and other ports. Despite the powerful and versatile external ports, the inconvenience of connecting the messy cables is always annoying. Not to mention the limited internal storage starts from 128GB. 

Meet MINIX NEO Pro,  the  3-in-1  portable storage hub especially crafted for your Apple MacBook Air/Pro. Inclusive of a built-in 480GB SSD storage along with the HDMI [4K @ 60Hz], Thunderbolt 3, and USB 3.0 ports. Boost your daily productivity comfortably. It perfectly slips into the side of your MacBook, making it the perfect partner for your work desk.

 

 

 

The SSD storage of MINIX NEO Pro supports up to 400MB/s read/ write speed*. Making it speedy and efficient. Simply connect MINIX NEO Storage Pro to your MacBook and enjoy incredibly fast file transfer. Get easier access to your data quickly and in an organized fashion.

   

 

*Based on internal testing; performance may vary depending on MacBook model, OS, and application. 1 MB = 1,000,000 bytes.

 

MINIX NEO Pro features HDMI [4K @ 60Hz], Thunderbolt 3, and a  USB 3.0 port. Perfect for freelancing, perfect for pitching to clients, perfect for meetings, perfect for you.  Any work necessities, all solved with one capable, stable NEO Pro. 

Easily view movies or slides on a wider screen with external displays via the HDMI and Thunderbolt 3 ports. These 2 ports allow you to basically have 3 screens at once, boosting your productivity of multi-screen users.

 

Get a crystal clear picture quality and vibrant audio from your  MacBook.

 

  • HDMI supports up to 4K @ 60Hz* 

        *Direct HDMI-to-HDMI connection required.

  • Thunderbolt 3 supports up to 5K @ 60Hz

 

 

 

We are excited about cutting-edge technologies like the universal thunderbolt 3, however most of the accessories in the market haven't upgraded to fitting this port which means you still need an extra hub for your MacBook Air/Pro to this essential connection.

*Does not support Apple SuperDrive.

MINIX NEO Storage Pro weighs only 55.3g and fits in the palm of your hand making it ideal for life on-the-go. It's stylish, brushed aluminum housing means it perfectly complements the sleekness of your MacBook Air/Pro.  Also, it connects seamlessly to the side of your MacBook Air/Pro, avoiding any needless cables. 

Made from CNC precision Milled Aluminum with a reinforced shell ensures maximum durability and resistance against daily wear and tear. MINIX NEO Storage Pro’s 3-Year manufacturer’s limited warranty is the longest among competitor products on the market.

In order to be compatible with your MacBook Air/ Pro all around, MINIX NEO Pro is designed In 2 color options, Space Grey and Silver, compatible with your MacBook Air/ Pro perfectly from all ends.

MINIX NEO Storage Pro的想法源于我们团队通过将其快速的数据传输速度与额外的显示和数据端口带来的功能性和多功能性相结合来重新定义外部SSD存储的愿望。经过一年的辛勤工作，我们终于将这一概念变为现实。经过几轮的试运行，MINIX NEO Storage Pro现在已经完成了批量生产阶段！

 

Shipping starts on June 15th!

*Please note：the the shipping date will be varied from country/region, and it will take the carrier a few days to upload the tracking number. 

MINIX was born out of a shared passion for advanced technology and dynamic designs. Ever since it was established in 2008, we have been focused on creating innovative, well-made products.

By combining the finest materials, functional design, and attention to detail, we are proud of delivering original and useful tech products.

Each of our products is carefully crafted, with tested quality, backed with experience and style. There are no compromises made on these ethics, ever.

Creativity is at the heart of everything we do. Our talented team brings ideas to life through a culture of constant innovation and curiosity.

We are always pushing the boundaries in the pursuit of product excellence. So that we can deliver new technologies that truly benefit people and make everyday life more convenient.

For more information about MINIX NEO Storage Pro and our company, please visit www.minix.com.hk . And if you have any questions, feel free to contact support@minix.com.hk, we will help you with it. 

 

 

 

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.

*Please note：the the shipping date will be varied from country/region, and it will take the carrier a few days to upload the tracking number. 




MINIX was born out of a shared passion for advanced technology and dynamic designs. Ever since it was established in 2008, we have been focused on creating innovative, well-made products.
By combining the finest materials, functional design, and attention to detail, we are proud of delivering original and useful tech products.
Each of our products is carefully crafted, with tested quality, backed with experience and style. There are no compromises made on these ethics, ever.
Creativity is at the heart of everything we do. Our talented team brings ideas to life through a culture of constant innovation and curiosity.
We are always pushing the boundaries in the pursuit of product excellence. So that we can deliver new technologies that truly benefit people and make everyday life more convenient.
For more information about MINIX NEO Storage Pro and our company, please visit www.minix.com.hk . And if you have any questions, feel free to contact support@minix.com.hk, we will help you with it. 
 



 

 

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.

story:
Function 101 is a team within the Apple industry that shares one common thread –  a passion for Apple products.

We are the guys and gals that stay up until midnight to order the new iPhone or Apple Watch…and always looking for the trendiest accessories to go with them.

We recently we discovered a major problem –  organizing accessories for these Apple devices while on the road or in our workspace was a major challenge. We exhausted countless hours over the years untangling headphones or searching for that power cube sitting at the bottom of a stuffed back pack, we set out to find a way to maximize our most valuable resource – time.

Learning from the Japanese and their Art of Organization,  we were inspired by the modern portable Bento lunch box while on a trip to Tokyo earlier this year.  We  found that we could borrow from this concept and develop a solution to keep our Apple essentials neatly organized and easily accessed – and bring us Peace of Mind.

 

If you are a “neat freak” or someone who lives in tangled chaos and using “Find My AirPods” all the time, Bento is for you!

We have perfected the design and even completed the tooling,  we are asking your support in raising $25,000 so that we can begin production.

We appreciate your help by making a contribution by selecting one of the offers below or share with your friends, family, or co-workers on social media and send them a link!

 

Share on Facebook           Share on Google+              Share on LinkedIn                Share on Twitter

story:
Why We Develop IoTgo? 

Two years ago, we began to be interested in smart hardware. At that time, we used open source hardware such as Arduino and free IoT cloud platforms like Yeelink and xively to make various kinds of remote smart devices by ourselves, for example, adding a wifi power socket at home which could be remotely controlled via the internet.

Later, the concept of IoT became more and more popular. After seeing our successful smart hardware released one by one, many traditional manufacturers contacted us, hoping that we could provide them with such a program of smart hardware. These free IoT cloud platforms for developers/makers was not able to meet the demand of commercial indie devices direct accessing. Therefore, we had to redevelop and deploy a unique IoT cloud server for manufacturers’ indie devices.

While developing the basic framework of these IoT cloud servers, we found there are few open source IoT projects on the internet. When it comes to the demand of other platforms, you can find many, for example, there is Wordpress for blogs, Zencart for online shops, phpbb for BBS. However, when you want to build an IoT cloud server, it’s very hard to find similar open source projects, so you can only use free platforms such as Yeelink/xively. Based on such situation, after completing the development of several customized projects by using this basic framework, we decided to release it as open source so that more developers in need can directly deploy and use it to realize the basic functions of IoT cloud server. 

Back then, we completed some different projects about smart devices. The IoT cloud servers used in those projects all had the same basic framework. With some slight modifications, we applied the framework into different projects, and all of them worked. That framework we talked about was the the prototype of this IoTgo platform.

About IoTgo 

You can deploy an IoT cloud server using IoTgo just like building your online mart using zencart. 

Different from simply building an online shop, you also need hardware devices that connects to server and even support from mobile APP after you build an IoT cloud server. If you would like to use IoTgo to build this server, don’t worry about them either, because we also provide the open source hardware reference design and the open source software code to connect the server. IoTgo is a complete ecological chain of smart devices but not only just a set of server code. 

Please click HERE to learn more about the IoTgo framework, features, advantages and API introduction, here we are not going to describe them again:

http://iotgo.iteadstudio.com/about

IoTgo and iotgo.iteadstudio.com 

Visit iotgo.iteadstudio.com, you can see what a living IoT platform looks like. This platform can be an example for experience and reference. Besides, it is our real operating IoT server as well.

If you need a free IoT cloud platform for your DIY device, you can register on iotgo.iteadstudio.com and login to use the service this platform provides. It is just like Yeelink and xively which is open and free for developers and makers. Since the website is still at its inception phase now, both functions it offers and the interface display are very simple, but we will continue to improve and update them. 

IoTgo and Yeelink/xively

If you want to build an IoT cloud platform similar to Yeelink/xively and provide it for other users to use, the only thing you need to do is to buy a server host, deploy an IoTgo and simply edit the content on the foreground pages, and then you can open it to the public. 

IoTgo and Open Source Hardware

If you use IoTgo to build the IoT cloud server, you don’t have to worry about the development of hardware devices. We offer several reference hardware design and software developer's kits(SDK) based on open source hardware platform, and they support Arduino and Raspberry Pi developers respectively. For more information about open source hardware devices, please see HERE:

IoTgo and Smart Hardware

IoTgo can offer you support as well, if you want to build a cloud server for commercial smart devices. IoTgo can distribute device ID and verification codes massively for indie products on the background, and it also enables indie products to connect the register server directly. 


What IoTgo Can DO?!

Let us show you some actual case that using IoTgo !

Indie products solution:

Smart wifi power socket [ Mobile control ] 

Gas detection alarm [Mobile control and SMS alarm]


And more smart home device...

Open source demo:

Arduino smart home remote control application [Web UI control/DIY device]

Arduino remote temperature and humidity monitor [Web UI monitor/DIY device]

RPI remote temperature and humidity monitor [Mobile monitor / Indie product]


The Future of IoTgo

IoTgo that has been released at present is just a early version which only includes a basic frame structure, simple logic and UI, so in the following period of time, we will invest more time and energy to constantly update and improve it. 

Following are the update requirements we have already listed in our schedule:

About the UI:

1. The background will provide the content editing and management functions for all pages on the foreground. [Reference imaginary picture]:

2. Add new settings and display UI to adjust brightness and RGB color of the light devices. [Reference imaginary picture]:

3. Add power consumption display UI for the switch. [Reference imaginary picture]:

4. Add a debugging interface for the user-defined device.

About the Functions:

1. Add the storage and query of historical data.
2. Support vision facilities such as the camera.
3. Add logical function settings, e.g. timing, condition triggering etc.
4. Add the support to the mbed ds interface and realize the communication with mebd os.
5. New version detecting and online updating functions.

About the Reference Hardware:

1. Add the reference case of BeagleBone Black
2. Add the reference case of Intel Edison
3. Add the reference case of the mbed device

About the APP Examples:

1. Provide the public version of the smart switch. [Reference imaginary picture]

2. Provide the public version of the smart RGB and LED light.[Reference imaginary picture]:

3. Provide the public version of the remote temperature and humidity sensor. [Reference imaginary picture]

Why Your Support Is Needed?

It is newly-released software and we hope more people could get to know this open source IoT cloud platform project. Therefore, we need you to help us spread and share it, please don’t hesitate to tell your friends about this free open source IoT project that borns for smart hardware, and it offers server code, hardware design(embedded code included) and mobile app code. You might not need to build an IoT cloud platform, but someone who may get the chance to see what you share perhaps is desperately looking for such an open source framework right now. 

Since this is an open source software project, we might not be able to pay back your financial support with much material things and we can only express our deep gratitude here. For those who have make contributions to this project, your name will be on the contributors page on IoTgo site.

All funds raised will be used for constant development of IoTgo, the open source project, and we will continuously optimize and upgrade this platform.

The funds will be mainly used in the following two aspects:

  1. Full-time development engineers will be in charge of developing more basic functions for IoTgo and improving the UI.
  2. The funds will be used in the operation and maintenance of iotgo.iteadstudio.com, trying to provide a permanent free IoT cloud platform for makers.

HighSchool students looking to make a EDM App for Iphone and Android Users globally. This app will connect all EDM fans with sections for news/music/events and more. 
For DJ's we will also be creating  section to upload your own mixes for others to listen to with a Weekly DJ for local talent promotion! We hope you will join us on our adventure to create this App.
Any help is more then appreciated as we do not have the funds to create this ourselves. We thank you!

story:
BRICWAVE™ XTREME Waterproof Case: The MOST promising iPhone protection against punishing conditions!

Advancements in mobile technology have made smartphones a necessity. No matter the choice of phone, ensuring its safety is an investment in itself. A practical phone case is a prerequisite for your phone’s protection. If you are always on the go, you require a sturdy case that matches your active lifestyle.

The XTREME Waterproof iPhone case is an original innovation that is among the best of all iPhone cases. This well-made case stands out because it offers the benefit of being a fully waterproof, shockproof, and sand/dust/mud-proof casing. There is no better way to shield your iPhone from damage than with the XTREME iPhone case.

The design of the Xtreme Waterproof Case boasts a high impact poly-carbonate hard shell that cushions the iPhone against hard knocks. The inclusion of a watertight soft TPU sub-structure ensures the iPhone remains optimal even during immersion in water. Water protection is made possible by the IP68 waterproof technology. This is complemented by the MIL-STD-810G that offers shock protection. 


  • Best in class dust proof and waterproof (IP68 class)
  • High standard crush and shock proof (Exceeds MIL-STD-810G)
  • Lightweight and slip proof
  • Superior design
  • Great for extreme outdoor activity and sports


The BRICWAVE™ XTREME Case is designed with an O-Ring gasket seal coupled with a hydrophobic membrane that protects your iPhone from water damage by creating a water-tight environment. This is the perfect way to ensure peace of mind when enjoying invigorating activities in the natural outdoors.


 

Shock protection is made possible by the high impact poly-carbonate shell and the functional substructure. This offers two-pronged protection where the shell diffuses the external impact when the iPhone is dropped, allowing the sub-structure to absorb the impact. 


The beauty of this phone casing is that Apple earphones and aftermarket sets fit properly, even with the casing. The audio extender is ideal for large third party audio jacks.


This iPhone case is the hallmark of excellence since it is very slim and fits superbly well in fitted clothing. You may choose to drive the six-point stainless steel screws through the case so it is tightly sealed to prevent water damage and to keep the case closed after drops and/or hard knocks.


What's in the Box?


Color Options

Pick your colors to match your lifestyle! 

Frame: High impact polycarbonate hard shell

  • White 
  • Black

Sub-structure: Thermoplastic urethane soft sub-structure 

  • Safety Yellow
  • Black 
  • Clear  (Allows the Apple logo to shine through)


Select A Perk

Perks are incentives offered to contributors in exchange for their support. A survey will be sent to confirm the choice of style AND colors.




Key Milestones:

  • Proof of concept and working prototype testing (May 2015) 
  • Design and development completion (August 2015)
  • Tooling design / Tooling release (August - September 2015)
  • Test production (October 2015)
  • Product placed into distribution (October - November 2015)

Project Team:

Striving for excellence is an important part of our developmental process. Our project team has exercised a high-level of professionalism into every product made. We successfully utilize the experience we have gained in a wide variety of products and services. We incorporate our strong work ethic, positivity, and humble confidence as we accept the challenges in the industry.

  • Sudong Cho: Inventor and Project Lead with 17 years of product development experience. 
  • Daniel Fan: Development Manager with 10 years of Industry experience leading successful waterproof cases.
  • Eric Hwang: Tech Visionary with gained experience about wide ranges of hardware and software development
  • Stephanie Clarke: Content Strategy and Management

Q: What is unique about BRICWAVE Xtreme?

A: It is a hardcore protective case which will resist punishing conditions. It consists of high impact resistant PC and shock absorbing soft TPU that creates optimal conditions for protecting an iPhone. The PC outer shell will dissipate the impact when it is hit against hard objects, while the soft TPU will immediately absorb the energy of the impact. There are no gimmicks for water protection. We try to keep it simple, but effective, with plug-in features for when an iPhone might come into contact with water.

Q: Does the iPhone’s ID Reader work within the case?

A: At the present time, it is challenging for a hardcore protective case to achieve fingerprint compatibility in the market. The ID reader could be achieved with a very delicate wafer thin film covering/overlaying over the home key button. However, the wafer thin film causes another set of issues when used in harsh environments. According to our research, the wafer thin film is not appropriate for users wearing gloves in snow sports or extreme outdoor activities where an environment of heavy dust is present. At this time, a user will have to sacrifice using the home key finger print identity feature on their iPhones in order to have water/dust/mud resistance, in some instances. However, we have made significant efforts toward keeping the iPhone bio-metric reader working while maintaining the water/dust/dirt proof performance. We will keep you posted as we make progress on this issue.

Q: Do aftermarket audio jacks fit?

A: With its 7mm opening at the audio connector, the case will be able to accommodate the majority of aftermarket audio jacks. However, if they don’t fit, an audio extender is included in the package.

Q: How does the new iPhone 6S design comply with the Xtreme Waterproof Case design?

A: Our Xtreme case will be compatible with both the iPhone 6 and 6S. We are preparing for the iPhone 6S release, and are ensuring that the fundamentals of the Xtreme case design remain intact while keeping in mind the changes that are happening to the device. If any challenging issues arise with the Xtreme case for the iPhone 6S, we will immediately inform you of the possible impact it may have to the design. Since we are not able to predict the exact time of the iPhone 6S launch, the Xtreme case launch won’t be set on a strict timeline. If the iPhone 6S release time is later than we anticipated, it may impact our predicted schedule.

Q: How does the waterproof construction impact the speaker performance?

A: Per our study, the Xtreme water resistant case should have a unique configuration to prevent the system from water damage.  To accomplish this, the case requires a unique membrane to cover the bottom speakers, and a waterproof membrane that can transfer sound, but not water, for the top ear speaker. There might be a slight muffling effect with sound losses of around 10% to 30% caused by the unique water resistance design. The majority of waterproof cases on the market have this same issue. This is something a user must be willing to trade off for the benefit of having a water resistant case.

Q: Is iPhone 6 Plus pre-order available in this campaign?

A: No, our Indiegogo campaign is dedicated only for the iPhone 6/ 6S Xtreme waterproof case. The 6 Plus case development is in progress, but don't have a launch timeline to share right now. We will immediately inform you about the Xtreme iPhone 6 Plus waterproof case development details as we exceed our funding goal. The best way to stay in the loop on our latest news and product launches is to sign up for our Facebook mailing list.


Final Thanks You and Link

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and in helping us to spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life and it has been worth every minute, thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, haven’t gone unnoticed. We will continue to keep you posted on what your pledge helped us to achieve. You are part of our BRICWAVE™ family.

If you cannot pledge but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks just by spreading the word!

Contact Us

Website: www.bricwave.com

Help to Spread the Word around the World!

If you have any questions, comments, or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you! Please feel free to contact us at info@bricwave.com
